100001.flavor: [Sorry, but I'm really busy right now. If you have any business with me, talk to me later... But don't forget to tell me when you see me tomorrow, Vernika…]
100001.name: Sita Vilosa

100002.flavor: [The perfect blend of wit and beauty. A master of the arts, both literary and martial. The only person this could describe is Cinia Pacifica... What an intriguing story.]
100002.name: Cinia Pacifica

100003.flavor: [When I needed help, Jaina was there. I would like to repay the favor to both her and you, her knights. Wherever I go, I will lead the charge. Rest assured and focus on your fights.]
100003.name: Luthica Preventer

100004.flavor: [This isn't right. Even though those Scardels and the Crescents are Elders, they shouldn't be ordering you around like this. If they don't like me, then they should at least have the decency to tell it to my face... Those old cowards.]
100004.name: Iri Flina

100005.flavor: [The other students will be really shocked to see you like this in the school.] [My looks were designed with them in mind.]
100005.name: Nold

100006.flavor: [What? Do you have an issue? That guy's already caused me a ton of trouble. I don't care anymore. You beat me, so do whatever you want with me.]
100006.name: Ginger

100007.flavor: [The Twilight Wolf? Are you going to hunt it, Sita? Take me with you!]
100007.name: Curious Vernika

100008.flavor: [You were teasing me, weren't you? You think I'm just a kid! Do you want to die?! ]
100008.name: Cannelle

100009.flavor: [I just don't like Nold! It- It's not like I think your uniform is cute or anything, so don't get any ideas! It's not like I wanted to wear it!]
100009.name: Gart

100010.flavor: [Vernika, this dress is... a little tight around the waist.]
100010.name: Dress Sita

100011.flavor: [I do not normally wear dresses like these, but if I was to attend your party, I suppose it could not be helped.]
100011.name: Dress Cinia

100012.flavor: [It's been a long time since I wore anything this fancy. Heh. I suppose I have Jaina to thank for this.]
100012.name: Dress Luthica

100013.flavor: [I didn't choose this dress for the party. I didn't have a choice. It was requested of me...]
100013.name: Dress Iri

100014.flavor: [I haven't dressed like this in ages. I think this is the first time since my brother's wedding. Hee... Sita, just wait a little longer.]
100014.name: Dress Vernika

100015.flavor: [It won't be a problem.] [Didn't you say you've never done this before?] [As long as swords are involved, I'm confident.]
100015.name: Kendo Sita

100016.flavor: [Checkmate. Is that all you had? Ah... This opponent disappoints me. Not interesting at all. Isn't there anyone who can give me a challenge like my sister?]
100016.name: Chess Cinia

100017.flavor: [Run as much as you like! We have this opportunity, so enjoy it to the fullest!]
100017.name: Sports Luthica

100018.flavor: [Hm? The Athletics Festival... Is it held during the day? What a pity. I thought I could finally have some fun, but...]
100018.name: Cheerleader Iri

100019.flavor: [Hey, girls! Do your best! I'll be cheering my hardest for you!]
100019.name: Team Manager Vernika

100021.flavor: [This is nothing compared to my own estate, but it isn't so bad. I can give you a pass.]
100021.name: Swimwear Cinia

100022.flavor: [Thanks to Jaina, I got to spend some time here. When I get back to headquarters, I'll bring her a gift.]
100022.name: Swimwear Luthica

100023.flavor: [This... is the sea? Incredible! And that water moving toward me is called a tide? I heard that the sea is salty. Is that true? The sea at night... It's a little cold.]
100023.name: Swimwear Iri

100024.flavor: [Sita, if you stay in the water too long, it's bad for the skin. Playing with water is fine, but how about taking a rest in the shade?]
100024.name: Swimwear Vernika

100025.flavor: [Tell me how to turn a vampire back into a human. Crux is supposed to be a fountain of knowledge, isn't it? Tell me! Jaina said she'd tell me as soon as I became a knight!]
100025.name: Lightseeker Sita

100026.flavor: [So this is a public school uniform? It's splendid! This is an excellent design for ordinary people...]
100026.name: Foreign Student Cinia

100027.flavor: [Don't take another step! I won't spare anyone who wants to harm Jaina!]
100027.name: Blue Reaper Luthica

100028.flavor: [Red hair like the twilight... Those blue eyes behind her glasses... That gentle smile, even when no one is around to see it... I've made up my mind. That girl will be mine.]
100028.name: Lovestruck Iri

100029.flavor: [Sorry, Sita. I can't walk to school each morning with you anymore, but don't worry. I'll invite you over tomorrow night... Come quickly, Sita. I miss you... You'll be so beautiful in the moonlight... Hee hee.]
100029.name: Night Denizen Vernika

100030.flavor: [Please don't wait for me. I'm not the same big sister you remember... I miss you... Cinia.]
100030.name: Thorn Witch Rose

100031.flavor: [Ah? This book? No... I just decided to have a look at it, that's all. There's no reason to have a deep interest in the origins of witches, is there?]
100031.name: Rose Pacifica

100032.flavor: [Feel the pain in my blood. Feel the anger of a witch subjected to contempt and oppression. Crux condemned me just because of my hazy visions of the future!]
100032.name: Blood Witch Rose

100033.flavor: [... Please, don't abandon me. I'm still your little sister after all, aren't I? Don't throw me out like this... Don't look at me with that face!]
100033.name: Outcast Rose

100034.flavor: [Sometimes, I just want to breathe the fresh outside air. How is it, Cinia? Doesn't the wind feel good?]
100034.name: Picnic Rose

100035.flavor: [Sister, I only want to show this to you. I don't want to show this look to Cinia anymore...]
100035.name: Wedding Dress Rose

100036.flavor: [I just need to stay still in this dress, right? I'm hungry, Vernika.]
100036.name: Wedding Dress Sita

100037.flavor: [I don't care for white, but this dress isn't bad... Oh, no! Of course it was a good idea, Linia.]
100037.name: Wedding Dress Cinia

100038.flavor: [Oh, this... This is incredible. I never imagined that I would wear anything like this in my life.]
100038.name: Wedding Dress Luthica

100039.flavor: [Sometimes, when I compare these with my drab clothes, I think gorgeous dresses aren't too bad. How do I look, Vernika? ... Never mind. I can't expect a decent answer from you right now...]
100039.name: Wedding Dress Iri

100040.flavor: [Wearing a wedding dress is just like a dream. Cinia, please give my thanks to Linia.]
100040.name: Wedding Dress Vernika

100041.flavor: [How do you like it? As long as it's in your dreams, I can do anything for you. I can be anything for you. The girl you have a one-sided crush on, the woman of your dreams... You just need to sleep to have her in bed with you.]
100041.name: Laevateinn

100042.flavor: [Sage Lady, are you going to play with me? Can I hug you? I like you! I don't need to play with a shadow, right? Hug me!] [A sun-blocking artifact. Where did you... First hug me!]
100042.name: Sisters Sion & Rion

100043.flavor: [Being the head knight is a massive responsibility. I must ensure that everything goes according to plan, so I operate under a lot of stress. Sometimes, I feel like I need to take a break.]
100043.name: Head Knight Jaina

100044.flavor: [Luthica, you should relax. It's too early to get dressed like that now. I feel pressured just by watching you.]
100044.name: Resting Jaina

100045.flavor: [Our attempt to make a sword from talentium was a success! We drew out this girl's potential perfectly. Now that we know talentium is capable of awakening these powers, there is no longer any reason for us to hesitate. - Creuset's Lab Notes]
100045.name: Adept Jaina

100046.flavor: [The sea is so quiet. It's been a while since you've been to the beach, right, Luthica? We're here on a mission, but since we had the chance to come to a place like this, we might as well enjoy it... Hey. Don't stare at me like that!]
100046.name: Swimwear Jaina

100047.flavor: [I saw the head knight battle monsters on the Empire's border! She was amazing. The sword in Jaina's hand started duplicating itself, and every sword moved as if it had a will of its own. These infinite swords... are Jaina's power.]
100047.name: Sword Planter Jaina

100048.flavor: [This dress is a little different than I expected. Is this what you like? It's not too bad.  You're always full of good ideas, Linia.]
100048.name: Wedding Dress Jaina

100049.flavor: [If anyone knows anything at all about Crux Guardian Sigma, it's that she's a drunk. It's because of that drunk that Crux has such a thriving wine industry. - Esprit's Memo]
100049.name: Sigma

100050.flavor: [On a rainy day, the child was found in an alley. A puppy was playing with her bread as she stared at it blankly.]
100050.name: Child Sita

100051.flavor: [Ahem! Are you ignoring me because of my age? Your attitude angers me. Show some respect!]
100051.name: Child Cinia

100052.flavor: [When Luthica first joined the knights, she was always guarded and wary of others. She even woke up when she heard a stranger's footsteps.]
100052.name: Child Luthica

100053.flavor: [Ire turned her face away so her daughter could not see her tears. "I'm sorry, Iri. This is your mother... I hope you grow up to be strong, so no one will ever disregard you."]
100053.name: Child Iri

100055.flavor: [How quaint! This is quite different from the mansion's bathrooms. Excellent. I didn't come in vain.]
100055.name: Hot Springs Cinia

100056.flavor: [D-Don't stare at me like that... It's embarrassing.]
100056.name: Hot Springs Luthica

100057.flavor: [The times I spent with my mother in this hot spring made me so happy. I wish I could go back to those days...]
100057.name: Hot Springs Iri

100058.flavor: [I'm only going to go with you for a little while! It's not because I like you or anything! I'm only moving in because I have to!]
100058.name: Miracle Panda Panica

100059.flavor: [Mommy, can you take me to the library? I'm done with all the books we have at home! I can even count out how many books we have! It's 103,000, right?]
100059.name: Child Vernika

100060.flavor: [I... I'll be a good girl. I want to be a good sister for Cinia... I'll try my best.]
100060.name: Child Rose

100061.flavor: [Mister, why are you being so nice to me? Oh, the ice cream was great, thanks! What's your name? Creu...set? That's a weird name. Wow! Your amulet is amazing.]
100061.name: Child Jaina

100062.flavor: [Live every moment like it's the climax!] [Cli... max?]
100062.name: Child Ginger

100063.flavor: [This is what you're into? Interesting. Your tastes are suspect, but that doesn't matter. The "game" the man mentioned is about to begin.]
100063.name: Child Laevateinn

100064.flavor: [It... looks like I lost control when I tried to become younger.]
100064.name: Child Sigma

100065.flavor: [Come over here. If you are avoiding me just because I have been demanding, I will be very upset.]
100065.name: Layna Scentriver

100066.flavor: [Sorry. I'm not interested. What? That was one of Linia's maids? What did she say about me? Tell me!]
100066.name: Chief Maid

100067.flavor: [Do some special training with me! Follow me. I'll lead you to a secret training ground.]
100067.name: New Knight

100068.flavor: [Long time no see! Did you have a good sleep? You go out every night, so I'm always lonely. Play with me!]
100068.name: Nytitch

100069.flavor: [Hello! Let me introduce my friends. When I feel lonely and bored, I just make a friend. See? Now I have enough companions to start on my journey!]
100069.name: Alchemist Clarice

100070.flavor: [We can do anything if we do it together~♪ Someday, we'll meet~ Something changes and something begins~♬ With every new day~ Let's give a big thanks to my homunculus!]
100070.name: Street Idol Clarice

100071.flavor: [I have to get Luthica out of there... There has to be some way. She's the first friend I made when I came here; I can't just abandon her.]
100071.name: Assistant Clarice

100072.flavor: [Luthica! How do I look? Isn't this cute? For an idol like me, being this cute is a piece of cake!]
100072.name: Swimwear Clarice

100073.flavor: [This is the stage dress for my next performance. Luthica? Hey! Listen to me!]
100073.name: Dress Clarice

100074.flavor: [This dress was a payment from that wedding ceremony. It suits me, doesn't it? I want to show it to you, Luthica. You're the first girl I ever really liked.]
100074.name: Wedding Dress Clarice

100075.flavor: [Bring me more. Blood. I only drink pure blood. Stay at my side forever. First, a little service. Dress me.]
100075.name: Lig Nijes

100076.flavor: [What? You want to help? I can survive this on my own.]
100076.name: Child Nold

100077.flavor: [Yellow is a symbol of dignity, isn't it? Then why doesn't this dress feel dignified at all?]
100077.name: Child Cannelle

100078.flavor: [You said Nold did it like that? Well, I won't lose this game!]
100078.name: Child Gart

100079.flavor: [Don't look at me like that! I only look like this because I'm low on magic!]
100079.name: Child Panica

100081.flavor: [What was so important that you had to come here at this hour? I'm tired. What drove you to barge into my bedroom?]
100081.name: Bedroom Nold

100083.flavor: [How is this?! What do you think of my true form?] [Liar...] [Hey!]
100083.name: Bunny Girl Cannelle

100084.flavor: [Eugh... The rain just keeps coming down. Stop staring like that. It's not going to somehow make my clothes dry faster!]
100084.name: Rain-Soaked Gart

100087.flavor: [What? Something fell down my shirt? I don't see anything. People in Crux have to be honest.]
100087.name: Plastered Sigma

100088.flavor: [That artificial copy of me was a mere child? Of course it was nothing like me. Hm? You're the new master? Then I am at your service.]
100088.name: Anj Inyghem

100089.flavor: [It's good to rest when you're tired, but don't forget the enthusiasm you had when you started.]
100089.name: Newbie Guide Rico

100090.flavor: [I can't actually swim. Water just feels good.]
100090.name: Swimsuit Sita

100091.flavor: [I need some time to clear my mind, but not even watching the sea can calm my heart.]
100091.name: Swimsuit Cinia

100092.flavor: [The Federation's oceans are so beautiful, and I really love this swimsuit. I've always wanted to try a cute swimsuit like this.]
100092.name: Swimsuit Luthica

100093.flavor: [I can't stand salt water, but if the water is clean, I can swim freely.]
100093.name: Swimsuit Iri

100094.flavor: [We can't see what lies above the clouds. This world truly is full of mystery.]
100094.name: Linking Shaman Nexia

100095.flavor: [I feel so much better after taking off that hot costume. Huh? Is this the first time you've seen me like this, Miss Asmis? If you're curious about something, just ask. I'll tell you anything I know.]
100095.name: Vita Principal Treanna

100096.flavor: [The festival is coming soon, but don't get nervous. You'll make mistakes. Stay calm and think things through before you act.]
100096.name: Dean Rihanna

100097.flavor: [How is it? It's a little tight, but that's okay.]
100097.name: Dress Rihanna

100098.flavor: [Isn't this swim outfit a little small? Draw faster! You never said this was going to be a huge event with tons of galleries!]
100098.name: Swimwear Rihanna

100099.flavor: [You said you needed help because things were going to be so busy, but why didn't you say I'd have to wear this?]
100099.name: Waitress Rihanna

100100.flavor: [Your fellow students are in danger! They need your help! Lend your aid to Vernika and Sita!]
100100.name: Persuasive Rihanna

100101.flavor: [Thank you... I will never forget what you've done for me. This year's festival will be a day I never forget.]
100101.name: Wedding Dress Rihanna

100102.flavor: [Can I eat this stuff on top, too? These sticks are hard to use...]
100102.name: Morning Calm Sita

100103.flavor: [It's red, just like I asked for. Excellent. You said someone named Ophelia is responsible for these? That name is unknown to me, but at the very least, you can send her my gratitude.]
100103.name: Morning Calm Cinia

100104.flavor: [I've decided to stay here for a while. You said your name was Ophelia? Nice to meet you.]
100104.name: Morning Calm Luthica

100105.flavor: [These clothes feel wonderful. Ophelia, you said? I feel like I've seen these beads before somewhere... maybe?]
100105.name: Morning Calm Iri

100107.flavor: [I'm so lonely... Someone, please hold my hand. I have nothing to look  forward to in these sunless nights. What's going to happen to me?]
100107.name: Vernika Answer

100108.flavor: [From that day forth, she would never speak without being spoken to. The girl without a smile turned down advice from her friends. Sita would learn from her own wounds.]
100108.name: Waiting Sita

100109.flavor: [Linia became the chairman of the Royle Academy.  Cinia ran for and won the presidency. She had an arrogant look to her as if this was only natural, but something was out of place.]
100109.name: Council President Cinia

100110.flavor: [Luthica left with Clarice at her side. She believed it would be for a long time.]
100110.name: Wanderer Luthica

100111.flavor: [The sage made her an offer. "I can make it so you can walk under the sun." Enrolling at Vita Public School, living in Esprit's office... Iri was torn.]
100111.name: Conflicted Iri

100112.flavor: [1E! 2D! 3A! 4P! 5G!] [I'll chase you to the end of the galaxy! Just try and run! I'll chase you until your very souls sweat and bleed!]
100112.name: Office Chief Esprit

100113.flavor: [The student council need not worry. Everything is going just as planned. No matter what accident may occur, our plans will hold firm.]
100113.name: Council VP Tieria

100114.flavor: [Maids don't just need a place to sleep and food to eat. They also need a place to relax... a place to rest.]
100114.name: Maid Lesnoa

100115.flavor: [Times are tough, but that won't stop us. The research of the Seekers will continue. Irene and I share this belief.]
100115.name: Seeker Odien

100116.flavor: [If someone is going to be called a queen, they'd better be dazzling. She calls herself a queen, but I beg to differ.]
100116.name: Lightning Palomporom

100117.flavor: [I am Ereshkigal, ruler of the Netherworld. What, exactly, are you doing here?]
100117.name: Ereshkigal

100118.flavor: [Do not back down! It is your duty to bear witness to the hopes of the faithful! Cast away any thoughts of abandonment!]
100118.name: Apostle L Red Sun

100119.flavor: [I have something in common with that girl without memories: The loneliness of abandonment...]
100119.name: Crux Knight Rose

100120.flavor: [Put your faith in the small miracles that I show you. I will create a world where everyone is properly rewarded for their efforts.]
100120.name: Shaman Helena K Sink

100121.flavor: [The wound on her head wouldn't heal, and sometimes, it would still bleed. She told Treanna that it seemed like some kind of curse.]
100121.name: Detective Asmis

100122.flavor: [The chairman is a strange person. Her eyes are dead. I heard her say something like "I had it right in my hands, but nothing happened..."]
100122.name: Witch Cadet Linus Falco

100123.flavor: [I know that you have nothing to do with the Empire! But I don't trust you! I don't trust you! Squawk!]
100123.name: Head Knight Eisenwane

100124.flavor: [On a snowy day, Sita put on a Santa suit at the request of her friends. Sita, who hadn't touched something so cold in a long time, looked blankly out the window.]
100124.name: Santa Sita

100125.flavor: [Christmas? A day where people exchange gifts? I don't care about that. This is merely an outfit that Linia made me wear.]
100125.name: Santa Cinia

100127.flavor: [The bell rang in that starry night as everyone exchanged gifts. This request was coming to an end.]
100127.name: Santa Iri

100128.flavor: [I've double checked the list of everyone who is receiving presents. It looks like I have to deliver Sita's, first. I have to deliver the food and drinks before they go bad.]
100128.name: Santa Asmis

100129.flavor: [Hmph! I won't like it at all if you don't put your heart into it. Give me your heart.]
100129.name: Santa Linus

100130.flavor: [The gifts for the other members are all ready. I don't know if they'll like them, though.]
100130.name: Santa Rose

100131.flavor: [The spirit of giving is the first step towards faith and unity. Here is my gift: My heart.]
100131.name: Santa Helena

100132.flavor: [Are you really okay with me? Even if you say that... I'll help you out. From now on... I will entrust myself to your care.]
100132.name: Wedding Dress Layna

100133.flavor: ["The twilight of Crux draws near. Small hopes will change everything. Get ready. Sister... No, 4th Star." As the light of the setting sun stretched across her glasses, her eyes glowed brighter. The color was so beautiful that I forgot where I was for a moment.]
100133.name: GS 3rd Star

100134.flavor: [It's not just about transforming with Musiciter's sword. From now on, we need to think earnestly about this problem. This is what we must do in order to erase sadness from the world.]
100134.name: Kar Vistas

100135.flavor: [Can you be quiet? I'm concentrating. What? Ah... This is a habit of mine. I can't concentrate unless I have something in my mouth. D-Do you think it's weird? I'm just a student!]
100135.name: Pool Queen Layna

100136.flavor: [They are all expendable. Who can I trust? The enemy is within. Nobody will be able to stop me. This world will be destroyed!]
100136.name: Chaos Destroyer Seven

100137.flavor: [Rosie is out at the moment; unlike me, she's a very active girl. If you have some time, would you like to play a game with me? I know a fun game. Heh heh...]
100137.name: Rosie's Sister Lucy

100138.flavor: [Everything is progressing smoothly.] [The Empire's investigator, codename EMM386.EXE Cox, has begun investigating the Royle Academy under orders from above.]
100138.name: Fiery Cox

100139.flavor: [... No abnormalities to report.] [Along with Cox, codename HIMEM.SYS Glacier is heading for Crux to begin investigation of the Federation.]
100139.name: Icy Glacier

100140.flavor: [I'm looking for my master's stuff... Have you seen it? Exam? I don't care about things like exams...]
100140.name: Sita Vilosa

100141.flavor: [Hahaha... Does anyone exist, other than myself, who can truly be called the perfect blend of wit and beauty?]
100141.name: Cinia Pacifica

100142.flavor: [For the pride of Crux, I will do my best. Please be prepared.]
100142.name: Luthica Preventer

100143.flavor: [What kind of person would make me an outcast just because my existence is different?]
100143.name: Iri Flina

100144.flavor: [The simple act of standing before one such as myself grants pride and glory.] [The power that Henlifei wields makes her perfectly suited for the title of Leilang, "Lightning Wolf." - Rio's Memo]
100144.name: Henlifei

100145.flavor: [I just can't leave these girls alone. I want to protect them. I want them by my side.]
100145.name: Chairman Linia

100146.flavor: [I hear the wind. It's not very pleasant... Where is Veltier?]
100146.name: Swimwear Rose

100147.flavor: [I woke up to bright sunlight. Everything was a blur. Maybe it was the light? I toss and turn under the sun.] [Did you sleep well?] [A familiar voice called out, but there was nothing. Maybe I'm just hearing things.]
100147.name: Morning Sita

100148.flavor: [ I always feel like someone strange is watching me when I open my eyes in the morning. Her eyes are closed, and her feelings are hidden as she whispers. I wonder. "Those eyes... Whose are they?"]
100148.name: Morning Cinia

100149.flavor: [ I had a nightmare at the start of the day. I don't remember how I got here, but I always suffer in loneliness.]
100149.name: Morning Luthica

100150.flavor: [The office is always noisy in the morning. Those two vampire kids never sleep. They're always causing a racket, and Esprit is always yelling at them. Their constant attempts to transform always ends with the sound of Esprit's slippers hitting them.]
100150.name: Morning Iri

100152.flavor: [She was born in nature. She was found in nature. Cannelle left Cinia's side to wander the forest, looking for the magical mushrooms that would change her small stature.]
100152.name: Wandering Cannelle

100153.flavor: [In a shanty little town within Crux, a wind fierce blew over Jaina's head, who had just returned from shopping.] [It's been a while, former head knight. I have come to reveal the truth to you.] [The voice that was carried along the wind was that of Creuset.]
100153.name: Jaina

100157.flavor: [This a picture from my childhood. Where did you get this?]
100157.name: Child Layna

100158.flavor: [So this is the place Cinia mentioned? It isn't bad, but it would be better if I came with Cinia.]
100158.name: Witch Queen Linia

100159.flavor: [Sergeant Pintail has henceforth been promoted to staff sergeant.] [I don't like this at all. *sigh* Ugh.]
100159.name: Staff Sergeant Pintail

100160.flavor: [The important thing is love. If these girls don't nurture their love, they would quickly lose their light.]
100160.name: Fanatic Layna

100161.flavor: [It's been a long time, hasn't it? Anyway, where is Soma? We need to find Soma.]
100161.name: Amrita

100162.flavor: [Sita's master, whose current whereabouts are unknown. They call her Master Vilosa.]
100162.name: Master Vilosa

100163.flavor: [Your mother is looking forward to finding out the color of your future. A violet future is waiting for you.]
100163.name: Empress Pacifica

100164.flavor: [Flores Altheim. Clarice's mother. She was summoned as a witness regarding Luthica Preventer's jailbreak. She had not been in contact with Clarice for a long time, so she joined Crux to see how her daughter was doing. She has zero value as a witness.]
100164.name: Flores Altheim

100165.flavor: [A pure-blooded vampire. In order to control her own power, she imprisoned herself and has since been sleeping for most of her life.]
100165.name: First Blood

100166.flavor: [A cup of coffee after waking up feels refreshing.]
100166.name: Tea Time Cinia

100167.flavor: [They said this is what cooks wear, but it's really strange.]
100167.name: Cooking Iri

100168.flavor: [What do you wish for? Tell me your deepest desires.]
100168.name: Soma

100169.flavor: [I don't usually wear clothes like these, so I'm a bit nervous. Does it look alright?]
100169.name: Dress Asmis

100170.flavor: [Isn't it nice to go on walks like this sometimes?]
100170.name: Dress Linus

100171.flavor: [These are dango... This is takoyaki. They taste good.]
100171.name: Rising Sun Sita

100172.flavor: [This is the first time I've worn clothes like these. I want to show this to Rose...]
100172.name: Rising Sun Cinia

100173.flavor: [It's a little hard to move around, but these clothes are pretty. Don't you think so?]
100173.name: Rising Sun Luthica

100174.flavor: [People keep staring. Are these clothes strange? Am I strange?]
100174.name: Rising Sun Iri

100175.flavor: [The wind is howling. Did something happen to Layna?]
100175.name: Lunia Scentriver

100176.flavor: [How nice. Swimming at the beach has a certain grace to it. It's a shame that there's nobody to enjoy it with.]
100176.name: Swimwear Anj Inyghem

100177.flavor: [Mommy said I shouldn't go with strangers who give me candy.]
100177.name: Child Asmis

100178.flavor: [It feels like something good will happen today.]
100178.name: Child Linus

100179.flavor: [Where are Linia and Cinia? Are they in the garden?]
100179.name: Child Rose

100180.flavor: [What's up, everyone? We have some good weather today. Wanna play?]
100180.name: Child Helena

100181.flavor: [I'm a chief, but the higher ups don't take me seriously. A kidnapping? What a joke.]
100181.name: Chief Celesti

100182.flavor: [This is my gift. My curse. Who am I? I'm hungry.]
100182.name: Hero Sita

100183.flavor: [A full suit of talentium can easily protect weak flesh. This is the latest in arcanotechnology. You would never be able to build this in a cave with a box of scraps.]
100183.name: Hero Cinia

100184.flavor: [This outfit is embarrassing. Why did you make it so tight, Clarice?] [It's how the style works! You should be thankful. Where would Luthica be without Luthica's Pal, Clarice Altheim?]
100184.name: Hero Luthica

100185.flavor: [I am the dark! I am the knight! I am Iri! Now tell me. Where is Vernika!? WHERE IS SHE?!]
100185.name: Hero Iri

100186.flavor: [My body feels rejuvenated. It'd be nice to stay here a bit longer.]
100186.name: Hot Springs Asmis

100187.flavor: [This feels great. It'd be nice to come here every now and then.]
100187.name: Hot Springs Linus

100188.flavor: [Come try it out. It feels good. Come on.]
100188.name: Hot Springs Rose

100189.flavor: [These things they call hot springs are lovely.]
100189.name: Hot Springs Helena

100190.flavor: [I like going for a light jog every morning. No, maybe I like eating more...]
100190.name: Training Sita

100191.flavor: [Don't you know who I am? What? You don't? How senseless...]
100191.name: Tigress Felpix

100193.flavor: [It's been a long time since I've worn clothes like these. Do they look okay?]
100193.name: Dress Rose

100194.flavor: [These clothes are different from what I usually wear. They're soft, so I like them.]
100194.name: Dress Helena

100195.flavor: [My song has the power to bring everyone together. Everyone, listen to my song!]
100195.name: Queen Peia Breis

100196.flavor: [This was the outcome I expected, so I can't say it felt terribly special. It is difficult  to smile politely.]
100196.name: Miss Royle Cinia

100197.flavor: [Miss Mon Cher! It's an order from above.] [Silence. More importantly, didn't they tell you that it's forbidden to speak the name of one of the executives?] [P... Pardon me. 5th Star.]
100197.name: GS Executive Mon Cher

100198.flavor: [I've already seen through you!] [... What are the chances of that?]
100198.name: Mahjong Asmis

100199.flavor: [Hm, it looks pretty like this. Should I have a taste?]
100199.name: Baker Linus

100200.flavor: [Hah! Ha! This is a good horse.]
100200.name: Horseback Rose

100205.flavor: [These are the clothes of Vita Public School's Miss Sita! She becomes twice as cute when she sees something edible!]
100205.name: Sita Cosplay Rico

100206.flavor: [This is the dress of the youngest Pacifica daughter, Miss Cinia! Isn't it pretty?]
100206.name: Cinia Cosplay Rico

100207.flavor: [These are the clothes of the Crux Knight adjutant, Miss Luthica. It seems like they're a bit too big for me...]
100207.name: Luthica Cosplay Rico

100208.flavor: [These are the clothes of the Flina family's Miss Iri. Grr! Am I a little scary like this, too?]
100208.name: Iri Cosplay Rico

100213.flavor: [I'm tired, mommy... School? Let me sleep some more... Just let me transfer to another school...]
100213.name: Pajama Asmis

100214.flavor: [Hello! What a wonderful morning! I'm Linus!]
100214.name: Pajama Linus

100215.flavor: [It's beautiful tonight. I wonder how Cinia is doing.]
100215.name: Pajama Rose

100216.flavor: [So full... I can't eat anymore... Zzz...]
100216.name: Pajama Helena

100218.flavor: Haha! If you want to be a detective, then at the very least, you have to look the part!] [Is that pipe real? If it's real, won't it get confiscated?]
100218.name: Aspiring Sleuth Asmis

100219.flavor: [Mm, the next chord is... I don't like this at all... I'll just start over!]
100219.name: Singer-songwriter Linus

100220.flavor: [I swear on my honor! I won't use my powers at all, so it'll be a completely fair game.]
100220.name: Gambler Rose

100221.flavor: [Where does it hurt? Share your pain with God. Your prayer will definitely reach Heaven.]
100221.name: Nurse Helena

100228.flavor: [Oh! Isn't this... every girl's dream?! The dream everyone wants to achieve someday!]
100228.name: Wedding Dress Asmis

100229.flavor: [It's not it makes me happy... that you said you'll support me... Well, I guess I can show you a little thanks...]
100229.name: Wedding Dress Linus

100230.flavor: [I'm wearing these clothes again... it makes my heart flutter every time I wear them.]
100230.name: Wedding Dress Rose

100231.flavor: [I have always devoted myself to God... could this also be God's will?]
100231.name: Wedding Dress Helena

100232.flavor: [I'll get candy... because I wear these clothes... Are these magical clothes...?]
100232.name: Halloween Sita

100233.flavor: [How dare you dress me like this?! But I do like the red...]
100233.name: Halloween Cinia

100234.flavor: [Hahaha... This concept is a dark witch! Sometimes, girls just want to be naughty!]
100234.name: Halloween Luthica

100235.flavor: [Sion and Rion told me to go with them to get candy... It's kind of a pain, but I guess I have to go...]
100235.name: Halloween Iri

100236.flavor: [H... Huh? Is this not how I'm supposed to wrap it up? What do I do? I'm running out of time...]
100236.name: Halloween Asmis

100237.flavor: [Greetings! I am the moonlight magician! Tonight, I will steal your precious thing!]
100237.name: Halloween Linus

100238.flavor: [I heard that this is a day where you eat candy. Does it have some other significance? What an interesting day.]
100238.name: Halloween Rose

100239.flavor: [Are these clothes... really God's will...? It's embarrassing...]
100239.name: Halloween Helena

100277.flavor: [Magnificent... Have I finally created the perfect homunculus? It looks just like Asmis, doesn't it? As expected, I'm a genius. - Clarice's Research Notebook]
100277.name: PH Asmis

100278.flavor: [Magnificent... Have I finally created the perfect homunculus? It looks just like Linus, doesn't it? As expected, I'm a genius. - Clarice's Research Notebook]
100278.name: PH Linus

100279.flavor: [Magnificent... Have I finally created the perfect homunculus? It looks just like Rose, doesn't it? As expected, I'm a genius. - Clarice's Research Notebook]
100279.name: PH Rose

100280.flavor: [Magnificent... Have I finally created the perfect homunculus? It looks just like Helena, doesn't it? As expected, I'm a genius. - Clarice's Research Notebook]
100280.name: PH Helena

100281.flavor: [Magnificent... Have I finally created the perfect homunculus? It looks just like Isfeldt, doesn't it? As expected, I'm a genius. - Clarice's Research Notebook]
100281.name: PH Isfeldt

100286.flavor: [I don't care for the color, but I'm quite the supporter of everyone's right to live freely. Everyone should be free to serve me in any manner they choose.]
100286.name: Liberty Cinia

110001.flavor: [The Wind clan doesn't like meaningless fights.]
110001.name: Bunny Lady

110002.flavor: [Feel the wind. Focus on the flowers swaying in the wind.]
110002.name: Wind Shear

110003.flavor: [Fascinating. This place contradicts all previous thoughts and theories.]
110003.name: Winged Seeker

110004.flavor: [I mew the Myo Clan stopped cooperating with the Flinas! I also mew that you've got some facts wrong!]
110004.name: Enchantress

110005.flavor: [What happened, you ask? If you've got a feeling like that in a purrfect place like this, you should have picked up on it sooner.]
110005.name: Trickster

110006.flavor: [Look into it, focus, and pay attention to the details. The truth can't be discovered at just a glance.]
110006.name: Myo Observer

110007.flavor: [The Wind clan doesn't like meaningless fights.]
110007.name: Bunny Lady X

110008.flavor: [Feel the wind. Focus on the flowers swaying in the wind.]
110008.name: Wind Shear X

110010.flavor: [Faster and lighter than the wind! I will accept the wind family's speed!]
110010.name: Wind Sneaker

110011.flavor: [I'm as fast as the wind! As quiet as the forest! As passionate as the fire! As solid as the mountain! Remember this!]
110011.name: Wind Forestier

110012.flavor: [I mew the Myo Clan stopped cooperating with the Flinas! I also mew that you've got some facts wrong!]
110012.name: Enchantress X

110013.flavor: [What happened, you ask? If you've got a feeling like that in a purrfect place like this, you should have picked up on it sooner.]
110013.name: Trickster X

110014.flavor: [Look into it, focus, and pay attention to the details. The truth can't be discovered at just a glance.]
110014.name: Myo Observer X

110016.flavor: [Faster and lighter than the wind! I will accept the wind family's speed!]
110016.name: Wind Sneaker X

110017.flavor: [I'm as fast as the wind! As quiet as the forest! As passionate as the fire! As solid as the mountain! Remember this!]
110017.name: Wind Forestier X

110018.flavor: [It's just like looking into a mirror, but something feels different. It speaks in the same voice, but it sounds like someone else. - Esprit's Memo]
110018.name: Mirror Sita

110019.flavor: [It's just like looking into a mirror, but something feels different. It speaks in the same voice, but it sounds like someone else. - Esprit's Memo]
110019.name: Mirror Cinia

110020.flavor: [It's just like looking into a mirror, but something feels different. It speaks in the same voice, but it sounds like someone else. - Esprit's Memo]
110020.name: Mirror Luthica

110021.flavor: [It's just like looking into a mirror, but something feels different. It speaks in the same voice, but it sounds like someone else. - Esprit's Memo]
110021.name: Mirror Iri

110022.flavor: [This is a simple game. You just need to guess if the dice will roll odds or evens. Easy, right?]
110022.name: Wind Gambler

110023.flavor: [Eat everything and grow up fast, okay?]
110023.name: Wind Girl

110024.flavor: [The night gives equal time to everyone. It's very fair. Do you want to join me? Playing alone is too boring.]
110024.name: Night Witch Nytitch

110025.flavor: [I don't get what this book is trying to say. I'm not sure if it's me that's stupid or if it's the book that's stupid.]
110025.name: Night Witch Laetitia

110026.flavor: [I don't really know. I'm trying, but I can't read our destinies. This is disturbing. What's going to happen tomorrow?]
110026.name: N. Witch Magy Shen

110027.flavor: [I'm the fastest thing on the road at night. Even the Devil's Hairpin Course can't stop my drifting!]
110027.name: Night Witch Seriot

110028.flavor: [I'll make your dream as happy as can be. You don't need to pay me extra. I'll already get enough in your dream.]
110028.name: Succubus Cantabile

110029.flavor: [The night gives equal time to everyone. It's very fair. Do you want to join me? Playing alone is too boring.]
110029.name: Nytitch X

110030.flavor: [I don't get what this book is trying to say. I'm not sure if it's me that's stupid or if it's the book that's stupid.]
110030.name: Laetitia Ful X

110031.flavor: [I don't really know. I'm trying, but I can't read our destinies. This is disturbing. What's going to happen tomorrow?]
110031.name: Magy Shen X

110032.flavor: [I'm the fastest thing on the road at night. Even the Devil's Hairpin Course can't stop my drifting!]
110032.name: Seriot X

110033.flavor: [I'll make your dream as happy as can be. You don't need to pay me extra. I'll already get enough in your dream.]
110033.name: R. Cantabile

110034.flavor: [It's not surprising that Rion likes you. I'm interested in you too. Do you want to serve me tonight? Isn't the chance to serve me payment enough?]
110034.name: Trickster Sion

110035.flavor: [How is this? Isn't this great? I wanted to make something fun for Sion, but unfortunately, I don't have enough materials. Oh yeah! Hey, you! How would you like to be our toy?]
110035.name: Trickster Rion

110036.flavor: [Who's there? The brats playing these horrible pranks?] [Ooh, how scary! Ahahaha! This is an amusement park we built ourselves. If you're already this worked up, this is going to be so much fun!]
110036.name: Mirror Vernika

110037.flavor: [I don't have the slightest desire to play with you, so just accept my proposal, okay? You should stop this right now. Can't you see how upset you've made Rio?] [Rio? Who's that? Oh... That lady with the huge chest.]
110037.name: Mirror Rose

110038.flavor: [I just gave that girl one look in the mirror, and I never thought she'd get so depressed.] [Was that mirror showing my past? Why did I do such a useless thing?]
110038.name: Shadow Nold

110039.flavor: [Sage Lady, what kind of girls do you want to play around with? You've got short hair, and you wear glasses. Maybe you like the same kind of girl~] [You girls need a lesson!]
110039.name: Shadow Cannelle

110040.flavor: [Do you know what you girls will look like when you grow up?] [We're already 200.] [Sorry...]
110040.name: Shadow Gart

110041.flavor: [You little brats! Stay right there! I'm going to beat your faces in!] [Boring.] [Sage Lady, isn't there some more creative punishment? That's so cliche...  If you want to come up with a better prank next time, you need to put some effort into it!]
110041.name: Shadow Ginger

110042.flavor: [Game over. Time to pay for your sins.] [Aah! You're scary, Sage Lady!] [I told you, my name is Esprit!]
110042.name: Shadow Laevateinn

110043.flavor: [This is a simple game. You just need to guess if the dice will roll odds or evens. Easy, right?]
110043.name: Wind Gambler X

110044.flavor: [Eat everything and grow up fast, okay?]
110044.name: Wind Girl X

110045.flavor: [It's important to get off to a good start! Don't slack off just because you're new!]
110045.name: Drill Sgt. Pippin

110046.flavor: [It isn't difficult. I'm just telling you how to protect someone.]
110046.name: Drill Sgt. Rena

110047.flavor: [Everyone starts out like this. Your first try will end in failure, but you can always learn from it.]
110047.name: New Medic Lina

110048.flavor: [It's best to watch what you say on government property. Everyone is recording every single word you say.]
110048.name: Clerk Cecilia

110049.flavor: [Any military would love to have a solid weapon. Unfortunately, Sergeant Pintail doesn't seem to realize she's in a slump.]
110049.name: Kenjutsu Karen

110050.flavor: [The military might of Crux depends on its knights. In a situation like this, I don't think it's a good idea to divide our forces.]
110050.name: Strategist Elly

110051.flavor: [Attention! A hundred laps around the training grounds! Anyone who wishes to express a different opinion must first outperform me!]
110051.name: Sr. Knight Marian

110052.flavor: [It's important to get off to a good start! Don't slack off just because you're new!]
110052.name: Drillmaster Pippin

110053.flavor: [It isn't difficult. I'm just telling you how to protect someone.]
110053.name: Drillmaster Rena

110054.flavor: [Everyone starts out like this. Your first try will end in failure, but you can always learn from it.]
110054.name: Medic Lina

110055.flavor: [It's best to watch what you say on government property. Everyone is recording every single word you say.]
110055.name: Head Clerk Cecilia

110056.flavor: [Any military would love to have a solid weapon. Unfortunately, Sergeant Pintail doesn't seem to realize she's in a slump.]
110056.name: Swordmaster Karen

110057.flavor: [The military might of Crux depends on its knights. In a situation like this, I don't think it's a good idea to divide our forces.]
110057.name: Warmaster Elly

110058.flavor: [Attention! A hundred laps around the training grounds! Anyone who wishes to express a different opinion must first outperform me!]
110058.name: General Marian

110059.flavor: [A break is still a part of training. I should try my hardest at everything, right senpai?]
110059.name: New Knight

110060.flavor: [We need a break. Having some more vacation days would be wonderful.]
110060.name: Chief Maid

110061.flavor: [Do you think this bamboo would make a great material for a flag pole? If the bamboo is processed properly, the pole will be lighter and stronger.]
110061.name: Frett

110062.flavor: [We need new materials for the mops. Our current equipment is too heavy, so it would be nice if they were made of something lighter...]
110062.name: Mop Maid

110063.flavor: [Are you shocked because my attitude has changed? Even I need a place to relax.]
110063.name: Layna Scentriver

110064.flavor: [I dropped another cup today. Miss Linia won't blame me, but I still feel bad about it.]
110064.name: Accident Maid

110065.flavor: [Miss Linia doesn't seem interested in eating. This is worrying.]
110065.name: Kitchen Maid

110066.flavor: [Linia will blame me if I don't clean properly, but she hates it when I touch her stuff. I'm not sure what I should do.]
110066.name: Cleaning Maid

110067.flavor: [Is something wrong? I'm having a cup of tea on my break. That's okay, isn't it?]
110067.name: Tea Time Maid

110068.flavor: [In this place, the most important thing to consider is Miss Linia's mood.]
110068.name: Linia's Head Maid

110069.flavor: [Today, I dropped a cup again like usual. Linia spoke to me in private, and I...]
110069.name: Disaster Maid

110070.flavor: [The food we make is mostly eaten by us maids, but every once in a while, Miss Linia comes by to eat it, then compliment us. Those are our happiest moments.]
110070.name: Gourmet Maid

110071.flavor: [Now I get it. I can just try to clean and make it look like I didn't touch anything.]
110071.name: Head Cleaning Maid

110072.flavor: [Oh, sorry... I didn't realize this belonged to Miss Linia.]
110072.name: Tea Maid

110074.flavor: [Linia's maids have such an easy life. I wish I were working for her.]
110074.name: R. Chief Maid

110075.flavor: [But... I heard that over there, they have to use their hands to clean the floor... How horrible...]
110075.name: R. Mop Maid

110078.flavor: [It isn't easy to abandon our home, but we have to go.]
110078.name: Scardel Sangiovese

110079.flavor: [I knew Crux was powerful, but this was more than I expected. No matter. We won't give our land without a fight.]
110079.name: Scardel Viognier

110080.flavor: [We have no other choice. We have to fight to protect ourselves.]
110080.name: Scardel Shiraz

110081.flavor: [I'm tired. Why don't we rest for a bit? Here's some blood from a Crux human I caught.]
110081.name: Scardel Pinot Noir

110082.flavor: [Look...The world of night is filled with the corrupt.]
110082.name: Moonlight Vampire

110083.flavor: [Leave! Your goddess cannot travel into the night.]
110083.name: R. Merlot

110084.flavor: [Your goddess can't pass through this place. Your light shines too brightly, so disappear.]
110084.name: R. Chardonnay

110085.flavor: [The Crux Knights are here! I'm out!]
110085.name: R. Sangiovese

110086.flavor: [It's better to throw something away than have it stolen. I'm out of here.]
110086.name: R. Viognier

110087.flavor: [I will protect our home until the very end. If you're going to leave, then leave now.]
110087.name: R. Shiraz

110088.flavor: [I won't move until I've taken blood from every one of you. This is our land.]
110088.name: R. Pinot Noir

110089.flavor: [Look... Our thirst will be quenched with the blood of the corrupt.]
110089.name: R. Moonlight Vamp.

110090.flavor: [Who are you? I like people who give me yummy bamboo, so give me some. If you do, I'll go with you.]
110090.name: Child Panica

110091.flavor: [Climax... I don't get it. Do you?]
110091.name: Child Ginger

110092.flavor: [I like the people of the Royle Kingdom. I like the children who will grow up to become the country's future. I will protect them.]
110092.name: Child Nold

110093.flavor: [Stronger. More dignified. I need the power to rule over everyone here, if I'm to be the leader of the Wind Clan.]
110093.name: Child Cannelle

110094.flavor: [The world of books is full of mystery. How much more mysterious is the real world?]
110094.name: Child Vernika

110095.flavor: [I don't know what the future holds, but I want' to be someone really cool. Maybe like that girl over there?]
110095.name: Child Jaina

110096.flavor: [Hey! Hey! I have a new sister! Her name is Cinia. I want to go see her right now and become a good sister for her.]
110096.name: Child Rose

110097.flavor: [You came all the way here... Impressive. You must have a strong will. How do you feel? Tired? You can rest... It's okay.]
110097.name: Defender

110098.flavor: [That N... Nold. She'd rather spend time with humans than me? Humans are so boring! Augh! She's stupid!]
110098.name: Child Gart

110099.flavor: [I tempt humans, but I also rely on them to live. What are humans, exactly?]
110099.name: Child Laevateinn

110100.flavor: [Huh? Alcohol? Gross! Humans drink stuff like that? Weird.]
110100.name: Child Sigma

110101.flavor: [This is a world where humans and non-humans can coexist. There is no need to distinguish between them. Now, where is your will?]
110101.name: Embracing Shaman

110102.flavor: [Every day, I have to force myself to wake up and live. Opening my eyes is routine and breathing is routine and living is routine and I'm forgetting everything.]
110102.name: Sleep Club Advisor

110104.flavor: [I go where no man has gone before, and everywhere I travel will become a new path.]
110104.name: Geography Teacher

110105.flavor: [The most important thing in cooking is your heart. Never forget that.]
110105.name: Cook Club Advisor

110106.flavor: [You're responsible for your own health, so pay extra special attention in class...]
110106.name: Health Teacher

110107.flavor: [In those sleepless nights, I wanted to do something fun. That's why I volunteered. The nights are long.]
110107.name: Night Teacher

110108.flavor: [I heard about you from Seven. You're supposed to be so great? This is a battle of physical strength!]
110108.name: Lady Philia

110109.flavor: [I never look back, so watch my back for me.]
110109.name: Hannah Pathfinder

110110.flavor: [Cooking isn't just about eating delicious food, but also cleaning up! Clean the kitchen properly before you leave!]
110110.name: Anyte Einoth

110111.flavor: [To live a healthy life, be prepared for anything. Better safe than sorry. ♡]
110111.name: Teacher Riano

110112.flavor: [If I could just close my eyes and have the time fly by, I'd jump and shout with joy.]
110112.name: Rui Flett

110113.flavor: [This is different from teaching. The best part is that I don't need to take care of anyone. The principal knows me well.]
110113.name: Night Teacher Rui

110114.flavor: [I'll protect you, Vernika. Don't leave me, Vernika.] [She spoke, but there was no response. It was a phenomenon belonging to the closed structure of the vivid world. - DTD]
110114.name: Sita Vilosa

110115.flavor: [I hate everything. I can't trust anyone.] [Defense mechanisms were installed to eliminate intruders. She could not speak, but she noticed me and attacked. - DTD]
110115.name: Cinia Pacifica

110116.flavor: [They betrayed me...] [No connection was detected between these girls and the original world. Their existences are only fragmented reflections. - DTD]
110116.name: Luthica Preventer

110117.flavor: [Vernika... Come back.] [No special link was detected, so I initiated destruction protocols. - DTD]
110117.name: Iri Flina

110119.flavor: [Was this the result of the chaotic phenomena in the vivid world? - DTD]
110119.name: Panica

110120.flavor: [Seeing creatures like these stunned me. - DTD]
110120.name: Sigma

110121.flavor: [... I didn't even know what to say. - DTD]
110121.name: Aka Flina

110122.flavor: [Attention! This is a warning! This world is in violation of Spacetime Police law. It must be destroyed.]
110122.name: 3rd Witness DTD

110123.flavor: [This world is full of sorrow. We would prefer not to harm the world's creator, but there is no other way.]
110123.name: World Destroyer DTD

110124.flavor: [Boring... Nothing is happening here, so this place is boring too.]
110124.name: Winged Seeker

110126.flavor: [When I look at the ocean, my heart feels refreshed.]
110126.name: Strategist Elly

110127.flavor: [Everyone has times when they just can't stand their normal day to day life.]
110127.name: Head Cleaning Maid

110128.flavor: [I'm taking a break. It's important to rest, no matter how you do it.]
110128.name: Scardel Pinot Noir

110129.flavor: [The dark of night hides the truth; history is made in the night.]
110129.name: Night Teacher

110130.flavor: [It has yet to be determined what kind of influence this has, so for now, I am suspending operations.]
110130.name: Kana.DTD

110131.flavor: [Did you wait long? I prepared a cold drink for you.]
110131.name: Mop Maid

110132.flavor: [The warm sunlight feels like it embraces everything.]
110132.name: Embracing Shaman

110133.flavor: [Ereshkigal knows everything. Find her, and you find your answer.]
110133.name: Rio

110134.flavor: [I want to discover the rules of how the world works. They're close to the world's point of origin, the place where everything began. Isn't this exciting?]
110134.name: Nanai

110135.flavor: [It's fine if you win. IF you win. I don't care who Nanai is or what she's looking for. She's obsessed.]
110135.name: Seven

110136.flavor: [It's time to use the sword my master left for me. I knew from the start that there would be no turning back.]
110136.name: New Knight

110137.flavor: [The past and the present are one, now and forever. Welcome to Muspelheim!]
110137.name: Origin Disciple

110138.flavor: [You call, and I arrive! Ta-daaaah! The two of us that make one detective have made our entrance! This case... smells hard-boiled, doesn't it?]
110138.name: Sion Flina

110139.flavor: [What do you need? This city's so crowded it's making me dizzy.]
110139.name: Rion Flina

110140.flavor: [I was searching in the forest for new flag pole materials when I ended up here. What is this place?]
110140.name: Frett

110141.flavor: [Did you see any artifacts? This place is an amazing discovery. New materials, new ideas... Everything is new!]
110141.name: Odien

110142.flavor: [Hiii! Are you having any trouble? I'm having a hard time figuring this place out too!]
110142.name: Lyrica

110143.flavor: [The most important tool for manipulating the public is information. Start with the information they've already heard, then work on the information you give them.]
110143.name: Apostle Six

110144.flavor: [You have to inspire dreams within the weary.]
110144.name: Apostle Isena

110145.flavor: [In the end, money makes the world go round. It must be ours.]
110145.name: Apostle Euler

110146.flavor: [We'll get what we want. Don't you worry.]
110146.name: Info Manager Six

110147.flavor: [It was a success. We're making progress.]
110147.name: Obsessed Isena

110148.flavor: [The hearts of the people are complex. We must protect their faith.]
110148.name: Item Manager Euler

110149.flavor: [I like quiet suburbs, but why is it always night in this city? It's a mystery.]
110149.name: Sarah

110150.flavor: [Ack! Stop that! It's going to spill! You stupid pigeons!]
110150.name: Gart

110151.flavor: [I can deliver news from anywhere you want! This place has devices that let you speak to other people from far away, though.]
110151.name: Messenger Knight

110152.flavor: [This place doesn't suit our goals. We need an uninhabited location.]
110152.name: GS 1st Star

110153.flavor: [Ereshkigal rules this place, and there are a lot of complaints landing on her desk. You'd better take care of yourself.]
110153.name: Kana.DTD

110154.flavor: [This place has so many new books just waiting to be read! It's amazing!]
110154.name: Lotte

110155.flavor: [Life is a series of problems, just like a quiz show. Isn't it exciting?]
110155.name: Conundrum

110156.flavor: [Always take the lead. Hesitation dulls the blade.]
110156.name: Vanguard Knight

110157.flavor: [New materials, new perspectives, new sentences. I can't miss out on a single thing. I don't get all the details, but I'm completely absorbed.]
110157.name: Serie

110158.flavor: [... Destroy me. If my life is the price that has to be paid to console every lonely person in the world, I'll pay it gladly.]
110158.name: Envy Lady

110160.flavor: [My personal rule is to finish every job, but I forgot.]
110160.name: Fourteen

110161.flavor: [Lots of maids means a lot of laundry. The maids' laundry outweighs the master's. Who will be our maid... ?]
110161.name: Maid Luna

110162.flavor: [I've never missed a day of training, and I never will! Someday, my dedication will pay off.]
110162.name: Youngest Knight

110163.flavor: [This is the return of the Elemental Lord of Wind! Hot Winds! Hurricane!]
110163.name: Chirushi

110164.flavor: [I have to continue my research. For a looooong time.]
110164.name: Lagerfeld

110165.flavor: [I'm Winfield, from the Council Press. Today, I'll be shooting some outdoor photos.]
110165.name: Winfield

110166.flavor: [Conundrum? Don't get too excited. Watch out for the light.]
110166.name: Kris Flina

110167.flavor: [Mister Louver? What kind of place is the Federation?]
110167.name: Natura

110168.flavor: [We received news of Mr. Louver's poor results.]
110168.name: Ignis

110169.flavor: [It's okay, Louver. There are wings hidden here? It would be convenient if you could fly... UFO?]
110169.name: Cherum

110170.flavor: [I see something down below. Is that midget the new head of the Crux knights?]
110170.name: Axis Wing Natura

110171.flavor: [Natura. Don't say that so calmly. The midget isn't getting angry.]
110171.name: Axis Wing Ignis

110172.flavor: [These ruins are now the property of the Empire. We will do as we please. Where is the key?]
110172.name: Axis Wing Cherum

110173.flavor: [I found what I've been looking for. There's nothing more exciting than travel. My curiosity has been piqued. Even if it rains...]
110173.name: Amethystar

110174.flavor: [Where am I? Who am I? I have no idea which way is which...]
110174.name: Zislana

110175.flavor: [The time is different... Time flows differently here than it does in the real world.]
110175.name: Magision

110176.flavor: [This sword... It feels like it possesses mystical powers.]
110176.name: Jaina Preventer

110177.flavor: [To be honest, it's impossible to explain with words alone...]
110177.name: Disciple Johanna

110179.flavor: [What's up? Are you a knight? Ah... The stationmaster? Who's that?]
110179.name: Fulle

110180.flavor: [Interesting... This place isn't bad. Since I've been here, nobody has called us freaks or anything. Shall we stick around for a while?]
110180.name: Chenin Blanc

110181.flavor: [Cooking is living! Cooking is being! I will do my best to bring the stationmaster the best food possible!]
110181.name: Disc. of Abundance

110183.flavor: [Please wait. The stationmaster will be arriving shortly.]
110183.name: Disciple Shur

110184.flavor: [Please take this receipt and send your request to the address printed there.]
110184.name: 2S Clerk

110185.flavor: [Do you remember what kind of person it was that you met? It seems like an acquaintance.]
110185.name: 2S Intimidator

110186.flavor: [This is an assignment for the red mansion. Infiltrate as a maid.]
110186.name: 2S Twenty

110187.flavor: [I am protecting a client while disguised as a teacher.]
110187.name: 2S Spy

110188.flavor: [An ice user. At a client's request, she froze over a certain room in Vita Public School.]
110188.name: 2S Agent

110189.flavor: [Don't take two numbers! Don't cut in line either! When your number is called, you come in! This isn't a bank, miss!]
110189.name: 2S Clerk Jasmine

110190.flavor: [No matter who I meet or how new the work is, I can always do it.]
110190.name: 2S Casey

110191.flavor: [This mansion is strange. Something is different. Just who are the people who live here?]
110191.name: 2S Infiltrator Twenty

110192.flavor: [During my time as a teacher, I've discovered a talent for teaching.]
110192.name: 2S Spy Forty

110193.flavor: [The client has anonymity. Because of this request, a student at Vita Public School, Miss Weekly, was hurt.]
110193.name: 2S Agent Ice

110194.flavor: [In order to use talentium effectively, you need a flexible mind.]
110194.name: Proctor Margaret

110195.flavor: [Talentium Adepts can't get lazy in their training.]
110195.name: Proctor Coy

110196.flavor: [Concentrate. You need to concentrate to control talentium.]
110196.name: Proctor Iris

110197.flavor: [Can you follow my moves? They follow specific rules.]
110197.name: Proctor R. Margaret

110198.flavor: [Push your power to its limits, and I'll measure it.]
110198.name: Proctor P. Coy

110199.flavor: [You can be trained to focus. It's important to never lose faith.]
110199.name: Proctor G. Iris

110200.flavor: [Your opponent is now none other than my esteemed self. Be grateful for this honor. You face the divine might of Lightning Wolf Henlifei.]
110200.name: Henlifei

110207.flavor: [Meeew.] [The creatures known as cats have some kind of power to stir the instincts of girls. Particularly their paws... it's a powerful spell.]
110207.name: Quickitty

110208.flavor: [Please participate in the Student Council activities. It is mandatory.]
110208.name: Council Rumi

110210.flavor: [Listen up. If you want to live peacefully, you won't get help from your surroundings. Why's that?]
110210.name: Campus Delinquent

110211.flavor: [I have no interest in those weaker than me, but if you touch my friends, it's a different story.]
110211.name: Delinquent Leader

110212.flavor: [She's late. Why are other people relaxing here!]
110212.name: Latecomer

110213.flavor: [The Morals Committee must set a good example at all times. Because of that, it always lacks members.]
110213.name: Prefect Layna

110214.flavor: [Lady Linia. How are you feeling today? I will prepare some warm tea for you.]
110214.name: Linia's Steward

110215.flavor: [I just need to stay still in this dress, right? I'm hungry, Vernika.]
110215.name: Wedding Sita

110216.flavor: [Oh, this... This is incredible. I never imagined that I would wear anything like this in my life.]
110216.name: Wedding Luthica

110217.flavor: [Sometimes, when I compare these with my drab clothes, I think gorgeous dresses aren't too bad. How do I look, Vernika? ... Never mind. I can't expect a decent answer from you right now...]
110217.name: Wedding Iri

110218.flavor: [Wearing a wedding dress is just like a dream. Cinia, please give my thanks to Linia.]
110218.name: Wedding Vernika

110219.flavor: [Sister, I only want to show this to you. I don't want to show this look to Cinia anymore...]
110219.name: Wedding Rose

110220.flavor: [This dress is a little different than I expected. Is this what you like? It's not too bad.  You're always full of good ideas, Linia.]
110220.name: Wedding Jaina

110221.flavor: [This dress was a payment from that wedding ceremony. It suits me, doesn't it? I want to show it to you, Luthica. You're the first girl I ever really liked.]
110221.name: Wedding Clarice

110222.flavor: [Thank you... I will never forget what you've done for me. This year's festival will be a day I never forget.]
110222.name: Wedding Rihanna

110223.flavor: [Are you really okay with me? Even if you say that... I'll help you out. From now on... I will entrust myself to your care.]
110223.name: Wedding Layna

110224.flavor: [I designed some new clothes. Will you try them on?]
110224.name: Linia's Tailor

110225.flavor: [Ahem! Are you ignoring me because of my age? Your attitude angers me. Show some respect!]
110225.name: Child Cinia

110226.flavor: [I do not normally wear dresses like these, but if I was to attend your party, I suppose it could not be helped.]
110226.name: Dress Cinia

110227.flavor: [Checkmate. Is that all you had? Ah... This opponent disappoints me. Not interesting at all. Isn't there anyone who can give me a challenge like my sister?]
110227.name: Chess Cinia

110228.flavor: [This is nothing compared to my own estate, but it isn't so bad. I can give you a pass.]
110228.name: Swimwear Cinia

110229.flavor: [So this is a public school uniform? It's splendid! This is an excellent design for ordinary people...]
110229.name: Visitor Cinia

110230.flavor: [I don't care for white, but this dress isn't bad... Oh, no! Of course it was a good idea, Linia.]
110230.name: Wedding Cinia

110231.flavor: [How quaint! This is quite different from the mansion's bathrooms. Excellent. I didn't come in vain.]
110231.name: Hot Springs Cinia

110232.flavor: [Christmas? A day where people exchange gifts? I don't care about that. This is just some clothes that Linia made me wear.]
110232.name: Santa Cinia

110233.flavor: [Linia became the chairman of the Royle Academy.  Cinia ran for and won the presidency. She had an arrogant look to her as if this was only natural, but something was out of place.]
110233.name: President Cinia

110234.flavor: [I'm number 2? I resent that. I won't acknowledge someone like Falco. I'm number 1.]
110234.name: Witch Cadet Fade

110235.flavor: [If someone is going to be called a queen, they'd better be dazzling. She calls herself a queen, but I beg to differ.]
110235.name: Palomporom

110236.flavor: [Who are you guys? You can't just come and go from here as you please.]
110236.name: Lib. Explorer Jier

110237.flavor: [You think you can just force your way in? I'm calling the librarian.]
110237.name: Jier Pris

110238.flavor: [I'm here to explore this place. If you don't have any business here, you need to leave.]
110238.name: Lib. Explorer Sia

110239.flavor: [You got permission from the librarian? If you're not here to find a book, then what are you looking for?]
110239.name: Sia Aka

110240.flavor: [I ended up really deep here looking for rare books. Do you know the way out?]
110240.name: Lib. Explorer Kanei

110241.flavor: [Sometimes I lose my way, but I feel better with the librarian around, you know?]
110241.name: Shawn Kanei

110242.flavor: [If you're not an explorer, leave! This isn't a place that just anyone can enter.]
110242.name: Lib. Explorer

110243.flavor: [Seems like warning you wasn't enough. I don't care who you are. I'll make you leave!]
110243.name: Lib. Explorer Ritana

110244.flavor: [Didn't you hear from the head knight? This place is under investigation by the Crux Knights.]
110244.name: Tactician Knight

110245.flavor: [Anyone who isn't a knight should leave. If you refuse, I'll force you to leave.]
110245.name: Tactician Bermin

110246.flavor: [What could the knights be looking for here? I have to find out.]
110246.name: Witch Cadet

110247.flavor: [I don't care if you're not a knight. You're in the way of my investigation.]
110247.name: Witch Cadet Zislana

110248.flavor: [So the Crux Knights are here? Well, that's fine. It'll be fun.]
110248.name: GS 5th Star

110249.flavor: [Heheh. Ahaha. Could it be that I'm about to obtain that which that our great leader desires? Hm? Do we still have some little insects left?]
110249.name: GS 5th Star

110250.flavor: [I am Constable E-ROMA of the Royle Police. Your cooperation would be appreciated.]
110250.name: RPD Constable

110251.flavor: [The suspected kidnapper and the kidnapped child... Could this be the same person that A-GA is looking for? I need to investigate further.]
110251.name: Constable E-ROMA

110252.flavor: [I am Corporal Vedia of the Royle Police. Let's do this peacefully. Whatever it is you're hiding, take it out. Hurry up.]
110252.name: RPD Corporal

110253.flavor: [This kidnapping incident comes out of nowhere, and now we're on a huge manhunt. What's going on?]
110253.name: Corporal Vedia

110254.flavor: [I'm Corporal... No, Sergeant Cisela of the Royle Police. I'm still not used to this rank... Anyway, your cooperation would be appreciated.]
110254.name: RPD Sergeant

110255.flavor: [What are E-ROMA and Vedia so curious about? If you just do as you're told, everything will be alright...]
110255.name: Sergeant Cisela

110271.flavor: [This report contains all of my feelings!]
110271.name: Dress Up Smartylane

110272.flavor: [Huh? I look younger? I was always young!]
110272.name: Musiciter Smartylane

110273.flavor: [I still need more power to protect my friends.]
110273.name: Dress Up Lucerrie

110274.flavor: [With this power, I can protect my friends!]
110274.name: Musiciter Lucerrie

120001.flavor: [You stand at a crossroads, traveler. What is your purpose?]
120001.name: Gold Lion Nold

120002.flavor: [Stupid humans! Let me show you the difference between us.]
120002.name: Queen Cannelle

120003.flavor: [Stars reveal the dreams of their watchers. My duty is to stand vigil over your dreams.]
120003.name: Star Bird Gart

120004.flavor: [Do you really think you can stand on the stage of destiny with that kind of ability? This isn't the climax yet!]
120004.name: Twilight Wolf Ginger

120005.flavor: [Heh... I'm not interested in real fights, but since you already paid me, I'll do my best. So, who's the target?]
120005.name: Flame Laevateinn

120006.flavor: [Entertain us! We want something more interesting! We'll give you one last chance!  What's your final answer?]
120006.name: Trickster Twins

120007.flavor: [I cannot let you act this way any longer. What do you want to know, Linia, eldest daughter of the Pacifica family?] [I have everything I need. I am merely waiting for the right time.]
120007.name: Pegasus Sigma

120008.flavor: [Take me for a walk! Stupid human! Don't you know where I'm from?]
120008.name: Cinia's Pet Panica

120009.flavor: [Let's start the game. You'll hide. I'll seek. What's wrong? You're ruining the fun... Put some enthusiasm into it! Cry! Scream! ... die.]
120009.name: Artificial Vampire

120010.flavor: [Don't compare me to that pitiful imitation. Well, no matter. I'm just wondering about the taste of your blood.]
120010.name: True Vampire God

120011.flavor: [Did you see... the past? The path you walked... The paths of your acquaintances... I will test your right to continue walking into the future!]
120011.name: Shining Form Nexia

120012.flavor: [Boys, be ambitious!] [This is a... girls' school.]
120012.name: Vita Principal

120013.flavor: [I feel awful. Why am I unloved? I just want someone by my side. I'd give everything just to be with someone. I can't be saved from my loneliness.]
120013.name: Vernika's Sorrow

120014.flavor: [Your wishes will come true some day. Why not today?]
120014.name: Rio

120015.flavor: [Welcome to the Nether Train Station. The train will depart in 30 seconds.] [Have you seen a girl named Vernika?] [Vernika? I saw her; she didn't have a ticket, so she couldn't board.] [What?]
120015.name: Queen Ereshkigal

120016.flavor: [Guard your faith. I will protect your faith. God will protect us.]
120016.name: Apostle L Red Sun

120017.flavor: [The aloof head knight looks uncomfortable as she stands alone. The parrot on her shoulder speaks for her.]
120017.name: Eisenwane

120018.flavor: [Won't you play with me, Little Miss Detective? If you beat me, I'll tell you something. I know something you don't know.]
120018.name: 2S Tracer Four

120019.flavor: [Not bad. Now play time is over. I will demonstrate to you why I am called the Lightning Wolf.]
120019.name: Leilang Henlifei

120021.flavor: [Meooow.] [The instant you thought of picking up the cat, its necklace began to glow.]
120021.name: Magicat

120022.flavor: [What impertinence is this, coming here without my permission? Would you kindly disappear from my paradise?]
120022.name: Witch Queen Linia

120023.flavor: [Who knocks at the altar's door? The ritual requires a key.]
120023.name: Spirit Amrita

120024.flavor: [Amrita? Who are you? Did you awaken me? My name is... Soma. I am the key to the door.]
120024.name: Soma

120025.flavor: [I'm Chief Celesti of the Royle Police. I need your cooperation for my current task... What are you doing? Let's go already.]
120025.name: Royle Police Chief

120027.flavor: [One day, an evil force that nobody had ever seen before appeared. Everyone called it the Black Lion, and it somehow resembled Nold.]
120027.name: Black Lion

120028.flavor: [Welcome to Musiciter Land. However, the person you're looking for isn't here.]
120028.name: Codename Q.B.

200001.flavor: [I don’t think Sita has an ounce of mercy in her. She’s just going to chop its head off while it’s staring her in the eye like it’s nothing. How can she be so cutthroat?] [... It's just a fish.]
200001.name: Heartless Blow

200002.flavor: [Welcome to your new school, Sita!] [... Okay.]
200002.name: Student Orientation

200003.flavor: [Another failure...] [How did you even make it explode like that?]
200003.name: Cooking Failure

200004.flavor: [As soon as Sita touched the Scarlet Mage's ward, it shattered like glass.]
200004.name: Ward Rupture

200005.flavor: [Everyone else can only make cookies... Well, I will cook something new!]
200005.name: New Recipe

200006.flavor: [Did you ever feel like you had a headache because something was too big? What would happen if that something became smaller? Hm? Which thing? Oh, I was talking about you.]
200006.name: Shrink

200007.flavor: [Everything will lose meaning and become equal. You, me, and everything that exists.]
200007.name: Balance

200008.flavor: [That's why the Federation issued a wanted poster for the Scarlet Mage! What do you think? Don't you think something exciting is going to happen, Sita?]
200008.name: Rumored Order

200009.flavor: [This isn't bad...] [Uh... That's supposed to be for animals.]
200009.name: Omnivore

200010.flavor: [Spicy!] [Oh, fantastic. I'm glad you liked it.]
200010.name: Volcano

200012.flavor: [Your first task is to learn the layout of the building. Understood?] [Yes, senpai!]
200012.name: New Maid Training

200013.flavor: [I... I didn't do it! It was her! I swear by my master's name that she broke it!] [I'm your master...]
200013.name: She Did It

200014.flavor: [Who will bell the cat? To place Cinia's shoes upon her feet is an essential display of respect from her maids.]
200014.name: Noble Sacrifice

200015.flavor: [I have to ensure that Rose reaches the destination safe and sound. This must be a very important appointment.]
200015.name: Tighten Security

200016.flavor: [Now I've got you! You'll never escape these chains!]
200016.name: Bondage

200017.flavor: [The basic principle of curses is to consider your opponent to be weaker than you. Miss Cinia has excellent talent with curses, since she considers everyone in the world to be beneath her.]
200017.name: Curse

200018.flavor: [The basic principle of fighting is understanding your strengths, as well as your enemy's. Huh? Weaknesses? Those don't matter. I just take the strengths anyway.]
200018.name: Swap Spell

200019.flavor: [Let's go back. The tea and cookies are ready. Tea time!]
200019.name: Mass Recall

200020.flavor: [We saw the Scarlet Mage just as he got off the stairs. The entrance to the ruins lay just beyond. Everyone, including myself, was suddenly struck down. There was a flash of light and a crack of thunder, then only pain... We were helpless.]
200020.name: Forced Entry

200021.flavor: [A warrior's determination must not waver! Strengthen your will!]
200021.name: Saint's Blessing

200022.flavor: [The vampire called out from behind her. "Are you looking for the master of the Flinas? I can guide you if you want. Heh... Of course, I can't promise that I won't want a snack along the way!"]
200022.name: Close Encounter

200023.flavor: [What? Why can't we enter?] [New orders from Crux. No one is allowed to enter the country.]
200023.name: Entry Denied

200024.flavor: [The basic principle of healing magic is to have a strong will. Picture something you want to protect, then cast the spell.]
200024.name: Healing Magic

200025.flavor: [The unidentified falling object turned out to be a girl. Luthica looked for a magical necklace to explain how the girl could fly, but she did not find one.]
200025.name: Sky Surprise

200026.flavor: [We're only able to relax and enjoy life thanks to the hard work of the knights. Never forget all the effort it took to win this peace.]
200026.name: Meadow Leisure

200027.flavor: [There is something strange about all these countries closing their borders. It's like someone trying to dam up every branch in a river... Please deliver this letter to the Empire immediately.]
200027.name: Knight's Letter

200028.flavor: [My sword can't possibly be this blunt!] [Aah! Senpai! Our equipment!]
200028.name: Shield Break

200029.flavor: [Please, tell me... Exactly what kind of monster did the Scarlet Mage summon?]
200029.name: Sentry's Testimony

200030.flavor: [Still, it's best to have peace, isn't it?]
200030.name: Pacifism

200031.flavor: [Members of the Flina family, Master Luna Flina's words are absolute. Every sentence she utters carries as much power as a spell.]
200031.name: Flina's Command

200032.flavor: [A reversal of blood flow... This is how we describe it. It's hard to fully explain, but it's a state of extreme fury.]
200032.name: Blood Reversal

200033.flavor: [What? What did you think vampiric rites looked like? I don't drink my blood like some kind of savage.]
200033.name: Vampiric Rites

200034.flavor: [Please don't dismiss the drinking of blood as a crude act. We know the value of blood better than anyone else.]
200034.name: Blood Target

200035.flavor: [There's no better sacrifice than this... This is a sacrifice worthy of a god... How does this sound? Would you like to have a try? To watch yourself drinking your own blood...]
200035.name: Sacrifice

200036.flavor: [When the full moon rises, there will be perfect harmony between the moon and the power of darkness.]
200036.name: Full Moon Power

200038.flavor: [Go screw yourself... Get out of my way. Stop dripping that disgusting rotten blood and just go away.]
200038.name: Overwhelm

200039.flavor: [Wasn't it decided that we would unite, since it's impossible to co-exist with the light? Why are you so scared of yourselves and the existence of others?]
200039.name: Forced Confinement

200040.flavor: [Everything will be drained... Everything this eye sees will die... It doesn't matter if it's friend or foe. It won't show mercy to anyone... Augh... Run!]
200040.name: Evil Eye

200041.flavor: [The heavens call! The earth cries out! The crowds roar... All calling on me to strike back against evil! Now listen up, delinquents! I'm the champion of justice! Student! Council! Inspector!]
200041.name: Council Justice

200043.flavor: [Hey! You need to actually check that out!]
200043.name: Book Thief

200044.flavor: [There are still so many books... I started working at the library to read books, not organize them...]
200044.name: Tower of Books

200046.flavor: [Vernika, Vernika... These... Can I eat them all?]
200046.name: Feast

200048.flavor: [Miss Cinia! Spare me!] [There is no cause for concern. I am merely turning you into a frog for a little while. I will change you back very soon.] [Nooo!]
200048.name: Unwilling Sacrifice

200050.flavor: [They were always worried about how to preserve their superior bloodline... And this was their solution. Unfortunately, the results were disastrous. No more sons would ever be born.]
200050.name: Lineage Maintenance

200051.flavor: [The magic stone of the Mother Demon has been discovered.]
200051.name: Magic Stone Found

200052.flavor: [The Academy sent us an invitation to the Magic Society. Sita, Vernika, you girls are kind of famous. If you're interested, let's go together.]
200052.name: Magic Society Invite

200053.flavor: [Foreword omitted. Dear Cinia Pacifica. How are you? I will be attending the Magic Society meeting as well.]
200053.name: Sister's Letter

200054.flavor: [Rose...] [Could you not say anything else for now? I feel so sorry for hiding this from you, my precious sister... But please forgive me.]
200054.name: Dark Secret

200055.flavor: [Hold your swords! A Crux Knight is always ready for a glorious death!]
200055.name: No Turning Back

200056.flavor: [At last! I finally became a Crux Knight!]
200056.name: Sense of Belonging

200057.flavor: [At least you can drink some tea. It's too bad you always have to sit like that. How about going outside and getting some fresh air?]
