200057.name: Study of Miracles

200058.flavor: [This is something that can cut through the invisible link between cause and effect. Isn't this sickle the proof of the ancient visitors' victory?]
200058.name: Proof of Miracles

200059.flavor: [I just need to deliver this, right? It can't be late, right? Okay, got it, Miss Jaina! For the glory of the knights!]
200059.name: Quick Service

200060.flavor: [Welcome, my future friends! The mother of all darkness, the Mother Demon, is making her return. Aren't you interested? Why am I calling you a friend? You haven't died yet? Well, you'll all die someday.]
200060.name: Mother Demon Rumor

200061.flavor: [I'll use my power to create an opening! Take that opportunity and attack the monster with everything you've got!]
200061.name: Luthica's Ward

200062.flavor: [Hmm... It's a little tight around the chest... And loose around the waist...] [Okay, that's it! Give it back to me! Now!]
200062.name: Spell Change

200063.flavor: [Really... I told you not to drag me into your tasteless jokes!]
200063.name: Prank's Price

200064.flavor: [Witches are born in the Witch Garden. Those who inherit the blood of witches have the potential to become witches themselves.]
200064.name: Strega Blood

200065.flavor: [In the end, what all we witches long for...  is the same thing... A place full of sunshine where we can spend time together, with warm tea and a cool breeze... However...]
200065.name: Strega Blade

200066.flavor: [This is the so-called Witch's Tower... It doesn't look like anything but a house.]
200066.name: Tower Visitor

200067.flavor: [As a host, I have an obligation to teach you how to become an elegant vampire.]
200067.name: Vampiric Education

200068.flavor: [Be warned. Some day, you will pay for this.]
200068.name: Fatal Blow

200069.flavor: [Sita, we have to thank everyone for their hard work. Please repeat after me. Good job!]
200069.name: Good Job

200070.flavor: [Cinia, please come closer! We can't both fit in the frame like this.] [Lu... Luthica, this is too close... Your che...st...]
200070.name: Thank You

200071.flavor: [I don't expect you to understand why I went through the trouble to sneak in here to just to say this, but I'm... pleased to meet you...]
200071.name: Pleased to Meet You

200072.flavor: [Your magic is channeled through your racket. Without your racket, your magic is useless, isn't it?]
200072.name: Cord Ball

200073.flavor: [You can count on me for things like this, but if you think I don't have anything better to do than help you, you're wrong. You're from the Academy? So in your dreams, you saw a place called Kana, and you want to know more about it. Kana... It's a mysterious place. I've heard about it too. Okay. I'll look into it immediately.]
200073.name: Troubleshooting

200074.flavor: [I just need to use this racket to get the ball into the other side of the court, right? That rule may be set in stone, but I didn't hear anything in the rules about how I'm allowed to do it.]
200074.name: Court Jester

200075.flavor: [You understand Rio, who acts like she knows everything, so why can't you understand a sage like me? There... are no words. Why don't you get it? Tell me the truth, Ophelia. Are you serious, Ophelia, or are you just making fun of me?!]
200075.name: Sage's Sermon

200076.flavor: [Okay, let's see... While you're just sitting there drinking tea... Heh...]
200076.name: Shameless Ambition

200077.flavor: [Sita, come here... I can't bear this any longer... Be with me... I want to carve everything about me into those golden apples you have for eyes... Sounds delicious... I want to know everything about you, Sita... Give yourself to me.]
200077.name: Night's Beckoning

200078.flavor: [The gate appeared, but it was a little different from the rifts that the monsters came through. Those other rifts opened hastily, but this one looked more proper. From the gate, a woman in white appeared. - Esprit's Memo]
200078.name: Visitor

200079.flavor: [The flash that pierces the heavens! Finally! With this power, I'll reclaim my freedom!]
200079.name: Black Magic Plot

200080.flavor: [Th-That's a lie... It was Jaina? No way... I've got to calm down. I must have misunderstood.]
200080.name: Unmasked Lie

200081.flavor: [Don't be so unreasonable, Miss Cinia. Shouldn't you at least listen to our requests? If we don't work, you will be in trouble as well, Miss Cinia.] [Strike? Maids? I simply do not understand.]
200081.name: Bargaining Table

200082.flavor: [Comply with legal working hours! Raise our salaries! Give us at least one day of paid time off per month!]
200082.name: Maid Revolution

200083.flavor: [Put that fire out immediately!] [W-Wait... I never learned any extinguishing spells, Miss Cinia!]
200083.name: Suicide Mission

200084.flavor: [Sorry, Miss Linia... I'm always making mistakes.] [No problem. Things will be just fine. You can fix it later, but how about spending some time with me first? I miss having company.]
200084.name: Linia's Tastes

200085.flavor: [Mind your manners. Don't give Cinia any more trouble.]
200085.name: Say No Evil

200086.flavor: [This clock-shaped artifact is a device used to communicate with headquarters. It's said that under certain circumstances, it has another function, but for the time being, no one has ever used it.]
200086.name: Chrono Clock

200087.flavor: [The director's ultimate artifact. It's more powerful than anything ever before. The ability to control that power is one of the director's greatest skills.]
200087.name: Power Control

200088.flavor: [What if someone recognizes me? I'm so nervous... Jaina, please give me courage.]
200088.name: Undercover Work

200089.flavor: [Didn't you come here because you were looking for something, hero of Vita? I believe you can find the answer in Crux.]
200089.name: Conversion

200090.flavor: [This joke went too far. Those girls need a lesson. Rio thought Crux would protect her, but they were sloppy and let those two little vampires through. I'm disappointed, Jaina.]
200090.name: Recluse

200091.flavor: [You're under arrest for consorting with vampires and bringing harm to human beings.] [I can't believe this. Jaina!]
200091.name: Arrest

200092.flavor: [No need to worry. Heretics will be expelled from this land. The decision has been made. Now go and assemble the knights. I will remove the witches and vampires with my own two hands.]
200092.name: Crux Command

200093.flavor: [The dolls just keep coming... Aah! The strings are tangled again! Come on, help me out!]
200093.name: Dollmaster

200094.flavor: [Which is tastier? This apple is for someone important, so it needs to be made with great care.]
200094.name: Bad Apple

200095.flavor: [None of my dolls are failures. They're all facets of myself.]
200095.name: Midnight Doll Show

200096.flavor: [K-Kana... wasn’t just... a place.] [You have learned too much. Kana is something that must be guarded. Do not approach it so carelessly.]
200096.name: Misfortune

200097.flavor: [I understand you quite well. A marginalized existence. The warmth desired by an unwanted entity, and those emotions that can never be buried. Do not feel regret. You deserve that girl.]
200097.name: Alluring Whisper

200098.flavor: [In that moment, my mind went blank. Even though I had the strength to stand before the Elders, my will shattered. The only thing left of me was another self, driven by a terrible thirst and loneliness.]
200098.name: Impulse

200099.flavor: [When Vernika became a vampire, her magic surpassed the realm of reality and imagination. Images from the world within her heart began to spill over into reality. Vernika now absent-mindedly waits for Sita in the withered garden.]
200099.name: Vernika's World

200100.flavor: [Our school uniforms just don't make any sense! Uniforms like these need to be redone!]
200100.name: Uniform Tweak

200101.flavor: [(555) 800-8135...! Change! Dress Up! Break the chains of destiny!]
200101.name: Dress Up Change

200102.flavor: [The whole world is waiting for me beyond this wall! I'll be back, Asmis!]
200102.name: Over the Wall

200103.flavor: [Battles are always necessary to achieve goals, and I am up to the challenge! For the Pacifica family, this place will become a living hell!]
200103.name: Unionize

200104.flavor: [Are all the cookies ready? And the fruit? That fickle lady suddenly wanted us to go on a picnic... Ugh. Now this kitchen is a mess! After all this work is done, I'm going to need a cold drink.]
200104.name: Tea Time

200105.flavor: [Hmm... Those goals you speak of are nonsense. I will adjust them for you.]
200105.name: Adjustment

200107.flavor: [This research never ends... Can anyone promise me that, after this, I can have a decent night's sleep?]
200107.name: Brilliant Brain

200108.flavor: [The vision, the land without lies, enthralls me. This is the place where I will find the truth.]
200108.name: Vivid World of Kana

200109.flavor: [... This is really hard to solve. Is this even possible?]
200109.name: The Crescent Enigmas

200110.flavor: [This is the rite for becoming a real vampire. I have to endure this.]
200110.name: Scardel Rite

200111.flavor: [This long-awaited final question has been the most difficult question for three generations of Crescents. Will Conundrum figure out the answer?]
200111.name: Final Answer

200112.flavor: [I need that sword... I don't ever want to see Vernika like she is now!] [Sita?!]
200112.name: Seize

200113.flavor: [These magic lenses, the Medusa Glasses, augment the user's visual perception greatly; They can even grab arrows out of the air with their bare hands.]
200113.name: Medusa Glasses

200114.flavor: [I... I can't go back with these grades! Please give me another chance!]
200114.name: Comparison

200115.flavor: [N-Nanai? Please stop hurting me like this... Please... *sob* My world is falling apart.]
200115.name: Breakdown

200116.flavor: [I need to make a campaign plan... I have to get elected... I can't sleep here... Zzz]
200116.name: Spring Fever

200117.flavor: [I just need a few tricks to tie up Celine's supporters.]
200117.name: Absolute Control

200118.flavor: [As long as I know this, I can't pretend to know nothing. Be warned, Nanai.] [Whatever.]
200118.name: One Way Trip

200119.flavor: [The best part of a work day is the end.]
200119.name: Shift Change

200121.flavor: [It's been a long time since Cinia came to visit! Make sure nothing goes wrong!]
200121.name: Refreshments

200122.flavor: [D-Don't think I'm easy to win over! I'm only going to your house so I can conquer it... Whatever. Let's go.]
200122.name: Obedience

200123.flavor: [Stars. Flame. The time has come for ruin to visit this land. Heavens... Fall!]
200123.name: Meteor Call

200124.flavor: [In the name of maids everywhere, I will protect Miss Cinia with my life!]
200124.name: Servant's Ward

200125.flavor: [Big sister... What is the truth? Now... I can't trust anyone. Everything sickens me, even the blood in my veins.]
200125.name: Doubt

200126.flavor: [The chrono clock's true power is to grant acceleration. This power, "Clock Up", allows its user's speed to exceed the limits of the human body for ten seconds.]
200126.name: Fast Forward

200127.flavor: [Those who can cut are those with the will to cut.]
200127.name: Cross Cut

200128.flavor: [Linia, these days, I have been feeling strange. I feel that the decisions I make are not my own. Something is eating away at me, as if someone were emerging from inside my consciousness.]
200128.name: Planned Misfortune

200129.flavor: [You think there's a new group of vigilantes trying to exterminate the night? How about you buy me another drink and I'll tell you more about it? Haha...]
200129.name: Azure Cross Meeting

200130.flavor: [Clarice! You're amazing! How did you break me out?] [There is nothing I cannot do! Everything I wish for becomes reality! I did a good job, right Luthica?]
200130.name: Escape

200131.flavor: [These three swords were passed down generation to generation in the house of Pacifica. Cinia owns one of them. That sword has the power to change the past. What do you think? Even Jaina has never heard about this.]
200131.name: False Delivery

200132.flavor: [I loved this place... Crux. The weather is lovely again today. Jaina... No. This place is too good for her.]
200132.name: Comeback

200133.flavor: [Today, I wish for all soldiers, as members of the great GS, to continue to battle with excellence!] [Yeah!]
200133.name: Dark Meeting

200134.flavor: [Fall in! For world conquest! All hail our great leader! For squid and beer! For punch and pie!]
200134.name: Dark Convocation

200135.flavor: [Now I understand... This is blood? Hee hee.. Looks delicious. It's sweet. Hahaha...]
200135.name: Pupil Becomes Master

200136.flavor: [When she does that work of hers, she always wears white. She thinks everything looks more beautiful when splattered with blood, such as that person lying on the ground over there. Look for Secret Service Agent Ten. That's me.]
200136.name: Agent Visit

200137.flavor: [Who are we? Two vampire detectives who have become one! Dress Up Ride! Tension Fortissimo!]
200137.name: Dress Up Ride

200138.flavor: [The reason why I remain neutral is to maintain the balance of power.]
200138.name: Tranquility

200139.flavor: [Tell me where the head of the Flina family is. In the meantime, I'm taking all the blood you have to drink... Hee hee hee.]
200139.name: Night Conqueror

200140.flavor: [The girls' first challenge. An album of their songs, filled with sincerity. Listen to it! Summer Machine Gun!]
200140.name: Summer Machine Gun

200141.flavor: [Even speed like that can't escape the sight of the Medusa Glasses.]
200141.name: Detection

200142.flavor: [We're the Golden Pair that will lead Vita to the nationals! Off to the nationals!]
200142.name: Golden Pair

200143.flavor: [Fault! Rhona's serve has failed! The nationals are coming down to this! This is a crisis for Rhona!]
200143.name: Fault

200144.flavor: [You're always like this, President! Everything has to go your way! You never listen to what we have to say!]
200144.name: Infighting

200145.flavor: [Nanai!] [You don't deserve to be president, Celine. That position belongs to me.]
200145.name: Minds in Conflict

200146.flavor: [Step aside. There's no time. Gotta get to Vernika...  Gotta put you down to make it in time... Secret Art: Gale Flash!]
200146.name: Secret Art: Gale Flash

200147.flavor: [Cinia, it is important to consider how others feel. How would you feel if you were in your servants' shoes?]
200147.name: Home Study

200148.flavor: [Miss Cinia, please react more quickly!] [You... Do not expect to be forgiven tomorrow!]
200148.name: Maid Experience

200150.flavor: [From today forth, I will be your master. Are you excited about our future together?]
200150.name: Meeting Master

200151.flavor: [Ah, Cinia. Hold me...] [Fascinating. You call out for another girl even while you're in my arms?]
200151.name: Comfort

200152.flavor: [I can't trust anyone anymore. If you want to live, get away from me.]
200152.name: Curse of Distrust

200153.flavor: [There is nothing left to believe in. Hope is useless. People are useless. Everything is useless. Time Stop... Die.]
200153.name: El Mundo

200154.flavor: [All for one and one for all! Our bond of faith grants us strength!]
200154.name: Unity March

200155.flavor: [I didn't know its name, but I had never seen such a beautiful flower.]
200155.name: A Single Flower

200156.flavor: [The flash of a shield protects the will of the knights!]
200156.name: Protective Chant

200157.flavor: [Suddenly, one thought entered Pintail's mind. "... Breathe... Everything... has its own vibration."]
200157.name: Blossoming Skill

200158.flavor: [This was the first time the side effects of talentium were seen. In Jaina's letter, she described talentium's true appearance. - Creuset's Experiment Notes]
200158.name: Degradation

200159.flavor: ["I need to find myself," said Sergeant Pintail. To find her own path, she took fourteen nights and fifteen days off. Her destination was H.K.]
200159.name: Pilgrimage of Proof

200160.flavor: [There is no one in this land that I would consider an ally. Not anymore. Clarice, please stay by my side.]
200160.name: Sword That Cleaves Evil

200161.flavor: [Where does it hurt? Hm... Here? Alright... Hah! How's that? Does it still hurt?]
200161.name: Doctor Play

200162.flavor: [The time has come for the balance of the night to be restructured. Who is the true master of night? We will ask the stars.]
200162.name: Tick Time

200163.flavor: [You have two hours, thirty-seven minutes, and thirty-five seconds to resolve today's incident. Despair waits for you at the finish line.]
200163.name: Maximum Drive

200164.flavor: [At the very moment when Conundrum chose her answer, a voice cried out. "Hold it!"]
200164.name: Intrusion

200165.flavor: [Ah... So you're Iri's servant? Fascinating... Bring me your master. You are not worthy.] [Hahaha... A servant? Me? Don't be ridiculous. I'm the master here... Understand?]
200165.name: Absolute Power

200166.flavor: [Cannelle was born in the wild. As a child of nature, she couldn't adjust to a life stuck in a mansion. "I want to go back..."]
200166.name: Misfit

200167.flavor: [A single slash that destroys the silence.]
200167.name: Lago de Cisnes

200168.flavor: [Although Vernika dreamed of a day after everything was over, when everyone could smile and laugh together, her dream vanished.]
200168.name: Dream Conversation

200172.flavor: [There's going to be such a huuuge crowd. Please follow your orders exactly! You girls will behave, right?]
200172.name: Event Preparation

200173.flavor: [I'll finish this in the next seven serves. Long matches are bad for health.]
200173.name: Victory Proclamation

200174.flavor: [The cooking contest would determine the direction of the club's festival event. Their techniques would be put to the test, with the winner deciding the menu.]
200174.name: Topsy Turvy

200176.flavor: [The inspector loves peace, believes in friendship, and wishes to protect peoples' lives, so she stands against rule breakers as an extracurricular activity.]
200176.name: Preserver of Rules

200177.flavor: [A human life is deeper than the ocean. A human's love is higher than the mountains. To those who don't understand this, look to tomorrow and see! Emergency! Target point 4 8 5! Geo Scud Launch, Go!]
200177.name: Morals Crackdown

200178.flavor: [Vernika. Why are you standing there like that?] [Sita... Come here.] [I'll bring the old Vernika back. I don't care what this magic sword takes from me, whether it's my eyes or my arms. It can take everything if I can save her.]
200178.name: Encounter

200179.flavor: [I will not tolerate even a single speck of dirt in my house.]
200179.name: Pursuit of Perfection

200180.flavor: [The influence of the witches grows underground every day. Before long, the day when they march over the continent in the Witch Queen's name will come.]
200180.name: Black Magic Preparation

200181.flavor: [What the... How?! How did this happen?!]
200181.name: Lady's Wrath

200182.flavor: [The lady spiked the ball into the opponent's court! She scores a point!]
200182.name: Shoot

200183.flavor: [It's been a while, Master Clarice. I acquired every ingredient you requested. How is your next experiment going?]
200183.name: Servant of Clarice

200184.flavor: [Keep the skirt free of wrinkles. Make sure the lace doesn't flutter. Calmly maintaining a lady's appearance is an attendant's basic responsibility.]
200184.name: Lady's Attendant

200185.flavor: [There is no need to run around. I will go directly to Linia and ask her myself.]
200185.name: Push Forward

200186.flavor: [I'll have to do this later. Putting today's work off for tomorrow... If you procrastinate, it just snowballs out of control and the sleepless nights will continue.]
200186.name: Supply Request

200187.flavor: [Why does this same mistake keep getting made? Our predecessors made the mistake, and now their replacements are making the same mistake! What will we do if the mistake just keeps getting passed down?]
200187.name: Miscalculation

200188.flavor: [Oh, welcome. If you tell me the right number, I'll send you on your way.]
200188.name: Passcode

200189.flavor: [You always pick great places to go, Sergeant! This place is great!]
200189.name: Vacation

200190.flavor: [I will defend this land! I swear on my life!]
200190.name: Warrior's Resolve

200191.flavor: [There might be an artifact here! Give it your best and find out!]
200191.name: Beach Research

200192.flavor: [Who are you?] [I am the GS First Star, and I've come to unravel the lies of Crux's goddess.] [Lies?] [The goddess twists time and resorts to tricks. The land's time is out of alignment.]
200192.name: Shock

200193.flavor: [GS is prepared. The moment their leader gives the order, they will move as one towards Crux. No one knows the underground labyrinth like they do.]
200193.name: Crux Underground

200194.flavor: [Recruiting potential GS members! We have no interest in ordinary humans. If there are any skilled Talentium Adepts with the ambition to change the world with their own power, come join us. That is all!]
200194.name: Recruitment Ad

200195.flavor: [You may make me move any way you wish. However, do not approach. Use your eyes only.]
200195.name: Marionette

200196.flavor: [Th-this joke went too far!] [So what? It's just a joke.]
200196.name: Mischief

200197.flavor: [Soldiers. Night comes! First Star will be the vanguard, and Colonel Z will command! All GS within the Federation will immediately head toward Crux.]
200197.name: Night is Coming

200198.flavor: [What? Why do we drink blood? If we knew another way to refill our power, then we wouldn't have to, but we don't know any other way.]
200198.name: Query

200199.flavor: [I am Jaina Preventer, leader of the Crux Knights. I am here to cleanse this land of abominations.] [... Step aside. I have to find Vernika.]
200199.name: Showdown

200200.flavor: [This Material used to be used to craft Morning Characters. Now it's moldy and gross. Still, if the Morning Characters come back some day, it's worth hanging onto.] [Have you ever... received these? I have, but they didn't make me happy. Those twins are awful... Moldy chocolate is disgusting, and not even Sita will eat it. - Esprit's Complaint]
200200.name: Moldy Chocolate

200201.flavor: [Vita Public High School official merchandise. A cute keychain featuring the principal.]
200201.name: Hot Item

200202.flavor: [The visitor was a man in red. I don't know what "Kana" was, but he was looking for the same thing you were. He seemed anxious. He was also carrying another "key."]
200202.name: Principal's Story

200203.flavor: [The vote to impeach Celine happened to coincide with the festival, so there was a low voter turnout. Nanai missed out on the opportunity of a lifetime.]
200203.name: Low Turnout

200204.flavor: [Cinia's sword, when used, would consume part of the wielder's body, but it had the power to turn anything back to an earlier state. However, the full truth was that it would return whatever it hit to nothingness. When Sita realized this, she tried to stop, but it was too late. Everything around her had already been ruined.]
200204.name: Shattered Land

200205.flavor: [Vernika was nowhere in the ruins of the buildings. Sita searched for a long time, but the all she could find were her glasses.]
200205.name: Keepsake

200206.flavor: [Practical advice. If furniture smells like varnish or desiccant, you can clean it with alcohol. The smell will be eliminated.]
200206.name: Everyday Discovery

200207.flavor: [Is this some kind of joke? Forget it. Negotiations are over! I refuse to work here a moment longer!]
200207.name: Negotiation Breakdown

200208.flavor: [With her hatred, Cinia's power grew enormously. Finally, Linia made her decision. She took control of Cinia's mind.]
200208.name: Inevitable Choice

200209.flavor: [The noble ladies of the Royle Academy do not merely partake in academic education. They learn about how to properly conduct their behavior as befits their station.]
200209.name: Table Manners

200210.flavor: [The Royle Private Academy. A garden of ladies.]
200210.name: Royle Academy

200211.flavor: [Even within Crux, opinions were greatly divided on the plan to deal with the Vampire Lands. However, Jaina's commitment was absolute.]
200211.name: Crux Conference

200212.flavor: [It's what's on the inside that counts. You can't see something that's right under your nose.]
200212.name: Enemy Within

200214.flavor: [This is too heavy, senpai.] [This isn't the only burden I have to deal with...] [What was that?] [Nothing...]
200214.name: Supply Transfer

200215.flavor: [To Jaina Preventer, leader of the Crux Knights. Your replacement will be arriving shortly. Enclosed are the proper documents to ensure a smooth transition.]
200215.name: Relieve Post

200216.flavor: [Isn't this exciting?] [It's a weird name, isn't it? Ninth Star?] [We don't know much about stuff on the outskirts of the Federation.]
200216.name: Stakeout

200217.flavor: [Those two have a powerful love for each other that manifests as a type of barrier magic. This "Heart Barrier" is usually used by couples with an intense love for each other. Ugh. Love. I'm going to destroy those stupid fantasies! - Esprit's Memo]
200217.name: Heart Barrier

200218.flavor: [The agent launched a flare. The red flare indicated that Crux had been devastated, but the objective was not found. The place the GS leader was looking for was not in Crux.]
200218.name: Flare

200220.flavor: [Iri fell to her knees before the shattered land. The strength left her legs, and the hole in her heart was filled with cold. The sudden loss of  Vernika overwhelmed her.]
200220.name: Devastation

200221.flavor: [Someone has interfered with this world as well. Did DTD do this? This kind of destruction isn't DND's style either, but this is still worrisome.]
200221.name: Ruin's End

200222.flavor: [This Premium Material is obtained in the Shop and is used to craft in the Science Lab.] [Because purified talentium becomes harder after heating, it requires careful magical working. Talentium of higher quality possesses more spiritual power, which results in better craftsmanship. - Esprit's Memo]
200222.name: Talentium Ingot

200223.flavor: [In her dreams, the beleaguered Vernika finally discovered herself. She was the cause of her own sorrow. When everything is said and done, people who can't do things can't, and people who can, can. - Esprit's Memo]
200223.name: Vernika's Nightmare

200224.flavor: [It felt as if the night sky within Vernika was growing darker.]
200224.name: Ominous Sky

200231.flavor: [The string of emotion. An artifact with two ends that are given to two different people. Each person feels the emotion they want the most. As the users reflect on their emotion, the enemy is influenced as well.]
200231.name: String of Emotion

200232.flavor: [I could never abandon my injured comrade! I refuse to leave this place without her at my side!]
200232.name: Fellowship

200239.flavor: [This suit actually makes Sita look like some kind of intellectual! Fashion Queen is going to be ours!] [I'm hungry, Vernika...] [Hang on just a little longer. You have to be a boy- Er, girl who can put up with hunger when style is on the line.]
200239.name: Sita's Suit

200240.flavor: [The artifact that Esprit found had amazing effects. It could reverse a person's personality. Sita, for example, became perky.]
200240.name: Perky Girl

200241.flavor: [Alright. Look over here! Good. Raise your eyes a little. Tres magnifique! Perfect! Let's go! Fashion Queen!] [Vernika, I wanna eat it! Hurry up.]
200241.name: Halloween Minidevil

200242.flavor: [You even look great in a suit! You're exceeding all my expectations, Cinia.] [L-Linia... What are you talking about?] [We aren't far from winning Fashion Queen.]
200242.name: Cinia's Suit

200243.flavor: [Amazing. The artifact even has the power to make Cinia do manual labor. - Esprit's memo]
200243.name: Diligent Girl

200244.flavor: [Perfect! Okay... Now stick out your tongue like you're licking off some blood!]
200244.name: Halloween Countess

200245.flavor: [Just like I thought. Luthica's proportions are perfect. This should be good enough to compete. Fashion Queen...] [What?]
200245.name: Luthica's Suit

200246.flavor: [Got a problem?] [Negative!] [Gather all my subordinates and all your superiors. Do you think I'm just playing around when I hit people? Do you think you get a free pass just because you're a sergeant, Pintail? - Witnessed by Esprit]
200246.name: The Hazing

200248.flavor: [The lower buttons were left unbuttoned to give her a rough and unpolished beauty, while the curvy waistline showcases the figure of a woman. The exposure proclaims that she's tough, but at the same time, shows her feminine beauty. These contrasting elements come together like magic to create impeccable style.]
200248.name: Iri's Suit

200249.flavor: ["Space is in your hands. Reach out and seize the universe! It's space time!" The first thing Iri did after she became immune to sunlight was to look up when the show about the masked rider would play.]
200249.name: Carefree Heart

200250.flavor: [Sage... why are you making me wear this?] [We're going to take the throne. We're going to win Fashion Queen.] [... huh?]
200250.name: Halloween Wolf

200252.flavor: [This room was filled with an aroma to comfort maids tired after a long day of work. It seemed a bit strange. What exactly was that scent that Linia brought?]
200252.name: Comfort Room

200253.flavor: [This shield of light would ensure that the Seekers' quest for knowledge could never be stopped.]
200253.name: Flash Shield

200254.flavor: [Unlike vampires, who can't survive outside the world of night, witches choose to live in the normal world, albeit in its shadows. From time to time, witches gather to brainstorm methods of gathering money and information. This event is the Strega Think Tank.]
200254.name: Strega Think Tank

200255.flavor: [I'll test you first. Try to break through my ward.]
200255.name: Rio's Ward

200256.flavor: [Looks like I can unlock some power too. Heh... The keyword is vital.]
200256.name: Origin Reader

200257.flavor: [Suddenly, strange visions Seven had never experienced flashed through her memory. "I see it!"]
200257.name: Awakened Lady

200258.flavor: [With my master's teachings and my master's sword, I will melt your defenses!]
200258.name: Meltdown

200259.flavor: [This is different from healing. It's restoration. It would be best described as restoring something to its original state.]
200259.name: Restored Origin

200260.flavor: [What do you think you're doing?!] [Sage Lady! Why are- Ow! Ow!]
200260.name: Sage's Slipper

200261.flavor: [The first failed. The second also failed. The third was a disaster as well. Every flag pole issued to her broke. By the time they had to march, she ran out of extras...]
200261.name: Third Impact

200262.flavor: [This is the righteous power of light!]
200262.name: Arc Light

200263.flavor: [Heeey honey. Wanna play? Just follow me.]
200263.name: Charming Aura

200264.flavor: [The energy of a curse attacked Nanai as she touched the book.] [Se... Seven?]
200264.name: Trap Book

200265.flavor: [To commemorate the start of a new student council, Celine moved the student council room to a new building outside the school.] [You have to put new wine in a new bottle, right?] [I don't even care about the budget!]
200265.name: Council Grand Opening

200266.flavor: [As... mis...] [Asmis received a note from Weekly, but when Asmis arrived after class, Weekly was already frozen.]
200266.name: Freezing Room

200267.flavor: [In the girls' new lockers, they found a letter and the signature hat of the witches.]
200267.name: Witch Cadet

200268.flavor: [This sword is magnificent as well, but something is missing. I would like to hold a sword even sharper and more beautiful.]
200268.name: Lady's Selection

200269.flavor: [Elberto Albershaw. The witch with a heart stone for an eye. She took the nobles' hands and asked, "Why do you hide? There are still witches that I do not know."]
200269.name: Elberto Impact

200270.flavor: [Her ability to handle artifacts is unparalleled. The title of Artificer isn't just for show.]
200270.name: Artificer

200271.flavor: [To hide a tree, go to the forest... Veltier gave Rose the idea of abandoning her own appearance. In order to avoid the eyes of Crux, she made her decision.]
200271.name: Joining the Knights

200272.flavor: [This place, where the pinwheel turns, is the domain of a god. What god, I do not yet know, but it is not the goddess of Crux.]
200272.name: Sanctuary Pillar

200273.flavor: [I'm throwing everything I have into my research. I'll show my true genius to those scientists who keep ignoring me.]
200273.name: Pointless Research

200274.flavor: [A ticket? This some kinda joke? Whaddaya mean, you don't got no money? Business is business! I ain't givin' you somethin' for nothin', kid!]
200274.name: Nether Deal

200275.flavor: [This will become a barrier. Place it in the basement corridor of the cathedral. This top that never stops spinning will seal the fate of Crux.]
200275.name: Cursed Totem

200276.flavor: [Found it. So it was in this place too. Just as I thought. These can be found all over the world!]
200276.name: Sacred Tutor

200277.flavor: [It's raining. Deja vu. I vaguely remember getting soaked by the rain before, but I must have repressed the memory...]
200277.name: Rainy Day

200278.flavor: [The messenger ran through the burning city's alleys looking for her fellow knights. She tried speaking to her compatriots lying in the streets, but there was no response. They were only corpses.]
200278.name: Flee

200279.flavor: [The sight of the burning city shook the First Star's heart. What would await her when this was over?]
200279.name: Burning Crusade

200280.flavor: [There are still many books that have never seen the light of day. Until I graduate, I will never stop exploring. I wonder if I'll ever graduate properly.]
200280.name: Library Explorer

200281.flavor: [I wish to cook with this knife that passed down by my parents! I wish to join the Cook Club!] [Do you like... cookies?] [The girl who always dreamed of being in the Cook Club was rudely awakened. The club's members only baked cookies.]
200281.name: Rookie's Debut

200282.flavor: [I saw it. It was huge, and black, and smooth. It was rigid, but it's faster than it looks... Scary.]
200282.name: Back from Below

200283.flavor: [Her power of perception is transcendent. Even without using her eyes, her intuition can alert her to the presence of people she would like.]
200283.name: Lady Radar

200284.flavor: [Cinia dreamt. It was a recollection of happier days. Days that Cinia and Panica spent together.]
200284.name: Strega's Memory

200285.flavor: [Personal feelings don't matter. It's just work. This is the 14th one... Looks important.]
200285.name: 14th Request

200286.flavor: [The seekers tested the newly-discovered artifact in a special area. During the week of testing, they all went mad.]
200286.name: Artificial Sanctuary Test

200287.flavor: [To counter a bike's disadvantages, Crux outfitted all of their bike messengers with protective gear. Their gear was professional level.]
200287.name: Really Quick Service

200288.flavor: [While looking for a place to sleep in the forest, Rose stumbled upon a girl.]
200288.name: Girl Discovered

200289.flavor: [In order to become more powerful, the GS looked into methods to remodel bodies. These were the preparations for making remodeled human beings.]
200289.name: Third Laboratory

200290.flavor: [For people who have been sitting and listening to others talk for long periods of time, it's only natural to feel sleepy.]
200290.name: Dream

200291.flavor: [Under the leadership of the Aletheian ace, Schindler K Eru, the Aletheians and the GS joined forces in the name of resistance. Their mutual goal was the downfall of Crux.]
200291.name: Forming the Resistance

200292.flavor: [This is a really great book. If you start reading it, you'll never want to leave.]
200292.name: Suggested Reading

200293.flavor: [Was the answer Conundrum picked the correct one?! We'll find out in 60 seconds!]
200293.name: Last One

200294.flavor: [To be righteous is to be impenetrable.]
200294.name: Spearhead

200295.flavor: [These books are the world's greatest treasures. These precious words are priceless.]
200295.name: Book Meets Girl

200296.flavor: [I've been alone since the day I was born! How could someone who's always been alone ever hope for the warmth of human contact?!]
200296.name: Wrathful Reversal

200298.flavor: [The most important part of work is to leave no evidence.]
200298.name: Destroy Evidence

200299.flavor: [A maid that manages the maids' schedules. Maids aren't supposed to do that, so she suspects that something is wrong.]
200299.name: Producing

200300.flavor: [The youngest knight's day begins with chores. She has no idea when they'll be over.]
200300.name: Youngest Knight's Day

200301.flavor: [This is a book recommended to me by my precious friend. Please treat it with care...]
200301.name: Cobalt Book

200302.flavor: [You can't learn everything just by reading books! You have to learn from experience, too!]
200302.name: Hiking Lesson

200303.flavor: [These are the books I first read when I was a new student... I've been stuck dealing with storage lately, but I still treasure these books.]
200303.name: Nostalgia

200304.flavor: [To protect my lady no matter what... This is my resolve.]
200304.name: Protection

200305.flavor: [To be beautiful, I have to have my beauty sleep. 11 o'clock already?]
200305.name: Lady's Rest

200306.flavor: [The mystery of the witches is a mystery. The birdcage is used to cage birds.]
200306.name: Crossroads of Chaos

200307.flavor: [What IS that?! Why is something like that here? It'll be a shame, but I'll have to use this disposable artifact...]
200307.name: Sanctuary Exploration

200308.flavor: [Yes? A delivery? Where would you like it delivered?]
200308.name: Quick as the Wind

200309.flavor: [When she received the report about a certain power within the ancient sanctuary, the head knight sent orders to advance. Well, her parrot did, at least.]
200309.name: Towards Sanctuary

200310.flavor: [I will protect you. Remember our teachings.]
200310.name: Protective Instinct

200311.flavor: [I will lead the charge.] [The scariest thing about the GS attack is that the GS members know no fear.]
200311.name: GS Attack Formation

200312.flavor: [What you can see isn't everything. The important thing is what you can't see.]
200312.name: Phantasmal Image

200313.flavor: [The project wasn't suspended. I just forgot about it...]
200313.name: Forbidden Research

200314.flavor: [I'm completely prepared, so I won't miss my perfect chance.]
200314.name: Shutter Chance

200316.flavor: [It's a packaged gift box to give to another person. It's exciting, wondering what's inside. You can really feel the spirit of giving. - Esprit's Memo]
200316.name: Gift Box

200317.flavor: [You have no idea what's in the box.]
200317.name: Disciple's Box

200318.flavor: [No matter how many times I emphasize having a thankful heart, it's still an important virtue.]
200318.name: Infinite Thanks

200319.flavor: [The effects of the curse are still incomplete, but if you are too slow to stop it, it will become impossible to reverse.]
200319.name: Curse of Decay

200320.flavor: [Is this really the right decision? Will I still be able to face her?]
200320.name: Worries

200321.flavor: [This is a time when everything requires attention. It is even more of a special occasion because I am here.]
200321.name: Event

200322.flavor: ["So this is sunlight? It's dazzling." As the sunlight reflected off of her eyes, she walked along the glimmering road. "This is my new school life... It's what I wanted. Is this the place that was waiting for me? Is this what I needed?]
200322.name: Enrollment

200323.flavor: [So you're the chair of Royle Academy now. I didn't realize how much the world had changed.] [Of course. In the end, you're just one of many flowers in this garden.]
200323.name: Meeting the Chair

200324.flavor: [The student council president is different, the students are disappearing... Something is strange... On top of that, more and more parts of the academy are being marked as restricted. Could that have something to do with it?]
200324.name: Personal Investigation

200325.flavor: [Linia... Why the hurry? I think you're rushing to the end too quickly...] [Delightful. You came here to tell this to me, knowing full well you are breaking the rules? Hah... Of course, it brings me joy to see you again. At any rate, I suppose I cannot just leave Cinia like this.]
200325.name: Warning

200326.flavor: [Faster, higher, farther! I can go anywhere!]
200326.name: Crossing the Sanctuary

200327.flavor: [The thing that is the nexus of all this... That thing is...]
200327.name: Holy Researcher

200328.flavor: [What is... I feel like I've been dreaming for a long time. I can't remember anything. Who are you? Who... am I?]
200328.name: Back from Sanctuary

200329.flavor: [Endlessly research and endlessly investigate. Where there is light, there is also darkness. Don't just believe in God's teachings.]
200329.name: Mystic Tutor

200330.flavor: [We've been overwhelmed. No one in the world could withstand this.]
200330.name: Comrades

200331.flavor: [Come forth. Arise. The ritual is going smoothly. Soon...]
200331.name: Forgotten God's Ritual

200332.flavor: [We are the group that has gathered those girls who hold the power of transformation. The group that opposes those who wish to corrupt the world. The group that stands for justice. The group called Musiciter.]
200332.name: Musiciter Mentor

200333.flavor: [It will give you infinite knowledge. Are you ready to receive it?]
200333.name: Forbidden Book

200334.flavor: [No matter how much I eat, I'm hungry. No matter how much I sleep, I'm tired! That place is... a school!]
200334.name: Endless Appetite

200336.flavor: [Oh, where did you come from, kitty? You can't have any nom noms.]
200336.name: Nom Nom Nom

200337.flavor: [Things can't stay this way. If I want to become the strongest in the Library Club, do I have to become a Level 6?]
200337.name: Final Decision

200339.flavor: [It was Linia's magic. She turned all of them small. Linia watched them contently.]
200339.name: Mass Polymorph

200340.flavor: [Seron was appointed as the new head maid. The maids began leaving the mansion one by one. A strange rumor about Linia started circulating. She would call the maids out one by one and use some strange magic to test something...]
200340.name: Appointment

200341.flavor: [Seven was not exempt from Linia's plan to turn girls into witches. Seven's distrust and vengeful spirit turned her into a fiery witch. Can Linia turn ordinary girls into witches, too?]
200341.name: Chair's Conspiracy

200342.flavor: [Don't rest for a moment! No matter how few artifacts there are, we must find them immediately! Shout if you find an artifact!]
200342.name: Excavation

200344.flavor: [The two were similar, so they understood each other. It felt natural to them.]
200344.name: Understanding

200345.flavor: [This is the enemy stronghold... My hands are trembling, but I'm not scared.] [You might think that you have to stay in top condition because you could be captured, but that's not true. Fear is a powerful motivator.]
200345.name: Scout's Attitude

200346.flavor: [When Helena's hands are clasped together in prayer, she looks truly devout.] [Mommy, what's that behind her?] [Shh. Be quiet. Helena is praying.]
200346.name: Shaman's Prayer

200347.flavor: [It's almost complete.] [With unfocused eyes, A-GA poured a red liquid over the sword, causing a dark feeling to echo from it. The sound of laughter could be heard.]
200347.name: Dark Sword Refinement

200348.flavor: [Remember. Don't think "Rio." That thing inside Rio's body is the Mother Demon. If you wake Rio up now, everything will be plunged into chaos.]
200348.name: Sage's Advice

200349.flavor: [It feels like you'll be able to take the initiative next turn.]
200349.name: Lucky Coin

200351.flavor: [So Vernika wasn't in the Netherworld. If Vernika wasn't dead, then where was she? Iri felt powerless as she headed toward the train to return to the land of the living.]
200351.name: Nether Visitor

200352.flavor: [This is what Treanna said: Now is not the time to cross that river. Wait until the fourth agent gets impatient.]
200352.name: Message

200353.flavor: [Here.] [The Myo clan postgirl delivered a letter to Asmis. The letter contained four elegantly-written numbers.] ["The game is starting...." Asmis reflected on Treanna's words.]
200353.name: Four Messages

200354.flavor: [Ah... It was stupid to hold so many books like that....]
200354.name: Organization Failure

200355.flavor: [Aren't you tired? Come over here. Won't you have a cup of coffee with me?]
200355.name: Take A Break

200356.flavor: [Oh my! Thank you, fairies! Thank you for helping me, but you can't take those with you!]
200356.name: Fairy Borrowers

200357.flavor: [This is the group of girls with the power to transform who fight for justice. They are called Musiciter. These girls have surfaced to rectify the chaos within Crux.]
200357.name: Musiciter Appears!

200358.flavor: [This place is really amazing. There are so many things that you can't experience anywhere else.]
200358.name: Sanctuary Trip

200359.flavor: [Wouldn't it be great if you were my sister, Rotori?] [Shh! We'll get in trouble.]
200359.name: Kinship

200360.flavor: [What is this, quartermaster? A state of emergency! Extended service!]
200360.name: Sudden News

200361.flavor: [Little by little, they are running out of room to move in. The moment they start feeling lonely, they'll definitely let their guards down.]
200361.name: Lonely Operation

200362.flavor: [Eisenwane had a nightmare. She saw the moment when she was first gripped by that terrible curse.]
200362.name: Dream Curse

200363.flavor: [To summon the forgotten ancient god, a vessel must be prepared at the end of the ritual.] [This is a sacred ritual to bring prosperity to this land. You are a heroine.]
200363.name: Ritual's Final Step

200364.flavor: [Before you go, why don't you have something to eat? Once you go back, you won't be able to taste anything like this until you die. Have a bowl before you leave. Wait, can vampires eat human food?]
200364.name: Nether Cafe

200365.flavor: [I already know the solution to Rio's current predicament, and even if I didn't, I'd find it quickly.]
200365.name: Think Twice Seal

200366.flavor: [Woooooow! Sage Lady! How did you do that?] [It's simple, but you two can't do it.] [Wow, look at this! My hand! My hand!]
200366.name: Time Spiral

200384.flavor: [Milka-senpai... I'm at my limit... I can't endure it any longer... Can't you stop your investigation?]
200384.name: Messy Business

200385.flavor: [The Library Club advisor is especially popular with the club members. She looks like she doesn't mind it, either.]
200385.name: Personal Relationship

200386.flavor: ["Um... could you be...?" Unlike Iri, who was puzzled when she ran into Sita, Sita did not seem to recognize Iri at all.]
200386.name: Chance Meeting

200387.flavor: ["A clue to Kana, which cannot be found... Can it be found in the underground library?"]
200387.name: Secret Room

200388.flavor: [I swear on my grandfather's honor that I, Linus Falco, will catch the panty thief!]
200388.name: Linus's Wrath

200389.flavor: [Shh! Even if you don't say it, I know. I know juuust what you need.]
200389.name: Myo Clan's Aid

200390.flavor: [What message do you want delivered? Everything will be kept confidential.]
200390.name: Messenger

200391.flavor: [I need a place that I can call my own. If there isn't one, then I'll just make one!]
200391.name: The Maybe Garden

200392.flavor: [This sword has the power to see the future. By choosing the best of all possible futures, Rosa was able to stay hidden among the knights.]
200392.name: Sword of Future Sight

200393.flavor: [They couldn't get anything. They were in more despair than trying to get the Sword of Kings to  drop.]
200393.name: No Gain

200394.flavor: [Birds' talons erupted from the ground to bind the feet of everyone gathered there. Everyone who doubted the head knight's power would not be able to hide their embarrassment.]
200394.name: Nevermove

200395.flavor: [I feel extraordinary energy coming from beyond this massive door. Have we... found it?]
200395.name: Sanctuary Door

200396.flavor: [Vernika...] [Sita...] [The hearts of these two girls longed for different people.]
200396.name: Iri and Vernika

200397.flavor: [This is the story of the G Sisters, the girls who fight  after school to defend the people!] [The movie was surprisingly interesting.]
200397.name: Iri's Enjoyment

200398.flavor: [If we're identical twins, then why is there a difference here?!] [Kyaa! W-What are you doing!!]
200398.name: Water Play

200399.flavor: [The God of Truth will deliver us all.] [The Aletheians believe that the God of Truth will lead them to Heaven.]
200399.name: Shaman's Message

200400.flavor: [Veltier was holding a certain girl in her dream.] [Who was that? My head hurts.]
200400.name: Veltier's Dream

200401.flavor: [Milka-senpai is too inflexible. She doesn't have any power over me, but I can give her a few tips.]
200401.name: Lib. Assistant

200402.flavor: [The rumors about the library have already reached Crux? Well, we're not really hiding anything about the library, but I'll allow you to enter under the condition that I accompany you.]
200402.name: Accompaniment

200403.flavor: [Relying only on a single flashlight, she passed the fallen stacks of books and arrived at a place where "something" in the form of a girl resided.]
200403.name: Spirit Encounter

200404.flavor: [We will rush to customers whenever and wherever you call us. You need some out-of-season ice cream? Of course we'll prepare it for you!]
200404.name: Anywhere Service

200405.flavor: [We all came out to T // On the Lake Vita shoreline // To eat food at a mobile restaurant // We didn't have much time // But the other ladies // Were at the best hotel around // But some stupid with a lamp // Burned the place to the ground.]
200405.name: Lady on the Water

200406.flavor: [Ceres! Eris! Sedna! Ready? With these three blades, my power becomes a million! You are not prepared to defeat me!]
200406.name: Limit Break

200407.flavor: [This place is as nice as I heard. Yes? This isn't the changing room?]
200407.name: Relaxation

200408.flavor: [The world looks so different from this height. How about it? Don't you want to experience it?]
200408.name: Smallification

200409.flavor: [I will unlock the future.] [All of the members felt a strange sensation. They felt a conviction that they had to follow Rose's orders.]
200409.name: Blu E Rosso

200410.flavor: [It's amazing that a place like this exists underground, Kris.] [This place must be...]
200410.name: Underground City

200411.flavor: [How about I give you a reward? I will tell you about the God of Truth you have been looking for. Come closer.]
200411.name: Divine Clue

200412.flavor: [Helena fell into a strange state.] [This is a trance. It's a state where you can communicate with your God of Truth.] [Butterfly tattoos appeared on Helena's body.]
200412.name: Butterfly Brand

200413.flavor: [You police seem to be displeased with something, coming to this world that I currently happen to be in... Crevasse is still here. It's a bit difficult right now. Please wait for a bit.]
200413.name: Eternal Witness

200414.flavor: [Welcome! It's great to meet you all! Sita, why don't you say something to them?] [... Hi.]
200414.name: Welcome!

200415.flavor: [A massive ventilation opening. She remembered something being in front of the opening, but that something was no longer there. She couldn't remember exactly what it was, but she was certain that it was gone.]
200415.name: Disappearance

200416.flavor: [I'm looking for a book that tells about the history of this library.]
200416.name: Finding the Library

200417.flavor: [Why are we avoiding those weaklings? Shall I dispose of them for you?] [It's difficult right now. Wait a little longer.]
200417.name: Library Elusion

200418.flavor: [Seron found something strange in the Pacifica's basement storage. This golden hammer glowed brilliantly, as if everything it touched would be turned into light.]
200418.name: Surprise Attack

200419.flavor: [Is this... a dagger like the one Lucerrie has? If so... Oh? What's this belt?] [Triforce! Ready?] [Did... the dagger react?]
200419.name: Cosmo Drive

200420.flavor: [I saw a witch in the underground library. Her long, dark hair fluttered behind her, and she held the hand of a small girl as she ran. From behind, she looked familiar, according to the testimony of a Vita student.]
200420.name: Strega in Exile

200421.flavor: [Eisenwane's personal life remains a secret. Only the parrot knows what kind of life the awkward girl lives.]
200421.name: Head Knight's Rest

200422.flavor: [Wait! If you go that way... You mustn't meet her! Veltier!]
200422.name: Clairvoyance

200423.flavor: [V-Vernika-senpai?] [One page of the missing story unfolded before Veltier's eyes.]
200423.name: Elusion

200424.flavor: [They hated the master, but the vampires agreed that until they reclaimed their lands, they would have to combine forces.]
200424.name: Ritual of Unity

200425.flavor: [Please bear in mind that we must first think about the safety of the whole family.]
200425.name: Mediation

200426.flavor: [I will sacrifice myself for my comrades.] [The unity between the Aletheians and the GS is steadfast.]
200426.name: Intervention

200427.flavor: [Book of Light, unfold! Field domain, expand! Panel access approved!]
200427.name: Panel Rise

200428.flavor: [Don't you know that the ground becomes more solid after the rain?] [But this place is all sandy. The rain would wash everything away.]
200428.name: Friendship after the Rain

200429.flavor: [How is it, Iri? You don't like this one? Sita, stop eating and pick something out, too.] [I can't find a good time to talk...]
200429.name: Window Shopping

200430.flavor: [Linus confirmed Linia's plans with her own eyes.] [I can't sit around and do nothing...]
200430.name: Witchification Plans

200431.flavor: [I have no choice but to come forward to stop her.] [So you are the witches who oppose me... What shall I do?]
200431.name: Down with the Queen

200433.flavor: [How about handing that over?] [That's impossible.] [I'm fine with that, too.]
200433.name: Opposition

200434.flavor: [With the development of this artifact, which can instantly identify the target's magic type, the true witch hunt will begin.]
200434.name: Witch Hunt

200435.flavor: [This is what we've been looking for. I have to bring it back so we can study it.]
200435.name: Trace of Kana

200436.flavor: [This is a job for you, A-GA. Only you can do it. For the sake of our order, we must get what those people are seeking.]
200436.name: Apostle's Scheme

200437.flavor: [This body is suitable. I'm not used to it, so I can't move as freely, but I like it better than Rio's body. Aletheian, they said... Heh heh.]
200437.name: Trance

200438.flavor: [To maintain the order's strength, the forbidden ritual to obtain the dark sword was completed. The eye on the sword looked around at its surroundings, as if it were alive.]
200438.name: Dark Sword Menelgart

200439.flavor: [Crevasse's purpose is to improve the lives of the creatures of the sea, so she turned the land into the sea.]
200439.name: Land and Sea

200440.flavor: [I am just an observer... My actions may lead to your demise... Is my assistance really necessary?]
200440.name: Steparu

200441.flavor: [The next topic is about our tea...] [Huh? Did we have that on the agenda?] [President. The next topic is this week's demerits list...] [Are there any other snacks besides these?]
200441.name: Student Council

200442.flavor: [Does she not remember me? Or did I remember wrong? Or maybe...] [In the heart of the bustling Republic, the girl's worries deepened.]
200442.name: Faltering

200443.flavor: [Haha! There's nothing more suitable for the mural of Vita than a picture of me!]
200443.name: Satisfaction

200444.flavor: [Nothing puts me to ease as well as the smell of the morning flowers and the singing of the birds. Are you at peace? This is a good morning.]
200444.name: Garden Lady

200445.flavor: [Layna Scentriver is the entirety of the anti-Witch Queen faction. She is in the center of the current situation. Crux and the Federation require the key that she has. They formed an unspoken agreement. The Witch Queen has decided to eliminate Layna Scentriver.]
200445.name: Everyone's Enemy

200446.flavor: [My lady...] [Call me by my name when we're alone.] [As you wish...] [And let's lose the formalities...]
200446.name: Lady Maid Dream

200447.flavor: [Fortune took a strange turn. The book that happened to fall in front of Eisenwane contained information about the key to open the door.]
200447.name: Discovery

200448.flavor: [What a friggin' mess. How the hell am I supposed to fix this? What an idiot.]
200448.name: Experience

200449.flavor: [What am I doing? This sensation... feels familiar.]
200449.name: Relapse

200450.flavor: [It looks like some insects are trying to get in my way. Whatever. I like taking the fun path.]
200450.name: GS 5th Star's Strength

200451.flavor: [A new foe wielding a strange sword appeared in the midst of the factions that were targeting the mysterious witch. She had taken the chance to start a battle.]
200451.name: The Battle Begins

200452.flavor: [What the... you... you monster...!] [We'll talk after I've defeated everyone here. Starting with you!]
200452.name: Clash

200453.flavor: [What? I thought I was the only one who could enter this imaginary aisle.] [It was a simple deduction. Sorry, but if we're going to escape, we're going to have to work together.]
200453.name: Following Memory

200454.flavor: [That white hair... I know I've seen her somewhere before...]
200454.name: Minority Report

200455.flavor: [Talentium? I don't know anything about that weird imitation that you're talking about. The only thing I know called talentium is here.]
200455.name: Talentium Veritas

200456.flavor: [This is a place where a ritual is performed for the Creator in order to obtain the magical ore. In order to unlock it, three things are needed. A key, a shaman, and a sacrifice...]
200456.name: Altar of Kana

200457.flavor: [Haha. Magnificent. Soon, I will be able to send people as well. Who shall I use as a test subject?]
200457.name: Rift

200458.flavor: [I will do as my sister says... Yes, Linia.]
200458.name: Covert Operation

200459.flavor: [Where the hell did everyone run off to?!]
200459.name: Summon

200460.flavor: [I am the head knight Eisenwane. State your name and rank. Are you looking for this girl? Have you seen this girl?]
200460.name: Manhunt

200461.flavor: [Rose arrived as backup during the battle between A-GA and Eisenwane.] [Head Knight! Hurry and use this opening!]
200461.name: Backup

200462.flavor: [There were more people in the way than I expected. I don't really feel like it, but I have to contact HQ. Who the hell was that brat with the weird sword?]
200462.name: GS Network

200463.flavor: [Ren? What's up?] [Have you heard? There's a shaman that can miraculously heal injuries.] [Yeah. Why?] [Wanna go check it out?]
200463.name: Gossip

200464.flavor: [Glowing butterflies danced about as Helena laid her hands on Red Sun's wounded leg.] [Oh... Look. Miss Red Sun's wounds are healing.]
200464.name: Miracle

200465.flavor: [Greetings, Faithful Followers! Everyone wants to be a hero! This book holds marvelous stories of super-powered heroes and crime-fighting detectives; comics are full of incredible tales that anyone can enjoy, including you!]
200465.name: Graphic Novel

200466.flavor: [This ticket is required to enter the hot spring baths.] [Isn't this place heaven on earth?]
200466.name: Hot Springs Ticket

200468.flavor: [It was just a flower that had fallen to the ground, but when Asmis picked it up, it became a lead.]
200468.name: Discover Evidence

200469.flavor: [The finest cake in the world. Since I served it to you like this, I'll have to eat you.]
200469.name: World is Cake

200470.flavor: [First, we have to find this person. Do you know what Soma looks like?] [Let's see... She's shorter than me, and she looks like an idiot.]
200470.name: Investigation Progress

200471.flavor: [The maids left the mansion, one by one. The bustling life that the maids filled the mansion with was replaced with emptiness.]
200471.name: Maid Vacancy

200472.flavor: [Linia considered any witches who would not join her to be traitors. By pulling some strings, she was able to get a law passed before the Federation Parliament that allowed her to arrest them. The result was phenomenal.]
200472.name: Parliament

200473.flavor: [Linia, who had always operated from the shadows, extended her hand to Eisenwane out in public. It was a rare sight indeed.]
200473.name: Linia's Counterattack

200474.flavor: [Everyone, retreat! ... Do you have something to say, Rose Pacifica?] [It finally happened.] [The Witch Queen is our enemy. This has not changed. However, I never heard anything about this!]
200474.name: Crisis Averted

200475.flavor: [Stop. What you seek is not here.]
200475.name: Sudden Turn

200476.flavor: [Oh? I thought you were just some nerd, but it looks like you might be on the same level as me.] [If that's what you think, then why don't you just leave?]
200476.name: Party Time!

200477.flavor: [I've run tirelessly to find you.] [... What is your name?] [Rue. K. Artend.]
200477.name: Growing Congregation

200478.flavor: [The God of Truth exists. This leg is proof of that.] [In order to spread the teachings of God, even a scar can be overcome.]
200478.name: Witness of Miracles

200479.flavor: [Just as we have faith in God, God has faith in us. We must rise to repay that faith.]
200479.name: Agent of God

200491.flavor: [천리교는 당신을 원한다. 이 글을 보고있는 당신! 망설이지 말고 오라. 진리의 신의 말씀이 여기있다. 연락처:XXXX-XXX][선동가 쉰들러가 그려진 천리교의 광고 포스터]
200491.name: I WANT YOU

200495.flavor: [In her human form, the Black Lion wields this gauntlet-like weapon. It is made of an unknown material.]
200495.name: Gauntlets of Darkness

200496.flavor: [Along with the Gauntlets of Darkness, this is another weapon that the unknown lifeform they call the Black Lion uses in her human form. As expected, it is made of an unknown material.]
200496.name: Greaves of Darkness

200497.flavor: [Your IQ is 150 and my IQ is 170. With the power of our combined IQ of 320, we can solve this problem!]
200497.name: Super Strategy

200498.flavor: [Where am I? Why can't I remember anything?] [I planned to tell you once you fully recovered... You have amnesia.] [Huh? I have amnesia? What do you mean by that...?]
200498.name: Memory Loss

200499.flavor: [Orte Bohr. She has the power to find any book in the world. Even the books that were never meant to be found.]
200499.name: Forbidden Truth

200501.flavor: [Sita, look at this ad. The Pacifica house is hiring maids, and the hourly pay is the same as my allowance!] [Luxurious room and board are provided...]
200501.name: Maid Part-Time Job

200502.flavor: [Haha... As expected, you're rather foolish. By picking up that "clue", you've already fallen into my trap.]
200502.name: Entrapment

200503.flavor: [You will stay and look for a book like this one. This one.]
200503.name: Second Volume

200504.flavor: [The Witch Queen has finally started to move.]
200504.name: Execute the Plan

200505.flavor: [As expected, you've brought me an ancient artifact, Odien... How wonderful. With this, Crux can fight for another 10 years!]
200505.name: Sanctuary's Legacy

200506.flavor: [You were carrying a thing like this? Interseting. Should I leave this with her?]
200506.name: Dark Sword Reclamation

200507.flavor: [I finally found a clue. Schindler... What are you planning?]
200507.name: Helena's Contact

200508.flavor: [The GS is evil! You won't be forgiven.] [...I wonder if it really is evil.]
200508.name: Foiled Scheme

200509.flavor: [A gift box with pretty packaging. It must contain something special. Just looking at it gets me excited.]
200509.name: Flashy Gift Box

200510.flavor: [This book was checked out 32 times, but it was returned 33 times... Was the 33rd time checked out by the invisible girl?]
200510.name: Loan Check

200511.flavor: [Talentium is so cool... So cool... This chemical reaction is so bright...]
200511.name: Catalyst

200512.flavor: [This ribbon is the clue to the missing key. With just this, we can narrow down our search.]
200512.name: Clue Discovered

200513.flavor: [To replace the maids who left, the dolls of other witches were used to clean the mansion.]
200513.name: Last Resort

200514.flavor: [This isn't how you write to one of your betters.] [Linia burned the matriarch's letter.]
200514.name: Linia's Refusal

200515.flavor: [Everything is going according to plan. Like the ripples formed when a rock falls into a lake, the things that have been set in motion cannot be stopped.]
200515.name: Ripple

200516.flavor: [Luthica glared at Eisenwane, but Eisenwane didn't notice.]
200516.name: Sincerity

200517.flavor: [The quartermaster found the hiding person. The messenger had no idea she had already been found.]
200517.name: Observation

200518.flavor: [Because she was deemed an unstable element, Rose and her underlings were all demoted to Blue Cross support.] [She's too dangerous...]
200518.name: Demotion

200519.flavor: [Lady Linia. The master has a proposition for you. She offers an alliance.] [... Master?] [Master Luna Flina.]
200519.name: Luna's Messenger

200520.flavor: [We've confirmed her location.] [Understood. I will go collect her.]
200520.name: New Mission

200521.flavor: [The trespasser burst in. She held a sign with "O" written on it.]
200521.name: A Challenger Appears

200522.flavor: [Listen! You hear me? I'm going to get very angry if you flip Rio's skirt again! Got it?] [It... it was wrong.] [*sniff*... Sage Lady is scary.]
200522.name: Prohibition

210001.flavor:
[This Accessory is obtained from Fight matches and is used to craft in the Science Lab.]
[A sword made of talentium. No one remembers where the metal came from, but no one cares, either. It's almost frightening how obsessed people are with it. - Esprit's Memo]
210001.name: Sword

210002.flavor:
[This Accessory is obtained from Fight matches and is used to craft in the Science Lab.]
[Talentium has made its way into everyday life. The metal is very easy to process, so people put talentium into just about anything. - Esprit's Memo]
210002.name: Glasses

210003.flavor:
[This Accessory is obtained from Fight matches and is used to craft in the Science Lab.]
[The heels are supposed to raise the wearer's eye level. However, it's hard to figure out if girls really want to look at higher things, or if they're just wearing them to feel better about themselves. Whatever. I prefer comfortable shoes. - Esprit's Memo]
210003.name: Shoes

210004.flavor:
[This Accessory is obtained from Fight matches and is used to craft in the Science Lab.]
[Stockings used to be something people would wear to keep their body warm, but times have changed. After they became another piece of fashion, I started to really like the ones with ribbons over the knees. - Esprit's Memo]
210004.name: Stockings

210005.flavor:
[This Accessory is obtained from Fight matches and is used to craft in the Science Lab.]
[This is a long ribbon for binding. You can bind anything you want. You can tie it around packages, or tie it around your hair. Last week, I used a ribbon to wrap a birthday gift for my neighbor's daughter. - Esprit's Memo]
210005.name: Ribbon

210006.flavor:
[This Accessory is obtained from Fight matches and is used to craft in the Science Lab.]
[I gave a cat doll to my neighbor's daughter for her birthday. It looks just like something out of a fairy tale, doesn't it? The girl started talking to it right away. She even invites it to her little tea parties for conversation. - Esprit's Memo]
210006.name: Cat Doll

210007.flavor:
[This Accessory is obtained from Fight matches and is used to craft in the Science Lab.]
[It's been years since I started writing notes so I wouldn't forget anything. Unfortunately, it's getting harder and harder to keep them organized. I don't remember where I wrote what. - Esprit's Memo]
210007.name: Book

210008.flavor:
[This Ore is obtained from Dungeon matches and is used to craft in the Science Lab.]
[Talentium is known to vary in color. In some places, you can find red talentium. If you want to get some talentium, the Monster Hunting Bureau recently discovered that monsters carry it around. - Esprit's Memo]
210008.name: Red Ore

210009.flavor:
[This Ore is obtained from Dungeon matches and is used to craft in the Science Lab.] 
[Talentium is known to vary in color. In some places, you can find green talentium. If you want to get some talentium, the Monster Hunting Bureau recently discovered that monsters carry it around. - Esprit's Memo]
210009.name: Green Ore

210010.flavor:
[This Ore is obtained from Dungeon matches and is used to craft in the Science Lab.] 
[Talentium is known to vary in color. In some places, you can find white talentium. If you want to get some talentium, the Monster Hunting Bureau recently discovered that monsters carry it around. - Esprit's Memo]
210010.name: White Ore

210011.flavor:
[This Ore is obtained from Dungeon matches and is used to craft in the Science Lab.] 
[Talentium is known to vary in color. In some places, you can find blue talentium. If you want to get some talentium, the Monster Hunting Bureau recently discovered that monsters carry it around. - Esprit's Memo]
210011.name: Blue Ore

210012.flavor:
[This Ore is obtained from Dungeon matches and is used to craft in the Science Lab.] 
[Talentium is known to vary in color. In some places, you can find black talentium. If you want to get some talentium, the Monster Hunting Bureau recently discovered that monsters carry it around. - Esprit's Memo]
210012.name: Black Ore

210013.flavor:
[This Dungeon Material is obtained from the Frontier Ruins and is used to craft in the Science Lab.] 
[The magical stone debris discovered at the outskirts of the ruins.  The stone's fantastic cleavage and the prominent techniques used to work the stone are both considered evidence that these ruins were once a place important to the history of the continent. - Esprit's Memo]
210013.name: Ruins Fragment

210014.flavor:
[This Dungeon Material is obtained from the Witch's Tower and Shadowland, and is used to craft in the Science Lab.] 
[A witch's mana can only be used by witches. It can't leave the body by itself, so witches make artifacts like these. These witches' hearts, which connect a witch's magic to the world's mana, are called heart stones. - Esprit's Memo]
210014.name: Heart Stone

210015.flavor:
[This Dungeon Material is obtained from the Crux Training Camp and is used to craft in the Science Lab.] 
[The Holy Beast Tears are the most important component of the epaulets that signify knighthood. Even the name sounds sacred. However, when you watch that girl as her tears fall, it's questionable if she can really be considered "Holy." - Esprit's Memo]
210015.name: Holy Beast Tear

210016.flavor:
[This Dungeon Material is obtained from the Bamboo Garden and is used to craft in the Science Lab.] 
[The famous park, Bamboo Garden, is always full of visitors looking for exotic scenery. However, who in the world is this person who can grow bamboo on this land? Bamboo never grew here before. - Esprit's Memo]
210016.name: Bamboo

210017.flavor: [This Dungeon Material is obtained from Linia's Mansion and is used to craft in the Science Lab.]  [This flower is a symbol of the Pacifica family. You can find it in any Pacifica household. It's funny because it really suits them. - Esprit's Memo]
210017.name: Lily

210018.flavor: [This Dungeon Material is obtained from the Vampire Lands and is used to craft in the Science Lab.] [The blood packs are the Darklore's first step towards an organized blood distribution system. The Scardel and Crescent Elders oversee and control the flow of blood packs. - Esprit's Memo]
210018.name: Blood Pack

210019.flavor: [This Dungeon Material is obtained from Vita Public School and is used to craft in the Science Lab.] ["Good Joooob! - From Teacher"] [I remember bitter memories of all the hard work I did to get these stamps. - Esprit's Memo]
210019.name: Seal of Approval

210020.flavor: [This Dungeon Material is obtained from the Vivid World and Dream Island and is used to craft in the Science Lab.] [One of the vivid world's oddities. The reason for each world's existence is unknown, but the strange ore that can be found all over this world suggests that it is unusual. This phenomenon takes the shape of a spiral ore. - DKD's Report]
210020.name: Spiral Fragment

210021.flavor: [This Premium Material is obtained in the Shop and is used to craft in the Science Lab.] [There are many methods to refine talentium, just as there are many shapes talentium takes after refinement. Some of these methods produce talentium pearls. However, regardless of its initial form, the final product is always a card. It's important to cater to the customers' tastes, after all. - Esprit's Memo]
210021.name: Talentium Pearl

210022.flavor: [This Accessory is obtained from Fight matches and is used to craft in the Science Lab.] [A dagger made of talentium. Talentium research has been speeding up, and scholars are looking for ways to utilize the energy it contains. - Esprit's Memo]
210022.name: Dagger

210023.flavor: [This Accessory is obtained from Fight matches and is used to craft in the Science Lab.] [A panda doll. This animal can't be found within the Federation. This doll is made in the likeness of the precious pet of the Pacifica household. The Pacifica house receives royalties for every sale of this doll. - Esprit's Memo]
210023.name: Panda Doll

210024.flavor: [This Accessory is obtained from Fight matches and is used to craft in the Science Lab.] [A 52-card set. Many kinds of games can be played with them. These cards have brought tears and laughter to countless people. Although I'm a human too, I always find humans fascinating. - Esprit's Memo]
210024.name: Playing Cards

210025.flavor: [This Accessory is obtained from Fight matches and is used to craft in the Science Lab.] [What do you suppose these were used for first? To keep your hands from getting dirty, or to help with work? I still don't understand the mentality of people who wear things for the sake of extravagance. - Esprit's Memo]
210025.name: Gloves

210026.flavor: [This Accessory is obtained from Fight matches and is used to craft in the Science Lab.] [Because people wanted their bodies to have a distinct smell, perfume was born. I don't really know why they would. I don't remember Rio ever putting on perfume, but for some reason, I can sense a subtle smell coming from her. How mysterious. - Esprit's Memo]
210026.name: Perfume

210027.flavor: [This Accessory is obtained from Fight matches and is used to craft in the Science Lab.] [This tool gives Rio a lot of worries when she goes out. She always tries to get the color exactly right, and she spends a long time fussing over it. - Esprit's Memo]
210027.name: Lipstick

210028.flavor: [This Accessory is obtained from Fight matches and is used to craft in the Science Lab.] [A pendant. I sometimes see Rio wearing one. However, you can usually only see the string and not the ornament. It's incredibly annoying. I feel like she's doing it on purpose. - Esprit's Memo]
210028.name: Pendant

210029.flavor: [This Dungeon Material is obtained from the Catacombs and is used to craft in the Science Lab.] [A brick inscribed with the symbol of the Aletheians. It's known that when the underground chapel was constructed, each brick was made and placed one by one. As it turns out, though, these were made to order by the Federation's construction industry. - Esprit's Memo]
210029.name: Aletheian Brick

210030.flavor:
[This is a Quest reward. It can be redeemed at the Coin Swap.]
[A valuable coin that is blue and shiny. You can use exchange them for Yellow Coins or other prizes at the Coin Swap in the Lab.]
210030.name: Blue Coin

210031.flavor:
[This is obtained in the Coin Swap, where it can also be redeemed.]
[A valuable coin that is yellow and shiny. You can use exchange them for Red Coins or other prizes at the Coin Swap in the Lab.]
210031.name: Yellow Coin

210032.flavor:
[This is obtained in the Coin Swap, where it can also be redeemed.]
[A valuable coin that is red and shiny. You can use exchange them for prizes at the Coin Swap in the Lab.]
210032.name: Red Coin

210033.flavor: [This Dungeon Material is obtained from the Ancient Sanctuary and is used to craft in the Science Lab.] [This pass is issued by the ruins administration to allow people to enter the ruins.]
210033.name: Pass

210034.flavor: [This Dungeon Material is obtained from the 2S Detective Agency and is used to craft in the Science Lab.] [A numbered slip of paper unique to the 2S Detective Agency. You take a number and leave, then you send your request via letter. I tried sending some just for fun, but they were all ignored... It seems they want to keep other similar businesses in check.... -Esprit's Memo]
210034.name: Number Slip

210035.flavor: [Have you ever... received these? I have, but they didn't make me happy. Regardless of my feelings, I learned that chocolates were sweet. If you're upset, and someone asks you "How can you eat in a situation like this?", they don't know what they're talking about. - Esprit's Complaint]
210035.name: Chocolate

210036.flavor: [This Dungeon Material is obtained from Catch That Cat! and is used to craft in the Science Lab.] [This is a slip of paper stamped with the paw of a cute animal. It says that it was created by the Student Council.]
210036.name: Cat Paw Stamp

210037.flavor: [Delicious candy. A must-have food for girls' happiness.]
210037.name: Candy

210038.flavor: [This Dungeon Material is obtained from the Underground Library and is used to craft in the Science Lab.] [Whenever you borrow a book from the library, the librarian issues you a certain mundane index card.]
210038.name: Library Index Card

210039.flavor: [This Dungeon Material is obtained from the Underground Altar and is used to craft in the Science Lab.] [It was a game passed down from ancient times. This is a record of the strategies that mages used in their sacred battles, carried out in an arena specially made to ensure a fair duel. The ravine that served as their fierce battleground has not been discovered to this day. -Esprit's memo]
210039.name: Mystery Parchment

210040.flavor: [This Dungeon Material is obtained from Royle City and is used to craft in the Science Lab.] [This is the notebook used by the members of the Royle Police Force. If someone outside the force came into possession of one of these, it would be a serious problem.]
210040.name: Police Notebook

210041.flavor: [A rare type of talentium with a copper shine.]
210041.name: Copper Talentium

210042.flavor: [On rare occasions, copper talentium will become silver talentium when smelted.]
210042.name: Silver Talentium

210043.flavor: [Gold talentium can be produced by using the most flawless method of refining silver talentium.]
