210043.name: Gold Talentium

210044.flavor: [A claw from the mysterious Black Lion that resembles Nold. Its strength exceeds that of ordinary talentium.]
210044.name: Black Lion's Claw

210045.flavor: [This Dungeon Material is obtained from Musiciter Land and is used to craft in the Science Lab.] [A souvenir from Musiciter Land. Highly recommended for girls aiming to join Musiciter!]
210045.name: Replica Stick

210046.flavor: [A glittering gold medal. Where did you get it?]
210046.name: Commemorative Medal

300001.flavor: [What a pretty apron! Ever since I was a little girl, I always dreamed of cooking like this!]
300001.name: Cook Club Student

300002.flavor: [Every day, all you make are sweets... Sometimes, I would like to eat something other than cookies.]
300002.name: Cook Club Advisor

300003.flavor: [Excuse me... Huh? Are those cookies I smell? Isn't this the Cooking Club?]
300003.name: New Cook Club Student

300004.flavor: [Sita saved the people of Bakery Town. She's our hero.]
300004.name: Cook Club Svia

300005.flavor: [Sita, don't you want to try cooking today? It's our responsibility, after all. It's important to cook something that will bring happiness to the people who eat it.]
300005.name: Cook Club Dir. Jamie

300006.flavor: [I made this dish myself! How is it? It doesn't look too bad, right?]
300006.name: Cook Club Katie

300007.flavor: [This isn't some common bakery! I should cook something better!]
300007.name: Cook Club Sylphie

300008.flavor: [So what if I only make cookies? As long as people like it, then it's good.]
300008.name: Cook Club Linfield

300009.flavor: [Late students all look the same when you imagine them. They all run to school with a slice of toast in their mouths. You might say it's only a stereotype, but...]
300009.name: Latecomer

300010.flavor: [Friendship! Hard work! Triumph! Feel the energy of youth! Let's go!]
300010.name: Basketball Player

300011.flavor: [Vernika-senpai! Are you going there? Can you take me with you? I want to see that monster you were talking about with my own eyes!]
300011.name: Kouhai

300012.flavor: [Feel free to talk to me. The Secret Service Detective Agency will solve all your problems, no questions asked. How does that sound? Are you interested?]
300012.name: 2S Assistant Asmis

300013.flavor: [This morning, I suddenly had a feeling that it'd be a rainy day, so I took an umbrella with me. And wouldn't you know it, boom! Rain! It always rains when I feel it will.]
300013.name: Rainy Girl

300014.flavor: [You there! Watch how you move! Don't mess up your skirt! Just look at how you're presenting yourself!]
300014.name: Prefect Layna

300015.flavor: [Vernika-senpai! Don't just sit there and read. Help us sort out the books too! How much extra work do you want to pile on this cute little kouhai?]
300015.name: Lib. Lucca

300016.flavor: [Vernika... Hasn't she been spending too much time in the Cooking Club lately? She needs a warning...]
300016.name: Lib. Serie

300017.flavor: [People who don't return books ought to be warned. Huh? What's this book?]
300017.name: Lib. Lindt

300018.flavor: [The world of books really is without limits. Do you read often, Sita?]
300018.name: Lib. Vernika

300019.flavor: [Miss Cinia, the head maid left a message for you. She said that lunch is ready... What? Precious Pet #2 is lost? Yes, I am responsible for the garden...It's Rose's pet, so I don't know anything about it, but I will do my best to find it.]
300019.name: Gardener Maid

300020.flavor: [Excuse me, senpai? How should I clean this? Wow... This vase looks expensive.]
300020.name: New Maid

300021.flavor: [I'm committed to the safety of Ms. Cinia.] [You should also be committed to the safety of my furniture, as well as my pottery.]
300021.name: Guard Maid

300022.flavor: [Miss Cinia, where are you going? I will escort you! For a maid like me who always stays home, there's nothing more exciting than going out with my master!]
300022.name: Porter Maid

300023.flavor: [Uh... So.... Why should I be in charge of managing the vacations and salaries of all of Miss Cinia's maids?]
300023.name: Head Maid

300024.flavor: [Senpai, never forget that every maid looks up to you for leadership. You're such a good leader. Now, about my vacation next week...]
300024.name: Chief Maid

300025.flavor: [How much longer do I have to mop? I wish the kouhai would get here soon... Like that's going to happen... Maybe.]
300025.name: Mop Maid

300026.flavor: [Her curtains are red, her dresses are red, her carpets are red... Miss Cinia, please... Give me a break.]
300026.name: Tailor Maid

300027.flavor: [Why? I'm protecting her because that's what I'm getting paid for. The contract doesn't mention paying attention to collateral damage, so I can burn those to my heart's content.]
300027.name: Burning Guardian

300028.flavor: [This magic is as firm as a shield. Please step back. I will protect you.]
300028.name: Ward Caster

300029.flavor: [That's boring, that one, also that one... This book is boring too. Why can't you write a good story? It was my own fault to expect something good from you. Forget about it. You're fired. You can go now.]
300029.name: Aristocrat Girl

300030.flavor: [This place was inscribed with a spell. When you pass by, don't stay quiet. Silence is what triggers the spell.]
300030.name: Inscribing Magician

300031.flavor: [Huh? Why did this happen? This isn't what the book said the spell was supposed to do... Eek! I'm scared!]
300031.name: Apprentice

300032.flavor: [I don't know much about the outside... I just know that you are my protector.]
300032.name: Relena

300033.flavor: [Might I ask why I was hired differently from those personal maids, Lady Rose...?] [I just had somewhere to go and needed someone to go with me. That's all.]
300033.name: Private Maid

300034.flavor: [Don't rush. Take your time. You'll have a hard time if you try to learn everything about a house this huge at once. Take it step by step, okay?]
300034.name: Senpai Maid

300035.flavor: [There's nothing I have to say to a villain! There's no point to questions and answers! The heat of this flame can burn anything!]
300035.name: Striker

300036.flavor: [I feel an omen that something will fall from here tomorrow. Someone will fall from a great height. You... You're a Crux Knight, right?]
300036.name: Inspiration Lady

300037.flavor: [I will gladly fight alongside the senpai knights! Just help me out if I get into trouble. This sword? It was given to me by someone I respect a lot. I love this sword as if it were a part of my own body.]
300037.name: New Knight

300038.flavor: [Is anyone injured? Let's take a break. The injured should wait here, then come with the second wave!]
300038.name: Medic Knight Sillit

300039.flavor: [May I plant this here? Ah, no matter how many times I look at it, there's no flag more beautiful than that of Crux. Isn't that right, Luthica-senpai?]
300039.name: Flag Knight Frett

300040.flavor: [Don't think that it'll be difficult to weaken the vampires. You just need to eliminate their leader. Just concentrate on locating her, Luthica.]
300040.name: Knight Adjt. Sarisen

300041.flavor: [No one cares about where I am or what I'm doing. It's like I'm invisible. I never thought that my presence would be helpful to anyone, Miss Luthica.]
300041.name: Crux Knight Mytyl

300042.flavor: [You, who embrace the night and hunt for blood... are unforgivable!]
300042.name: Crux Knight Pintail

300043.flavor: [Ugh... How much longer until my shift is over?]
300043.name: Guard Knight

300044.flavor: [No... I don't want to fight any more. Peace... I want to live a peaceful life...]
300044.name: Crux Knight Terra

300046.flavor: [I just need to deliver this letter to the Empire, right? Hah! Piece of cake! It's going to be just dandy... I'll be back soon, Miss Jaina.]
300046.name: Messenger Knight

300047.flavor: [Belief in a single thing brings everyone together. So please, don't lose faith in your beliefs.]
300047.name: Priestess

300048.flavor: [We start every day with the wish to strengthen our beliefs. If I hold the cross tightly, I can feel something invisible growing stronger and stronger.]
300048.name: Seminarian

300049.flavor: [When I see a clean church, my heart also feels clean. When I clean away dirt, I feel my heart being cleaned.]
300049.name: Apprentice Nun

300050.flavor: [Are you interested? This is magic that must be paid for by blood. Can you really use it, knowing that it's human blood?]
300050.name: Seeker Sienfield

300051.flavor: [Lydia, what happened to you? I'm a bit curious. I'd say it's... important to dig into this. And it just happens to be raining too.]
300051.name: Seeker Amethystar

300052.flavor: [We shouldn't make any rash decisions. We'll have to investigate the knights before we take action.]
300052.name: Seeker Lydia

300053.flavor: [It isn't time for Mass yet. Could you please come again when the church bell rings?]
300053.name: Acolyte

300054.flavor: [I wanted some time alone to think, so I came early... Unfortunately, I came too early. Why did I come this early?]
300054.name: Crux Faithful

300055.flavor: [Everyone's been looking forward to the Flina Family Quiz Convention, and it's finally here! Who will answer these questions? I, Conundrum, as the Crescent representative, will try my best!]
300055.name: Crescent Conundrum

300056.flavor: [When you're lonely at night, a bottle of wine is your best friend. Is there any wine you like? Of course, these days, I never drink... wine.]
300056.name: Scardel Chardonnay

300057.flavor: [Okay. Listen. I don't want to be someone who plays tasteless tricks like you. If you want to play, then play with people you run across on your evening strolls.]
300057.name: Scardel Sion Flina

300058.flavor: [Sion! Sion! I came up with some great new pranks! They're hilarious! What do you think?]
300058.name: Scardel Rion Flina

300059.flavor: [This is a perfect wine, aged to perfection through the years. It possesses a unique and exquisite taste. Of course, humans don't call this wine. This is a special wine for us, and it flows inside your body. That sweet, sweet wine...]
300059.name: Scardel Pinot Noir

300060.flavor: [Do you see the eyes of the audience blinking in the pale moonlight? Don't you want to have a try? You'll be a great stage prop. Well, your blood will. Hee hee.]
300060.name: Moondancer Kata Flina

300061.flavor: [Conundrum, when will you stop quizzing yourself? You should at least try to go to the Quiz Convention. Just one time, please? Everyone else is going.]
300061.name: Crescent Kris Flina

300062.flavor: [Conundrum is still too young. If she tries to take the night quiz, she'll fail. I'm 100% certain. She's just a little girl. Hmph.]
300062.name: Crescent Nyetimber

300063.flavor: [Feel free to talk to me. My heart will listen to every concern you have. Of course, I can't promise that I'll always have a solution.]
300063.name: Scardel Merlot

300064.flavor: [You shouldn't keep all your worries bottled up inside. How about discussing them with Merlot?]
300064.name: Scardel Carmenere

300065.flavor: [Why? Exhausted? If you're tired, then talk to me. We're family, aren't we?]
300065.name: Scardel Shiraz

300066.flavor: [Ugh... What can I do? Should I ask some vampires...? I don't think I'll get the answer just by sitting here doing nothing.]
300066.name: Crescent Woodbridge

300067.flavor: [This is not the time to judge Iri Flina. By withholding judgment, I will protect her for a while longer. The Elders are too arbitrary, so I will handle this by myself.
300067.name: Master Luna Flina

300068.flavor: [Stop thinking inside the box. You'll have to think big if you want something new.]
300068.name: Crescent Deviation

300069.flavor: [Vampires... Aren't they cool? I long for the moon... I want to join you!]
300069.name: Vampire Cultist

300070.flavor: [Sister, why did you give authority to those Elders? We could kill them, and nobody would care.]
300070.name: Red Moon Aka Flina

300071.flavor: [How about letting me handle the Elder issue? The vampire population is just going to get smaller if you give this to Red Moon.]
300071.name: Blue Moon Becky Flina

300072.flavor: [Huh...? Is there something wrong with me?]
300072.name: Zombie

300073.flavor: [I never told them to do anything. I just told those lost little girls about a place where they could relax.]
300073.name: Campus Idol

300074.flavor: [Senpai! If you keep doing this, I'm going to reveal all of our minutes to the teachers!]
300074.name: Council Clerk Fran

300075.flavor: [I've got my eye on you. Even if your name isn't listed now, by the end of the month, your name will be on the demerit list.]
300075.name: Council Suzie

300076.flavor: [The book will be due next week. Please remember to return it.]
300076.name: Lib. Milka

300077.flavor: [It isn't touching their skin, so they still aren't obeying the rules! Their bodies need to be told the consequences of breaking the rules.]
300077.name: Council Casey

300078.flavor: [Don't go over budget this semester. Student council events and compliance with school rules might bring unexpected changes, but no matter what, don't go over budget.]
300078.name: Council Treas. Amy

300079.flavor: [It's no big deal if we go a little over budget, Amy. We can make up for it next semester, so please remember to list my tea costs on the expense report.]
300079.name: Council Pres. Celine

300080.flavor: [Tell me anything, Celine-senpai. There's nothing I can't handle. I've been aware of the grand truths of all creation since I was 10, so please trust me.]
300080.name: Genius Student Nanai

300081.flavor: [Examine everything! Don't let a single clue slip through. Lately, there's been something funny about the maids. They must be doing something behind my back... Hmm...]
300081.name: Detective Lady

300082.flavor: [Listen, class. The basic principle of all magic is to understand the structure of the spell you need. Never forget this. To make sure you remember this, there's going to be a test tomorrow.]
300082.name: Magic Teacher

300083.flavor: [It's such a pity that a uniform like this is only used in those ordinary sorts of schools.]
300083.name: School Envy Lady

300084.flavor: [Her eyes start to open because of a strange voice, but when her eyes are open, no sound can be heard. This cycle repeats itself over and over again. It's said that when her eyes are closed, she can see something.]
300084.name: Insomniac Nanasid

300085.flavor: [This is a sign of obsession. She's obsessed with glasses. She even has a pair of sleeping glasses.]
300085.name: Fanatic Sarah

300086.flavor: [In her case, she has been avoiding contact with people she does not know. In the presence of strangers, she shows signs of extreme anxiety. She has begun blacking out, so further study has been discontinued.]
300086.name: Traumatized Hilde

300087.flavor: [S-Stay away! Felicia, you go first! I'll stop the church's attack myself, no matter what it takes... Will we meet again? Of course!]
300087.name: Stigma Flint

300088.flavor: [You said your name was Nanai, right? I didn't expect this much from you. Remember this! Next time, I won't lose.]
300088.name: Fated Rival Seven

300089.flavor: [Oh, Dr. Kamyu? You... You used to be an OBGYN, didn't you? How did you end up in a place like this...?]
300089.name: Crux Nurse

300090.flavor: [Flint... I'm here... One day, my heart will touch yours. I will wait until that day comes.]
300090.name: Stigma Witness Felicia

300091.flavor: [S-Senpai! I'm doing a research survey for Crux. Could you please spare a moment of your time and answer a few questions? S-Senpai!]
300091.name: Seeker Christina

300092.flavor: [What brought you here to the lab? Did you want to see a woman without the time to date anything but books? Oh, good. Sometimes, I just want people to chat with. Did you have something to say to me?]
300092.name: Seeker Irene

300093.flavor: [What brings you to the church? I'm touched by the belief people have in the Goddess, no matter how busy their lives are. I want to make the church into a place where people can always come when they feel confused or troubled.]
300093.name: Seeker Laura

300094.flavor: [Heh. That book that senpai brought me is really interesting. I was so busy reading that I forgot the time.]
300094.name: Seeker Lucia

300095.flavor: [Don't force yourself. I'll handle the exploration and excavation. I'll also try to keep the knights from getting in the way. Irene, please just focus on research. Where are the next ruins? I want to see more amazing artifacts.]
300095.name: Seeker Melissa

300096.flavor: [No worries. The knights are completely different from the church. We'll guarantee your safety. In the meantime, could you tell us about your little sister in more detail?]
300096.name: Crux Knight Sinclair

300097.flavor: [Another piece... More, just a little more... Aah, this is my world.]
300097.name: Crescent Puzzle

300098.flavor: [How about shopping at night? We can enjoy ourselves on this street without revealing our identities. This place is different from Crux. I like this street.]
300098.name: Scardel Sangiovese

300099.flavor: [I came just like I announced What? Is it reasonable for a thief to be so brash? I'll never give up on anything I want. Every warning is a promise.]
300099.name: Scardel Viognier

300100.flavor: [Eventually, I'm going to finish that tower of books. How will I survive the boredom once I run out of books to read?]
300100.name: Reading Witch

300101.flavor: [We have enough materials around us. What's really important is a person's rhythm, power, and concentration. Now, let's wait until the medicine is completed. It'll bring us sweet dreams.]
300101.name: Cauldron Witch

300102.flavor: [Augh! Was it you girls who messed up my snacks? Why don't you leave us alone?! We didn't do anything to you!]
300102.name: Tea Party Witch

300103.flavor: [This is a tool for the study of witch magic, a heart stone, also known as the treasure of the sages. I just want to live a life of freedom. That's all. Get ready. Refuse to be bound by limits. Open the control circuit. Wipe out all enemies before you!]
300103.name: Heart Stone Witch

300104.flavor: [Grandma always used to say that we should respect everyone's freedoms... Of course, I didn't like grandma.]
300104.name: Undertaker

300105.flavor: [Where is this place? Where is the professor? I can't go back now. I have to make up my mind. But... Who are you, really?] [You don't know the greatest sage of the continent?]
300105.name: Visitor Ophelia

300106.flavor: [The ball will vanish. It's one of my four reversal techniques. To defeat my senpai, I'll train in every ability!
300106.name: Tennis Rhona

300107.flavor: [Your tennis skill can never be perfect. What you are lacking is something you need to discover for yourself.]
300107.name: Tennis Mai

300108.flavor: [It's important to be ready to have the perfect sleep, no matter where or when. I call this technique the perfect camouflage.]
300108.name: Sleep Club Student

300109.flavor: [Ow! Senpai! You can't buy every mysterious book! I wouldn't want these even as a donation! Please don't play pranks like this again!]
300109.name: Lib. Daisy

300110.flavor: [Listen, Serie. Someone put those weird books on the book request list, and it was either you or Lindt. I'm going to reject these, alright? That "Glass Library" publisher was weird to begin with. From now on, any cobalt blue books are going to be rejected. If anyone wants to read them, they should buy them with their own money.]
300110.name: Lib. Manager Lotte

300111.flavor: [Oh, Asmis. What's up? Sita? She said she had something to do in Crux, so she left. What? Kana's descendant? The chosen girl? What are you talking about? Is this some kind of joke?]
300111.name: Sita's Friend Rosie

300112.flavor: [My mother, the Burning Chef, once said these words: If you calm your mind, even a fire will feel cool. Just focus on cooking. Focus on the sounds and the smells.]
300112.name: Cook Club Ace

300113.flavor: [A book about the land of Kana? I can find any book I want. I'm the best library researcher in the world. Trust me, senpai.]
300113.name: Lib. Ace

300114.flavor: [I met with an interesting friend by the name of Elfin.] [Who is that?] [She can make dolls that actually have souls.]
300114.name: Occult Club Iris Juvia

300115.flavor: [Interesting. I'd like to meet her myself and see what kind of person she is. Iris, will you introduce me?]
300115.name: Occult Lady Aimi

300116.flavor: [The monthly discussion isn't over yet? How about settling on just one main topic and focusing on only solving that?]
300116.name: Occult Club Rebecca

300117.flavor: [Everything is going just as planned. Everything is ready. Let's start the game.]
300117.name: Agent Maid

300118.flavor: [Before long, everyone in this household will do as I say.]
300118.name: Cultist Maid

300119.flavor: [When a client trusts me, it's my duty to handle it perfectly. If you have anything that bothers you, why not leave a message with my detective agency?]
300119.name: 2S Agent Nine

300120.flavor: [It's all because I was careless. I should serve this tea to Miss Linia... What? The tea... overflowed?]
300120.name: Silent Maid

300121.flavor: [Cinia. Rose's story was tragic, but it's time to move forward. Can you do that? Cheer up.]
300121.name: Linia Pacifica

300122.flavor: [Hi! Nice to meet you! I'll work hard and become a great knight!]
300122.name: Youngest Knight

300123.flavor: [You think I always look carefree, like I have nothing to worry about? Don't be jealous. I worry about a lot of things!]
300123.name: Arcana Fulle

300124.flavor: [It's not like everyone who likes high places are fools. It's just an old saying.]
300124.name: Arcana XVI Tiwa

300125.flavor: [This watch is so useful. You can even make calls with it.]
300125.name: Arcana I Magision

300126.flavor: [What do we do now, boss? Looks like we'll have to follow this chalice to find more clues. I'm getting pretty excited already.]
300126.name: Seeker Ruth

300127.flavor: [Oh, sorry. Could you please pick up that book?]
300127.name: Seeker Luthera

300128.flavor: [Don't be afraid. Although I keep a low profile, I still lead the Seekers, the holy researchers. I want to see you fulfill your potential.]
300128.name: Seeker Director

300129.flavor: [I'll do this! Trust me and follow!]
300129.name: Vanguard Knight

300130.flavor: [This is so humiliating. I don't know the answer to a question I made up myself.]
300130.name: Crescent Nazo

300131.flavor: [The first doll is doomed to have a sad story. A story of a woman who never was.]
300131.name: Tragedy Doll

300132.flavor: [The second doll is doomed to have a sad story, but in joy. A story of a woman who wasted her life in pointless pleasure.]
300132.name: Opera Doll

300133.flavor: [A box in a box in a box in a box in a box... Looks like the difficulty adjustment failed.]
300133.name: Crescent Maze

300134.flavor: [A story of an unlucky girl who makes dolls. A story of the unfortunate girl whose love was stolen by a blonde ghost returned from the dead.]
300134.name: Dollmaster Elfin Rune

300135.flavor: [The third story is of a doll with dreams that could never be realized. A story of an unfortunate girl who forgot that no matter how big a puppy grows, it's still only a dog.]
300135.name: Lost Doll

300136.flavor: [Places like this rarely get visitors. You said your name was Asmis? The place you're looking for is nearby, but it's also beyond your reach.]
300136.name: Lantern Witch

300137.flavor: [Don't always think about fighting. It falls on me to arbitrate fights between allies.]
300137.name: Mediator Cabernet

300138.flavor: [Where are you from? You don't look like you came from this village.] [I'm looking for the professor.] [Professor?]
300138.name: Sage Esprit

300139.flavor: [It's been a long time since I last guided you through the dungeon. How are you doing? Are you afraid? Don't worry.]
300139.name: Guide Rio

300140.flavor: [Here! It's a rice ball I made myself. So, are you heading to Bamboo Garden?]
300140.name: Cook Club Rookie

300141.flavor: [The library is closed for archival. Could you come later?]
300141.name: Lib. Lilith

300142.flavor: [I found this sword in the storage room. A manual? "To transform, please perform the following poses in this order..."]
300142.name: Council Maron

300143.flavor: [Heartful Catch! I would be ashamed if I gave up now!]
300143.name: Dress Up Maron

300144.flavor: [The key point of Sleep Club is to maintain optimal sleeping conditions... Zzz...]
300144.name: Sleep Club President

300145.flavor: [Sita? Long time no see! How are you? The master misses you so much.]
300145.name: Sister Vermet Vilosa

300146.flavor: [To go to Kana, a key is required. A key to the truth... I have to find it. Who hired Rosie? I have to discover that first. She has to know about Kana for sure.]
300146.name: Sanctuary Hunter Asmis

300147.flavor: [Be careful! This food is for ladies. As maids, please serve this with all your heart.]
300147.name: Chef Maid

300148.flavor: [Hey, you. You're shivering... Why are you so scared? I hope you can respect my hobbies. What do you think? You've got good legs... Heh heh...]
300148.name: Bloody Lady

300150.flavor: [Unlucky... How can I be this unlucky?]
300150.name: Unlucky Lady

300151.flavor: [The essence of a cup of tea lies in the tea leaves and the temperature of the water. Please remember to keep this in mind.]
300151.name: Tea Time Lady

300152.flavor: [Sorry, Asmis. We got a higher-paying request... But you can keep a secret, right?]
300152.name: 2S Agent Fourteen

300153.flavor: [It's been a long time, Vernika. I've missed you, so that's why I came here. Are you alright? You look pale... The curtains? Okay. I'll close them.]
300153.name: Arbiter Rivelta Answer

300154.flavor: [I got a double rare martial arts manual from the eastern continent. It turns out that the rumor about the undefeated school of the east was true.]
300154.name: Seeker Lynn

300155.flavor: [Goddess, I am depending on you. I entrust myself to you completely. Use me to defeat our foes. Amen.]
300155.name: Marksman Knight

300156.flavor: [Is this an artifact? It's really user-friendly. It's even got a manual. If I follow the instructions and push these numbers in order...]
300156.name: Seeker Smartylane

300157.flavor: [It even has pre-written speeches for what to say after transforming. Okay... I need to do this. Heartful Catch! I will show you my cry of justice!]
300157.name: Dress Up Smartylane

300158.flavor: [The moment this spear pierces, the results will be set in stone. You will lose and I will win. This has already been decided.]
300158.name: Lancer Knight

300159.flavor: [Kamyu, don't worry too much about my uniform. It's a service for the patients. ♡]
300159.name: Medic Knight

300160.flavor: [Luthica, carry out what you believe is justice. Hesitation will blunt your sword.]
300160.name: Crux Knight Fleta

300161.flavor: [The Elders are starting to make their moves... What do I do?! I just want to live a quiet life.]
300161.name: Scardel Canaiolo

300162.flavor: [I have to get out of here. I've got a bad feeling about this.]
300162.name: Crescent Muscat

300163.flavor: [I'll end my life as a maid with this. Completing this magic circle is the first step to freedom.]
300163.name: Magic Circle Witch

300164.flavor: [Don't you want to make a contract with me? I'll invite you to a better world!]
300164.name: Contract Witch

300165.flavor: [How boring. I have to say I'm disappointed with our leader. We could use some change around here.]
300165.name: Crescent Elder Riesling

300166.flavor: [Greedy bloodsuckers who disturb the silence of the night. Vampire... Return those lives to God!]
300166.name: Vampire Hunter Ire Flina

300167.flavor: [The change is happening too quickly. Change should come more slowly. How about using the witches?]
300167.name: Scardel Elder Barbera

300168.flavor: [What about that red-haired girl? If she buys those cookies before me, I am going to throw such a fit...]
300168.name: Sweet Lady Isfeldt

300169.flavor: [I love to read quietly by myself. What? Tearing through books? I'd never do that... What are you talking about?
300169.name: Lib. Student

300170.flavor: [Flowers in my hair? What do you mean? My teacher just said the same thing. She even said something about how she hoped that I would fulfill dreams as beautiful as the flowers in my hair.]
300170.name: Council Student

300171.flavor: [The Sleep Club, or officially, the Sleep Research Club, was established by a teacher with insomnia. Although she conducted research on some sleepy kids, she still couldn't find a way to fall asleep.]
300171.name: Sleep Club Advisor

300172.flavor: [I found all the books that senpai recommended, but... What is she playing at? They really loaned out those books?]
300172.name: New Lib. Student

300173.flavor: [Good morning. What's up, Nanai? What's that magic tool you're holding?]
300173.name: Council Weekly Help

300174.flavor: [I joined the Library Club because my sister did, but I don't know about this... Can I really help?]
300174.name: Lib. Milty

300175.flavor: [Celine's support is absolute. I don't know what kind of strategy you have in mind, but it's going to be an uphill battle.]
300175.name: Council VP Tieria

300176.flavor: [Serie, I have to apologize. That cobalt book was pretty good after all. Sorry, Serie. We're still friends, right?]
300176.name: Lib. Lotte & Serie

300177.flavor: [Although we may only know each other for a very short time, I look forward to working in your service.]
300177.name: Dispatch Maid

300178.flavor: [Hm? Oh, no. It's delicious. I just wish that we could have more chances to do this in the future.]
300178.name: Picnic Lady

300179.flavor: [Miss Linia's maids are all so pure and proper. Ah... They're cute, too. I wish I could have just one maid like that.]
300179.name: Peace Lady

300180.flavor: [I don't want to watch my friends' tears! Instead, you should watch! My! Transformation!]
300180.name: Justice Lady

300183.flavor: [I'm happy that you liked the food I prepared, Miss Cinia. Please allow me to cook for you next time as well.]
300183.name: Picnic Maid

300184.flavor: [Linia... This is a little...] [No, it's fine. I'm fine, but it's a little hot.] [Gah! M-Miss Linia!]
300184.name: Chief & Mop Maid

300185.flavor: [Do you understand? We, the Grand Blue Cross, are not an organization that caters to personal interests.]
300185.name: Blue Cross Member

300186.flavor: [It's not much of a stretch to say that we, as members of this secret Crux organization, have a hand in everything.]
300186.name: Blue Cross Sherry

300187.flavor: [I don't need to listen any longer; there's no excusing a sin. This isn't over yet.]
300187.name: Blue Cross Aurora

300188.flavor: [Don't think that the Blue Cross only does nice things and has nothing to hide. Where there's light, there's shadow.]
300188.name: Blue Cross Federine

300189.flavor: [The fighting has already begun. To us, it's nothing, but on the surface, it looks like an opportunity.]
300189.name: Tactician Knight

300190.flavor: [Sorry. Although Head Knight Jaina herself invited us, we are unable to participate at this time. Please deliver this message.]
300190.name: Blue Cross Florence

300191.flavor: [I love to explore because I love to travel. Of course, finishing my work makes me happy too.]
300191.name: Seeker Sarah

300192.flavor: [Did you just laugh at me?] [I just can't let it drop, senpai.] [You just laughed at me about being in a slump, didn't you?]
300192.name: Knight Frett & Pintail

300193.flavor: [In the name of GS! For punch and pie!]
300193.name: GS Soldier

300194.flavor: [This is dangerous... If we want their continued support, we should learn more about them first.]
300194.name: GS Recon

300195.flavor: [The two of us make one detective who will wipe away the city's tears!]
300195.name: Sion Flina

300196.flavor: [Sage Lady started being mean and hitting us with her slippers!]
300196.name: Rion Flina

300197.flavor: [Soldiers, take pride. By fighting at our sides, your strength will grow. We were once like you, but the day will come when you fulfill your potential.]
300197.name: GS Alla Marcia

300198.flavor: [This is a Talent Memory? It's got weird side effects, but whatever! Now, count up your sins!]
300198.name: Dress Up Sionrion

300199.flavor: [Got it! So I'll see you in the lobby this afternoon? What? You aren't done yet? This was assigned to you last Monday! What do you expect me to do about it now?]
300199.name: Office Witch

300200.flavor: [To be honest, I like you just the way you are, Conundrum.] [... Huh?]
300200.name: Crescent Kris & Con.

300201.flavor: [I will deal with them. Maybe I will kill them. Is that alright? I am not asking you for an answer.]
300201.name: Homunculus Escort

300202.flavor: [No key exists that would let you enter Kana; it vanished long ago. However, if you want to go so badly, are you willing to pay with your life? Professor Creuset is performing some experiments, but something has gone wrong.]
300202.name: 1st Witness Kana.DKD

300203.flavor: [The preliminaries are starting soon. I'll work hard so I won't hold my senpai back!]
300203.name: Tennis Nessa

300204.flavor: [I'm reading. Tell me later. Don't bother me.]
300204.name: Lib. Evenne

300205.flavor: [I practiced a lot at home, but I'm still nervous, senpai...]
300205.name: Lib. Lucca

300206.flavor: [I'm supposed to be the accompaniment for the three of us, right? Aren't mascaras a little too simple?] [Maracas.] [Whatever.]
300206.name: Lib. Serie

300207.flavor: [It's alright. Don't worry. All we need is chemistry!
300207.name: Lib. Milka

300208.flavor: [I'm the Library Club's number one member! I left the title of Search King to my kouhai so I could take a break, but I'm finally back! I'm the Hyper Librarian! Tezina!]
300208.name: Lib. H.L. Tezina

300209.flavor: [Don't spill it! ... Why? You're the one who asked for my help in the first place!]
300209.name: Waitress Gart

300210.flavor: [Where's Vernika? Tell me or I'll cut you.]
300210.name: Battlefield Sita

300211.flavor: [Don't stand behind me. I don't like people following me.]
300211.name: 2S Agent Thirteen

300212.flavor: [The Vampire Lands are dangerous. Shall we turn around, Miss Linia?]
300212.name: Guide Maid Guitarian

300213.flavor: [The enemy is always within. To avenge my mother, I must pull the trigger without hesitation.]
300213.name: Lady Misfortune

300214.flavor: [What a fantastic instrument. Once I get used to it, I can play some really great music.]
300214.name: Bass Maid

300215.flavor: [Your drumming is a making the mansion really noisy. Use pads when you practice!]
300215.name: Drum Maid

300216.flavor: [She said she couldn't forget that person. If two hearts can't touch, then one-sided affection is useless. You might as well go kill yourself.]
300216.name: Rainy Blue Lady

300217.flavor: [Begin the operation. Once you have a positive ID on the target student, obtaining the information should be simple.]
300217.name: Agent Nold

300218.flavor: [Tell me. I thought about it constantly, but I still don't understand. Tell me. How could you abandon our sister? Tell me. Do you really love me? Did you really want to kill your own little sister? ... You. I will kill you.]
300218.name: Crimson Witch Cinia

300219.flavor: [We help. No questions asked. That's the basic principle of the Blue Cross.]
300219.name: Blue Cross Assistant

300220.flavor: [We're researching ways to put the denizens of the night to rest.]
300220.name: Blue Cross Ferris

300221.flavor: [I'm in charge of the trumpet that wakes people up in the morning. Hurry up and get dressed!]
300221.name: Knight Prea

300222.flavor: [These gloves are inconvenient, but if I take them off, I won't be a Blue Cross member anymore?]
300222.name: Blue Cross Jainier

300223.flavor: [Exploring ruins is always dangerous. There's no good reason to skip out on training.]
300223.name: Seeker Odien

300224.flavor: [Rookie? Hey, rookie! Do you remember what I said earlier? This battle is only happening because of us, and now we're paying for it.]
300224.name: Knight Lukif

300225.flavor: [The variety is Schiller, originating from Cotes du Rhone. The spicy fragrance and the complex  taste make this an excellent wine. Now, how would you rate it?]
300225.name: Sommelier Sigma

300226.flavor: [Even the air in Crux just feels wrong. I'm going to destroy the whole nation.]
300226.name: Crux Nemesis Luthica

300227.flavor: [This is just a simple card trick. I don't know any other magic.]
300227.name: Trick Witch

300228.flavor: [The moon looks lovely from the water. Do you want to join me? Don't worry. I don't bite.]
300228.name: Crescent Aligote

300229.flavor: [Really? I can do whatever I want? I can burn and torch everything as much as I like? Ahahahaha! I love you guys. I get to burn as much as I want!]
300229.name: Hellfire Witch

300230.flavor: [For the glory of GS! Mission accomplished. What's our next assignment? Are we going to Crux?]
300230.name: GS Agent

300231.flavor: [My mission is to deliver the general's message and lead everyone. The distorted wheel of time turns again, and everything points to Crux.]
300231.name: GS Colonel Z

300232.flavor: [Disaster finally came down on our leader, but somehow, I just can't bring myself to care. Moving on, what do you other Elders think about the invasion situation? If Crux wants to bring ruin to our home, we could use this opportunity to have those filthy mixed-bloods shield us, couldn't we?]
300232.name: Crescent Elder Chenin

300233.flavor: [Now.... Kneel before me. Look up. That's right. I'm different from the losers who stood around doing nothing. I think I'll enjoy the nights a little more, now.]
300233.name: Dark Master Vernika

300234.flavor: [Vernika. I will free you from the frivolous night. This sword of fifteen magical eyes can kill you.]
300234.name: Vampire Hunter Iri

300235.flavor: [Vote for your favorite girl! It's too bad I didn't get to be a candidate this time.]
300235.name: L. Rio

300236.flavor: [This is the first step. Never forget how you feel at this moment.]
300236.name: Game Starter

300237.flavor: [The seasons don't matter. I'm doing this now because peoples' desires peak in the winter. So what do you wish for? A rose witch?]
300237.name: Summer Santa Ninian

300238.flavor: [Our school is having an event soon, and it's very important. No problems or accidents will be tolerated.]
300238.name: Council Dispatch Layna

300239.flavor: [Now I'm working here too... Right? It's still a little awkward, so... Aheh.]
300239.name: Linia's Maid Seron

300240.flavor: [I'm really tired. I think I'll take a nap. Now where did I put my glasses?]
300240.name: Seeker Lydia

300241.flavor: [What are the Elders trying to do? They can't just make any moves they want. I need to investigate this.]
300241.name: Luna Flina

300242.flavor: [Tell me. Heads? Tails? Same odds, really. You wouldn't be one of those people stupid enough to think it'll land on tails just because it landed on heads last time, would you? Heh... But I like those kinds of people.]
300242.name: Coin Girl

300243.flavor: [One shot with all my soul. This is my favorite saying. There's no turning back. You can only win.]
300243.name: Tennis Ace

300244.flavor: [The event is coming soon, so I can't take it easy. I can't lose to my big sister. I have to get everything ready!]
300244.name: Council Roroa

300245.flavor: [Her cooking skills are one thing, but her knife skills are unmatched in the entire Federation. She can slice ingredients faster than the eye can see.]
300245.name: Cook Club Elsfi

300246.flavor: [The event is nearly here. I'm just checking to make sure everything is working as planned. Be sure you're using approved materials and that there are no problems with the food.]
300246.name: Council Coordinator

300248.flavor: [Gah! I'm late! I need to brush my teeth and wash my hair, and, oh, dry my hair... Ah! The time! The time!]
300248.name: Tennis Lure

300249.flavor: [This is an apron designed specifically for the school's special restaurant. How does it look? It's a nice design, isn't it?]
300249.name: Campus Waitress

300250.flavor: [Well... This equipment can finally see the light of day again... *cough* Eew. Look at that dust!]
300250.name: Council Exec. Maron

300251.flavor: [Why are you giving me that look? Are you lying to me? Go ahead. Try to lie.]
300251.name: Doubt Lady

300252.flavor: [It's a rainbooow! Eek! I'm soaking wet!]
300252.name: Rainbow Lady

300253.flavor: [What is this? Do it again. All of it. This place must be spotless.]
300253.name: Perfect Lady

300254.flavor: [If it's in the sea, leave it to me! There's no ship that can escape my mines. My art is an explosion!]
300254.name: 2S Sink Queen 571

300255.flavor: [She has the power to turn her body into mist. When she absorbs the sword of mist into her body, no one can track her.]
300255.name: Mist Lady

300256.flavor: [Hm? Am I at a disadvantage? My body is in peak condition. I can win this!]
300256.name: Beach Volleyball Lady

300257.flavor: [Don't just listen to my sound. Listen to your heart. The guitar's six strings carry a message of the human experience.]
300257.name: Guitar Maid

300258.flavor: [Some time ago, girls with special powers began to appear in the Royle Academy. No one knows why those girls hid their abilities, and no one knows why they started to display them openly.]
300258.name: Ice Lady

300259.flavor: [I have to leave this delicious food behind and report to duty now. I can't be late!]
300259.name: Supplier Knight

300260.flavor: [I have the key on me. Can you figure out where it is?]
300260.name: Blue Cross Noel

300261.flavor: [Make sure you always maintain your equipment and supplies. If you lose anything, we won't replace it for you. Keep that in mind.]
300261.name: Knight Manager

300262.flavor: [Ah? It's been a while. There's something noisy happening outside. I wonder what it is.]
300262.name: Blue Cross Elda

300263.flavor: [This school uniform is too tight. I couldn't find a uniform that fit, so this is going to interfere with my activities.]
300263.name: Blue Cross Linda

300264.flavor: [I guard this door. However, I don't carry a key. I just watch the people go about their business.]
300264.name: Blue Cross Lifreya

300265.flavor: [I have to spread the word... The GS have entered Crux!]
300265.name: Messenger Knight

300266.flavor: [How much longer do I have to keep cleaning up after you? Even if you gave me a raise, would it really be worth the work? What are you even doing?]
300266.name: Quartermaster Knight

300267.flavor: [The fighter created by the Scardel Elders with no personality, but maximum fighting ability. With every victim, she seeks to become more and more efficient.]
300267.name: Scardel Unit Felgus

300268.flavor: [The fighter created by the Crescent Elders with an emphasis on independence and adaptability. She can accomplish her duties even in the light of day.]
300268.name: Crescent Unit Azoth

300269.flavor: [Oops, I forgot to take off my scarf. Am I... caught?]
300269.name: GS Spy

300270.flavor: [This is my second year with the GS. I will destroy everything anything in my way.]
300270.name: GS Assault Soldier

300271.flavor: [I respect your goal and will. However, I'll have to reject your offer as I prefer my own freedom, Witch Queen.]
300271.name: Lightning Witch

300272.flavor: [This is a special opportunity for you. Please look at this proposal and make an appropriate decision.]
300272.name: Business Witch

300273.flavor: [You want to be the center of the Federation? You dream big. I like your scheme, but next time, come back with a better situation. That's when I'll think about it.]
300273.name: Creepy Witch

300274.flavor: [The GS has nine Stars. I am the first among them. Once we are in place in Crux, the Second Star will come looking for us.]
300274.name: GS 1st Star

300275.flavor: [The fate of those who pass through the door will be changed. My role is to destroy those fates. Do not interfere, DKD.]
300275.name: 2nd Witness Kana.DND

300276.flavor: [The origin of the magical power in the coins is desire. Desire drives everything. Happy Birthday!]
300276.name: Coin Lady

300277.flavor: [I can't make any exceptions. Look over the fireworks budget again and resubmit it.]
300277.name: Council Event Inspector

300278.flavor: [The Tennis Club event is open! Come and visit us!]
300278.name: Tennis Guide

300279.flavor: [I don't deny every student request, but you should really rethink your list of book requests, Serie.]
300279.name: Lib. Advisor

300280.flavor: [She's the daughter of the owner of "Omnivore", the Federation's greatest four-star restaurant. Even now, she prepares food with a talentium knife and has the power to make delicious meals.]
300280.name: Cook Club Critic

300281.flavor: [I'm Winfield, from student news. I'm here to take a picture of the president. Is she in a swimsuit? ... Gotta sell that.]
300281.name: Council Press Winfield

300282.flavor: [There's something happening in Crux. Layna, could you take care of mother while I'm out? I think this is worth seeing.]
300282.name: Lunia Scentriver

300283.flavor: [My replacement still isn't here... How much longer do I have to mop...? Augh....]
300283.name: Dejected Maid

300284.flavor: [After negotiations for better working conditions and a higher salary failed, she finally left Cinia.]
300284.name: Unemployed Maid

300285.flavor: [Lady Rainia has been studying a ritual to create rain. On most days, she has a 20% chance of success, but during the hotter seasons, it's super effective.]
300285.name: Occult Lady Rainia

300286.flavor: [Everything looks beautiful in the rain. In this outfit, I don't need to be concerned about getting wet, right?] [Lady Charlotte...  Using an umbrella as well is unnecessary.]
300286.name: Occult Lady Charlotte

300287.flavor: [Her power comes from jealousy. Lilianna is 26 years old, and she wants to destroy every couple she sees.]
300287.name: Envy Lady

300288.flavor: [Why can't I do whatever I want? The new chairman ignores us, and it's boring to just practice on monsters day after day. It's no fun unless it's with an actual person.]
300288.name: Shock Lady Elberto

300289.flavor: [... You want to enlist? This is no place for sheltered ladies like you.]
300289.name: Knight Lady

300290.flavor: [Are they crazy? Why is it suddenly okay to start recruiting Myo clan?]
300290.name: Crux Knight Renya

300291.flavor: [I sell flowers on the street, but my real job is to find truth among rumors.]
300291.name: Blue Cross June

300292.flavor: [Amethystar! Work more carefully! You wouldn't want to damage any priceless artifacts.]
300292.name: Seeker Melissa

300293.flavor: [Yeah, yeah. I know. By the way, Melissa. I've been wondering. What are those things that are always on your head?]
300293.name: Seeker Amethystar

300294.flavor: [It's scary! Water is like space! Humans can't breathe it!] [You may have the power to manipulate water, 2-A Corporal Swimie, but if you're going to act like that, it's not going to be easy...]
300294.name: Crux Knight Swimie

300295.flavor: [This is the day when the power of water is strongest. Water spells have the best chance of success today.]
300295.name: Wednesday Witch

300296.flavor: [A Scardel fighter. She doesn't have any confirmed kills yet, but in the last battle against Crux, she proved her worth by engulfing the whole place in flames.]
300296.name: Scardel Unit Antares

300297.flavor: [A Crescent anti-personnel fighter. When she picks a target, she single-mindedly removes it.]
300297.name: Crescent Unit Gungnir

300298.flavor: [So these are the new weapons they sent out. How do I shoot with this thing? Where are the arrows?]
300298.name: GS Sniper

300299.flavor: [There's the flare. It's red; they must have accomplished step one, but something's wrong. They couldn't find the portal?]
300299.name: GS 2nd Star

300300.flavor: [Already here? Great! Got your ticket? Step on the gas!]
300300.name: Soul Conductor Charon

300301.flavor: [People who distort time and space to create their own worlds cannot be forgiven.  My duty is to preserve the balance of the worlds by erasing unnecessary worlds.]
300301.name: 3rd Witness Kana.DTD

300302.flavor: [Congratulations, producer! Your perfect plans brought your desires to life! Happy birthday!]
300302.name: Coin Producer Ritz

300303.flavor: [Never put your sword down! This is the basic rule of sword fighting!]
300303.name: Blade Tutor Grace

300320.flavor: [Esprit muttered. Somewhere in her room, there was something she could use to modify it.]
300320.name: Sword Girls Sita

300321.flavor: [Vernika, what's with this outfit?] [You're so cute, Sita! This concept will definitely help us win Fashion Queen!] [I don't feel like it.]] [Come ooon, Sita! Okay?]
300321.name: Animal Suit Sita

300322.flavor: [I found it! I thought I'd have to look all over the world!]
300322.name: Sword Girls Cinia

300323.flavor: [It suits you, Cinia.] [I do like pandas, but this outfit is a bit much, Linia. Please give me something else to wear. Fashion Queen? What is that?]
300323.name: Animal Suit Cinia

300324.flavor: [Sage Lady, what are you doing? ... She's not listening.] [Luthica... Grrr...]
300324.name: Sword Girls Luthica

300325.flavor: [Luthica, how are your new pajamas? Lu... Luthica? They're pajamas, but you still have to wear something under. Oh no! What's that string?!] [A... a sacrifice for fashion... *sniffle*]
300325.name: Animal Suit Luthica

300326.flavor: [Esprit is obsessed with those girls from that other world.]
300326.name: Sword Girls Iri

300327.flavor: [Wait, what? Why do I have to wear such a low-quality costume? Explain right now!] [If you gave me more time and money...] [No excuses! We can't win Fashion Queen like this!]
300327.name: Animal Suit Iri

300328.flavor: [I want to take a picture of the student council looking cool. I'll be with you anytime, anywhere!]
300328.name: Council Press Student

300329.flavor: [A maid that manages other maids. A white collar maid who doesn't do any actual chores. No one knows why the position exists, but it's probably because the master hates doing work.]
300329.name: Producer Maid

300330.flavor: [Did you find the artifact? I'll have to see it to believe it. This discovery could change Crux history. It can't be used carelessly.]
300330.name: Seeker Irene

300331.flavor: [I could finally open my very own pastry store. Attention customers! If you pay extra, you'll get a free mug!]
300331.name: Artisan Baker Witch

300332.flavor: [Agh! You idiots! Are you doing things without my approval? ... Oh, that's it. You asked for it!] [Coo! Coo! Coo! Coo!] [Hurry...] [H-Hang on, Sita! Ack! It's burned!]
300332.name: Council Gart & Sita

300333.flavor: [The new maid. They call her "The Last Accident." It seems unlikely that all of her accidents are just bad luck.]
300333.name: Cinia's New Maid

300334.flavor: [I see stars, butterflies, and the endless sky.] [Your psychological state has a lot of anxiety and insecurity, Adjutant. You should exercise caution.]
300334.name: Knight Adjt. Luthica

300335.flavor: [The day is coming. The day when the shadow of the Witch's Tower, filled with the accumulated knowledge of the witches, will cover Vampire Lands. It's time to balance things out.]
300335.name: Witch Hunter Becky Flina

300336.flavor: [The mother of Layna and Lunia Scentriver. She vanished after she was sent to the Empire. She is now a legend.]
300336.name: Fiona Scentriver

300337.flavor: [Wow... To think that our school had a library like this in the basement.]
300337.name: Lib. Explorer Rhea

300338.flavor: [The number of books in the underground library is nearly infinite. Before I graduate, I will complete this map.]
300338.name: Lib. Explorer Kamit

300339.flavor: [This is a a first-year member of the student council who has taken charge of public relations. With her golden hair, emerald eyes, and that little fang, she's attracted as many fans as any idol. A lot of students came to see her today, too.]
300339.name: Council Press Lyrica

300340.flavor: [She likes girls, and she does a poor job of hiding it. If people happen to be girls, then she loves them all. They call her the Lady Lover.]
300340.name: LL Lady Tomo

300341.flavor: [Linia began gathering the witches. The witches that her letter touched left their nests to gather under her. Zislana is one of them, but she has a horrible sense of direction.]
300341.name: Witch Cadet Zislana

300342.flavor: [Hot winds! Hurricane! I summon the elemental power of the Lord of Wind! He is the magnificent Cy-] [Lady! What are you doing?!]
300342.name: Elemental Lady Chirushi

300343.flavor: [What do you think is the most important tool to bring to a battle? It's a shovel! A shovel! With a shovel, you can even destroy mountains! Don't look down upon the 7th squad!]
300343.name: Knight Sgt. Seyfarf

300344.flavor: [The code that Irene deciphered utilizes the literature of a particular era, so these have become an important key.]
300344.name: Seeker Sarah

300345.flavor: [This is the girl without memories who joined the knights with Rose. She was appointed to a special task force that served directly under the new head knight. She won't talk to anyone but Rose.]
300345.name: Knight Veltier

300346.flavor: [This is to spread God's teachings. As proof of the enlightenment that our shaman speaks of, we will reveal God's true form.]
300346.name: Aletheian B-NA

300347.flavor: [A judge? The end? I don't know. I just like the teachings of the Aletheians, so I want to practice them each day to show my faith.]
300347.name: Aletheian A-GA

300348.flavor: [Just sign here. It's time to put your faith to use. Nooow... We will share God's rewards with you.]
300348.name: Apostle Schindler K Eru

300349.flavor: ["She's dangerous and she's a suspect, so she must be secured." Codename: VAN-KIRAS. In order to erase unstable worlds early and defeat their architects, she possesses the ultimate power of suppression. She has no equal in any world.]
300349.name: 4th Witness Kana.DDT

300350.flavor: [My policy is to eliminate all possible risks.]
300350.name: Kana.DTD

300351.flavor: [Her ability to shrink herself is helpful for exploring places within the massive underground library.]
300351.name: Lib. Explorer Vitelle

300352.flavor: [Within the underground library exists only the smell of old books and pitch black darkness. With a flashlight in hand, I proceed nervously. It sounded like some old books fell somewhere! I hear something skittering! Did I imagine it?]
300352.name: Lib. Explorer Orte

300353.flavor: [I heard a rumor. "I saw a monster," they said.]
300353.name: Lib. Explorer Ritana

300354.flavor: [She has more talent than an ordinary person, but whenever she fails, she always gets really depressed. As a result, she can never get high scores.]
300354.name: Witch Cadet Dauner

300357.flavor: [Everyone's just digging around in the dirt, hoping an artifact shows up? Artifacts aren't going to show up just because you read and dig holes.]
300357.name: Seeker Alameda

300358.flavor: [This artifact joins bodies together. What do you think? Does my partner look healthy? Heh heh...]
300358.name: Seeker Adalia

300360.flavor: [People have to eat! In order to free ourselves from the cycle of poverty, we have to change! Are you hungry? Eat this.]
300360.name: Aletheian C-EDA

300361.flavor: [Don't lose your faith. Let this book be your compass.]
300361.name: Apostle D-RA

300363.flavor: [This isn't the place either; everything's outdated. We can't use this place. There aren't any gates we can use as a point of entry.]
300363.name: One-Winged Edelfelt

300364.flavor: [It's nice to meet you. Wearing a school uniform again really takes me back.]
300364.name: Council Temp Sinclair

300365.flavor: [Sh-shut up! Will you stop staring at me like that? It's making me dizzy!]
300365.name: Lady Nanai

300366.flavor: [So this is your uniform? Grandma once said that clothes are like wings. I can't fly, though... How boring.]
300366.name: Fake Knight Undertaker

300368.flavor: [Um... Attention... Please listen...] [The megaphone that the president handed her was pointless at best.]
300368.name: Council Press Maiyen

300369.flavor: [Even on cold days like this, we still have to watch over the school gates. Isn't it too much?]
300369.name: Gatekeeper Prefect

300370.flavor: [President, don't be lazy. I know I'm not the only one thinking that, but you know how even eagles hide their talons?]
300370.name: Council Enforcer Bella

300371.flavor: [The toughest, peerless, greatest master of cleaning and cooking. Any kind of housework that she takes over is finished in a flash.]
300371.name: Supersonic Maid

300372.flavor: [Faster than light! This broom cuts across the sky!]
300372.name: Witch Cadet Ruin

300373.flavor: [Every star we can see has some importance.]
300373.name: Cosmo Lady Tikin

300374.flavor: [The goddess's army can never be defeated! For the glory of the goddess!]
300374.name: Seeker Lynn

300375.flavor: [Hm... I smell a new artifact. How exciting. What kind of item could it be this time?]
300375.name: Seeker Finder

300376.flavor: [The Seekers have been focusing on studying artifacts until now. Now is the time to use their power. For the glory of the goddess!]
300376.name: Seeker Taras

300377.flavor: [That's right. Trust me. That place has what you desire.]
300377.name: Apostle Reshuri

300378.flavor: [Hey! Over there! Form a line. Crowds always bring trouble.]
300378.name: Aletheian E-ROMA

300379.flavor: [Ah... You have a lot of guts to look me in the eyes. Shall we see if you have the skill to back it up?]
300379.name: Scardel Grenache

300380.flavor: [I don't believe in wishes. I think that just being able to go to sleep and live to see the next morning is lucky. I ended up falling deeper and deeper.]
300380.name: Tearless Rinoa

300381.flavor: [You're missing out on some good food. Hey! You over there. Come try some of this.] [Her recruitment tactics are a bit strange.]
300381.name: Council Press Rouyer

300382.flavor: [Joining the student council is like a dream come true.]
300382.name: New Council Student

300383.flavor: [Celine has returned to the duties of the student council president. Sometimes, she appears to be uneasy, but she's actually very calm and stable.]
300383.name: Council Pres. Celine

300384.flavor: [No matter what happens, she'll never give up. Her family motto is to have an indomitable will. However, her family went under; regardless, she still won't give up.]
300384.name: Indomitable Lady

300385.flavor: [For real? Wooow! Are you out of your mind? That fast?]
300385.name: Gale Witch Cadet

300386.flavor: [I merely give the students suggestions for what they should do.]
300386.name: Royle Chair Lady Linia

300387.flavor: [Don't neglect organization. You never know when your life may depend on it.]
300387.name: Seeker Eizit

300388.flavor: [On most days, I'm the idol of the shop: the waitress! However, my true identity is...!]
300388.name: Blue Cross Infiltrator

300389.flavor: [Pursuing research in order to slake your thirst for knowledge... Isn't that enough? Using ancient powers to fight... What are you trying to achieve?]
300389.name: Seeker Dir. Sigmund

300390.flavor: [I will be the lantern to guide you who wander through the darkness. Please listen to the teachings that I bring.]
300390.name: Aletheian F-RIVA

300391.flavor: [Have you ever seen a vampire drinking blood? I can't hold myself back any longer. Ire... I miss you. I wonder how a vampire-hunting vampire's blood tastes.]
300391.name: Crescent Enemy Neki

300392.flavor: [Even among the witches, she's very mysterious, as if she lived in a different time from the others.] [What do you desire? Eternal youth? Isn't that a trivial thing?]
300392.name: Time Witch Herionne

300393.flavor: ["How have you been? I see that Esprit is still as cute as ever," the woman asked Rio. This is one of the reasons that Crux protected her. More specifically, Rio is not an existence that is completely rooted in this world.]
300393.name: Aberrant Rio

300394.flavor: [Transform! Go! Musiciter Dress Up! This is the melody of the soul, roused by our fingertips!]
300394.name: Dress Up Kar Vistas

300395.flavor: [Something's going on in that detective agency. Rosie's actually been getting orders from the Secret Service too!]
300395.name: Council Sleuth Asmis

300396.flavor: [The chair's activities are strange. I have to investigate the Royle Academy's restricted areas. Something is going on...]
300396.name: Witch Cadet Linus Falco

300397.flavor: [This assignment may be very dangerous for Veltier. Please reconsider this assignment, Head Knight...]
300397.name: Crux Knight Rose

300398.flavor: [My mission is to spread our teachings and show the people the right path.]
300398.name: Head Apostle Helena

300399.flavor: [The cold energizes me. It helps me identify which students are troublemakers.]
300399.name: Council Help Monthly

300400.flavor: [Her luck is terrible. She can't defeat her hunger, and every time she goes to the club room, the door is closed.]
300400.name: Unlucky Cook Club Girl

300401.flavor: [There isn't enough room for two aces, senpai. Isn't it about time you stepped down?] [I could, but do you have the right to be my successor, Miss Tesla?]
300401.name: Two Lib. Aces

300402.flavor: [Whaaat? Is this some kind of joke? This is sooo annoying!]
300402.name: Delinquent Witch Cadet

300403.flavor: [I don't have to do anything like mopping anymore! I'll find my own path in life!]
300403.name: Witch Cadet Maid

300404.flavor: [This lady leaves her fate to the cards. She firmly believes that her future can be found within them.]
300404.name: Destiny Lady

300405.flavor: [Have you seen Rose? She's so feminine and cool! Hm... She's really different from my sister.]
300405.name: Crux Knight Siskin

300406.flavor: [We Seekers have become powerful in combat because of the artifacts, but I wonder if it's really alright to rely on them... It frightens me.]
300406.name: Seeker Ina

300407.flavor: [This artifact allows you to commune with animals. Interesting, isn't it? These children have their own laws and ideas, too. In the name of the Goddess.]
300407.name: Seeker Tommygun

300408.flavor: [You can't. Are you trying to take away my teddy bear, too?] [The girl in the basement hugged the ruined teddy bear tightly.]
300408.name: Crescent Ben Rie

300409.flavor: [That's right. Your sacrifices will not be in vain. Now, press onward!] [The believers responded to her eloquence.]
300409.name: Apostle Pi

300410.flavor: [Thank you, sister.] [I gave in to those words. Those words melted all of my negative thoughts away like snow. I always maintained a calm and dignified exterior because I knew that whenever I turned around, I could hear warm words from my younger sister. I could give everything up when I heard those words.]
300410.name: GS 4th Star

300411.flavor: [The last part of Nold's report was Kitt. She is the guardian of the world's lamentation and sorrow.] [Really now...? You think you've found a way to ease my burden! Hah! Yeah, right. I don't believe you, but I'll come along.]
300411.name: Black Myo Kitt

300412.flavor: [I wonder where those beings called outsiders come from and how they got here... There are also cases of beings simply passing through this world. This year's outsider is this woman. -Esprit]
300412.name: Black Dragon Incarnate

300413.flavor: [Is something bothering you? Don't hide your desires. They're as plain as the sky is blue.]
300413.name: Coin Child

300414.flavor: [Youse in trouble too? Thought you'd just be just okay if ya came here? Well, I can take ya home, so hold on!]
300414.name: Engineer Gepette

300415.flavor: [You're still only making cookies every day? While I was out there doing other things, this is all you did? *nom nom* ... and the taste isn't even that good.]
300415.name: Cook Club Crasher

300416.flavor: [Huh? Too many? Aren't tools the most important things for a cook?]
300416.name: Cook Club Amanda

300417.flavor: [Isn't it thrilling to cook when you're tiny? It feels like I'm a chef mouse!]
300417.name: Cook Club Ritafarit

300419.flavor: [Everything is thanks to Musiciter! We will change your destiny!]
300419.name: Musiciter Lady Elfenritt

300420.flavor: [Come back! We will wash this world's tears away!]
300420.name: Musiciter Lady Freesia

300421.flavor: [Is this... an artifact?] [At that moment, a voice echoed through Melissa's head.] [Melissa? Only you can hear this voice.]
300421.name: Seeker Eternia

300422.flavor: [Next time, I'm aiming for your throat. Watch yourself, even if you don't see anything, and even if you don't hear anything.]
300422.name: Crux Knight Pipit

300423.flavor: [This shield has been blessed by the goddess. Can it even be scratched?]
300423.name: Crux Knight Ibis

300424.flavor: [No. It's my doll... No.] [There wasn't just one girl locked up in the basement clutching a teddy bear. What kind of place is this...?]
300424.name: Crescent Silvaner

300425.flavor: [Each witch chooses a familiar based on her own preference. Among the wide variety of familiars that witches have chosen, there are even some that can't even be categorized as animals. There exist some witches who have gone to the forest to make fairy dryads their familiars.]
300425.name: Witch Familiar Chuchu

300426.flavor: [What a lovely night. Should I go make someone happy? Romantic love? Passionate love? Hahaha.]
300426.name: Enchanting Witch Curea

300427.flavor: [I'm looking for my master's stuff... Have you seen it? My name? Sita Vilosa.]
300427.name: Sita Vilosa

300428.flavor: [Hahaha... Does anyone exist, other than myself, who can truly be called the perfect blend of wit and beauty?]
300428.name: Cinia Pacifica

300429.flavor: [My name is Luthica Preventer! I fight for the pride of the Crux Knights. Prepare yourself.]
300429.name: Luthica Preventer

300430.flavor: [What kind of person would make me an outcast just because my existence is different? My name... Iri. Iri Flina.]
300430.name: Iri Flina

300446.flavor: [You want to go look around in the underground library? Well... right now is a bit tough, Miss Asmis.]
300446.name: Lib. Librarian Milka

300447.flavor: [Sitaaa! The W2T Bakery has some new bread today. Do you want to go try some?]
300447.name: Tennis Fiddle

300448.flavor: [What business do you have at the Tennis Club? Are you interested in joining? If you apply now, you can join easily!]
300448.name: Tennis Advisor Miki

300449.flavor: [Rumor has it that a spirit roams the deepest parts of the underground library.]
300449.name: Spirit of the Library

300450.flavor: [I'm a slow starter. I'm gradually burning brighter.]
300450.name: Heat Lady

300451.flavor: [People usually call me cute, but... I would rather be called pretty.]
300451.name: Lady Cutie

300452.flavor: [I will definitely find whatever I set my sights on. That is, as long as I deem it worthy.]
300452.name: Lady Detective

300453.flavor: [This warmth is nice. Working is good, but sometimes I need to rest.]
300453.name: Southern Lady

300454.flavor: [Do you wish to test your luck?]
300454.name: Executioner Knight

300455.flavor: [This sound will wake people up no matter what. It's a Pavlovian response that you'll never forget for as long as you live.]
300455.name: Crux Knight Prea

300456.flavor: [You will not see the end of this day!]
300456.name: Crux Knight Kraros

300457.flavor: [The sword is a mirror that reflects its owner.]
300457.name: Crux Knight Oclette

300458.flavor: [Rion! Stop that! My skirt...] [Hmph. You still get embarrassed, even though it looks nice.]
300458.name: Scardel Sion Rion Flina

300459.flavor: [If you require aid, we will provide it. The Myo Clan can move freely through the shadows.]
300459.name: Myo Informant

300460.flavor: [I'm cooperating with you because it's our leader's wish, but I don't need any help. I will just eliminate everything in my way.]
300460.name: GS 6th Star

300461.flavor: [The summoning preparations weren't quite sufficient, but it was still enough to make something happen.] [The God of Truth? Don't make me laugh. I'm not that fool.]
300461.name: Ancient Forgotten God

300462.flavor: [Today's front page of the Vita Daily is about a rumor about the recently discovered underground library! Please subscribe!]
300462.name: Council Press Hermes

300463.flavor: [This weekend, we're having a welcoming party for a new club member! You're coming, right Sita?]
300463.name: Cook Club Katie

300464.flavor: [I... I'm just here to talk to that girl!] [But doesn't that apron look good on you?]
300464.name: Cook Club Apprentice Iri

300465.flavor: [I think you'll like this wine I prepared. How are you enjoying the picnic?]
300465.name: Glasses Maid

300466.flavor: [I'm a manager, so why do I have to do this sort of work? Where did that maid go?]
300466.name: Producer Maid

300467.flavor: [Royle Academy's mystery-unraveling duo. The shadow pursuer, Vid and the lightning-quick thinker, Ron. These two have begun investigating the chairman's plans.]
300467.name: Lady Vid & Lady Lon

300468.flavor: [C-Could this be revenge for being late to my shift?]
300468.name: Guard Knight

300469.flavor: [A place like this under the school... How surprising.]
300469.name: Crux Knight Mytyl

300470.flavor: [Yes. I am L...eader of the Blue Cross.]
300470.name: Blue Cross Leader

300471.flavor: [... My memory is fuzzy. I feel like I know this place.]
300471.name: Crescent Kris Flina

300472.flavor: [Did someone come here before us? Well, they'll have to get out of our way.]
300472.name: Red Moon Aka Flina

300473.flavor: [I have to agree with Red Moon this time. Our number one priority is our safety.]
300473.name: Blue Moon Becky Flina

300474.flavor: [I'm the secretary, but... Susie has been writing more things than me... Didn't I become secretary to write things down?]
300474.name: Council Clerk Fran

300475.flavor: [The air here is strange... The principles of fluids don't apply to this place. Does magic reside in the air?]
300475.name: Lib. Bernoulli

300476.flavor: [Call number 63i.7.F215f... The "i" doesn't refer to the alphabet. Could the rumor of the imaginary sector be referring to this underground library?]
300476.name: Nanai Highcastle

300477.flavor: [I did it! I did it! I won the lottery! Jack! Pot! Now I can join the world of the ladies!]
300477.name: Jackpot Maid

300478.flavor: [Somehow, everything is so boring when Master Cinia isn't bullying me... Am I a masochist?]
300478.name: Lonely Maid

300479.flavor: [Master Rose hasn't returned. I have to have someone to work for.]
300479.name: Madness Maid

300480.flavor: [Yes, next patient. Where does it hurt?]
300480.name: Blue Cross Member

300481.flavor: [What am I thinking about? About when I first came here... It hasn't been that long, but it feels like the distant past. I wonder if I've grown a little?]
300481.name: Crux Knight Cygnus

300482.flavor: [It's dark, and there are so many books... For some reason, I've got a bad feeling about this place. More importantly, Pintail-senpai is a staff sergeant now... Maybe I'm next...?!]
300482.name: Flag Knight Frett

300483.flavor: [The energy here feels familiar. Is she coming?]
300483.name: Undertaker

300484.flavor: [Could it be that the vampires can no longer be found in their own lands?]
300484.name: Ire Flina

300485.flavor: [Our leader believes "that" thing is here in this... library?]
300485.name: GS 5th Star

300486.flavor: [Everyone! Say it with me! If we all sing together, we can achieve quadruple happiness!]
300486.name: White Whale Crevasse

300487.flavor: [Esprit wasn't very different from how she is now when she was young.] [Do you have a problem?]
300487.name: L. Esprit

300488.flavor: [Gerangeran is celebrating the first anniversary of Sword Girls.]
300488.name: Year 1 Gerangeran

300489.flavor: [Kim Sang Min is celebrating the first anniversary of Sword Girls.]
300489.name: Year 1 Kim Sang Min

300490.flavor: [Rang Ddo is celebrating the first anniversary of Sword Girls.]
300490.name: Year 1 Rang Ddo

300491.flavor: [Masatokki is celebrating the first anniversary of Sword Girls.]
300491.name: Year 1 Masatokki

300492.flavor: [Jung Pil Won is celebrating the first anniversary of Sword Girls.]
300492.name: Year 1 Jung Pil Won

300493.flavor: [Hwansang Gobuk is celebrating the first anniversary of Sword Girls.]
300493.name: Year 1 Hwansang Gobuk

300494.flavor: [Onesound is celebrating the first anniversary of Sword Girls.]
300494.name: Year 1 Onesound

300495.flavor: [Onesound is celebrating the first anniversary of Sword Girls.]
300495.name: Year 1 Onesound

300496.flavor: [Onesound is celebrating the first anniversary of Sword Girls.]
300496.name: Year 1 Sita

300497.flavor: [Onesound is celebrating the first anniversary of Sword Girls.]
300497.name: Year 1 Cinia

300498.flavor: [Onesound is celebrating the first anniversary of Sword Girls.]
300498.name: Year 1 Luthica

300499.flavor: [Onesound is celebrating the first anniversary of Sword Girls.]
300499.name: Year 1 Iri

300500.flavor: [JOANA is celebrating the first anniversary of Sword Girls.]
300500.name: Year 1 JOANA

300501.flavor: [Bungurly is celebrating the first anniversary of Sword Girls.]
300501.name: Year 1 Bungurly

300502.flavor: [Gil Se is celebrating the first anniversary of Sword Girls.]
300502.name: Year 1 Gil Se

300503.flavor: [SALT is celebrating the first anniversary of Sword Girls.]
300503.name: Year 1 SALT

300504.flavor: [Dova is celebrating the first anniversary of Sword Girls.]
300504.name: Year 1 Dova

300505.flavor: [Yami is celebrating the first anniversary of Sword Girls.]
300505.name: Year 1 Yami

300506.flavor: [Guigui is celebrating the first anniversary of Sword Girls.]
300506.name: Year 1 Guigui

300507.flavor: [Nardack is celebrating the first anniversary of Sword Girls.]
300507.name: Year 1 Nardack

300508.flavor: [The student council president's mornings start very early. She looks dignified even while relaxed. It's because she works hard.]
300508.name: Morning Council Pres.

300509.flavor: [Oh my, are you the new transfer student? Do you like spicy food?]
300509.name: Cook Club Jamie

300510.flavor: [We, the Library Rangers, carry out the justice of the library! We don't shoot out beams, but we're still strong!]
300510.name: Lib. Rangers

300511.flavor: [Now I'm a full-fledged lady, too... I'm tearing up.]
300511.name: Rich Lady

300512.flavor: [Do you need my help? We can talk about the work after the payment is settled.]
300512.name: Broker Lady

300513.flavor: [Musiciter? Alright. I'll listen to what you have to say. I'm in a really good mood right now, anyway.]
300513.name: Dress Up Lady Linus

300514.flavor: [I told you. The outcome has already been decided.]
300514.name: Lancer Knight Shane

300515.flavor: [How do I feel? Great. I need a place to release all this energy building up inside of me.]
300515.name: Seeker Melissa

300516.flavor: [I will show no mercy to the opposition. I will count anyone who tries to protect the witches as the opposition. The opposition.]
300516.name: Head Knight Eisenwane

300517.flavor: [Lately, Miss Helena has been participating in the activities of other people. She's been listening to Schindler's reformist views...]
300517.name: Apostle Red Sun

300518.flavor: [Palomporom. Time will assist you and her.]
300518.name: Witch Herionne

300519.flavor: [According to Cabernet, the most important thing right now is the safety of our kind.]
300519.name: Head Luna Flina

300520.flavor: [Sita in her everyday clothes is some nice eye candy! However, the new club member is a formidable opponent, too!]
300520.name: Cook Club Sylphie

300521.flavor: [Seriously... Are they going to treat me like I'm just a missing part of their inventory? I'm the ace of the weekly helpers! This is my comeback.]
300521.name: Council Helper Weekly

300522.flavor: [Tieria and Amy are the core of the student council. Celine's high approval ratings are partly due to her charisma, but they would be impossible without the outstanding management abilities of these two people.]
300522.name: Council Kingmakers

300523.flavor: [Ever since that day, you've been obsessed with some kind of power... You haven't laid a finger on your work, either. So... you won't do it anymore? My lady?]
300523.name: Maid Lesnoa

300524.flavor: [You shouldn't waste a single minute, or even a single second. The basic principle of all work is to stay on schedule by performing efficiently.]
300524.name: Maid Fio

300525.flavor: [Welcome to Musiciter, Miss Linus. First, why don't we choose a codename for you?]
300525.name: Musiciter Lady Sevia

300526.flavor: [Having better equipment than the enemy is a basic tactic.]
300526.name: Marksman Knight

300527.flavor: [Have you heard of a medic who wears clothes unbefitting of a doctor?]
300527.name: Crux Knight Sillit

300528.flavor: [Carry a sword. The battle for life and death is no place for lame things like magic.]
300528.name: Crux Knight Lukif

300529.flavor: [Miss Helena's words are the same as those of the God of Truth. She has my complete trust.]
300529.name: Aletheian G-NUSA

300530.flavor: [Is Crux after the same thing as our leader? More importantly, that person is... the new head knight.]
300530.name: GS 7th Star

300531.flavor: [You don't need to know anything about me. Just don't get in my way.]
300531.name: Dark Sword Master A-GA

300532.flavor: [What? A fox? Can't you see that I'm a tiger? Hmm. Well, believe whatever you like.]
300532.name: Tigress Felpix

300533.flavor: [One of the basics of survival is to prepare for when you'll be hungry again, even after you just ate.]
300533.name: L. Sita Vilosa

300534.flavor: [It's been a while since I left the mansion, but this is nice. I heard that you can find some cute animals somewhere... Shall I try going there?]
300534.name: L. Cinia Pacifica

300535.flavor: [If you call yourself a knight, you have to work hard at all times. However, it's hard to suppress the desire to eat snacks.]
300535.name: L. Luthica Preventer

300536.flavor: [Going out in the morning isn't too bad. Going out at night is still better, though.]
300536.name: L. Iri Flina

300537.flavor: [If destiny exists, the girls will meet again. Whether they want to or not.]
300537.name: Girls' Harmony

300538.flavor: [Most of the Library Club members went to the underground library. We haven't been getting many visitors lately, either, so the library feels so lonely.]
300538.name: Lib. Snowty

300539.flavor: [An outside sponsor of the Cook Club. This aristocrat girl loves the snacks that the Cook Club makes.]
300539.name: Cook Club Devourer

300540.flavor: [In order to solve this case, you need courage. The courage to lie to your lover, the courage to admit defeat... You need at least this much courage.]
300540.name: Girl Detective Asmis

300541.flavor: [We and the police work together to uphold the public order of Royle City.]
300541.name: Paladin Lady

300542.flavor: [Linia is a difficult lady to understand, but she has hired me as an agent.]
300542.name: Lady Elberto

300543.flavor: [I don't have any hopes or dreams. I only have my guitar, now. Please listen to my "Soul".] [Her performance of "Guitar for your Soul" resounded everywhere.]
300543.name: Guitar Witch Maid

300544.flavor: [Drill! This is a drill for a level 2 security breach!]
300544.name: Knight's Parrot Kocchan

300545.flavor: [Please let me know in advance if you plan to take a leave next month.]
300545.name: Knight Manager
