300546.flavor: [Hold on... That's a beautiful crystal you have there. Will you lend it to me for a bit?]
300546.name: Seeker Beryl

300547.flavor: [This is one of the Scardel's covert soldiers. During emergencies, she carries out independent missions.]
300547.name: Scardel Unit Tyrfing

300548.flavor: [According to Schindler, I can use this. A miracle, huh... The traditionalists are better than I thought.]
300548.name: Apostle Reshuri

300549.flavor: [It left a scar, but I can walk without a cane now. Miss Helena...]
300549.name: Apostle Red Sun

300550.flavor: [Yes. Yes. Understood. Please continue observing for now. It's still too early to make a decision.]
300550.name: 5th Witness Kana. DDD

300551.flavor: [Layna, is there something troubling you that you can't tell me about? I won't ask you about it, but you can always come to me if you have any worries.]
300551.name: Hecate M. Jane

300552.flavor: [I believe that the power of talentium is absolute. For example, if a person uses it while in a moving frame of reference, it will appear the same to both the user and an outside observer. I wonder if my theory is correct.]
300552.name: Lib. Researcher Albert

300553.flavor: [What's going on in the back room of the library? Talentium smelting? Eh... Hm? I should try wearing glasses? Nooope! I'm a different kind of character!]
300553.name: Lib. Research Head Von

300554.flavor: [It's hot. How can people live in a place like this?] [Please take off your coat, my lady...]
300554.name: Arctic Lady

300555.flavor: [I'm finally liberated from that crimson hell! I'm free now! I can do whatever I want!]
300555.name: Liberated Maid

300556.flavor: [The world moves by the power of science. Do the higher ups understand this?]
300556.name: Maid Scientist

300557.flavor: [I have to become stronger! I will grow like Cygnus-senpai did!]
300557.name: Youngest Knight Rotori

300559.flavor: [I don't have time to talk to you. Get out of my way!]
300559.name: Seeker Odien

300560.flavor: [After listening to Herionne, I can't allow things to go on like this any longer. I will find the creepy witch and that girl.]
300560.name: Witch Palomporom

300561.flavor: [5th Star mentioned someone with a strange sword... Who could it be? There are one or two people it could be. More importantly, did the Aletheians have that kind of power? They aren't the pushover sponsors we thought they were. First, I need to make contact...]
300561.name: GS Agent

300562.flavor: [Don't worry about who I am. I merely convey Miss Helena's will. Just obey my words.]
300562.name: Helena's Right Hand Rue

300563.flavor: [Let's see, let's see. Ooh... This place looks interesting. Shall I pay it a visit?] [Hovering between time space continuums, the very existence of this mysterious existence is a mystery.]
300563.name: Riftwatcher Schrodinger

300579.flavor: [This is the human form of the enormous beast that they call the Black Lion.]
300579.name: Nold of Darkness

300580.flavor: [This is the human form of the Black Lion, with her power unleashed. Somehow, she resembles Nold.]
300580.name: Dark Soul Nold

300581.flavor: [One person only needs a teaspoon of love potion, so why in the world would anyone need a whole gallon? Well, that"s none of my business. I just need to deliver it to... What was her name? Linia?]
300581.name: Alchemist Yi Ensan

300582.flavor: [And that spirit is what's so charming about Musiciter!] [I didn't know that!]
300582.name: Musiciter Fan Layna

300583.flavor: [Senpai is so cruel to give me this much work. I don't think I'm ready to devote my life to this...]
300583.name: Lib. Assistant Jin

300584.flavor: [Great concentration, mental revolution, a single slash of the sword. Swords can cut objects, but your heart can cut your soul. Understand, Sita?]
300584.name: Council Casey

300585.flavor: [How is it? If I'm dressed like this, I can be elegant, too.] [You're weird, Sion.]
300585.name: Lady Twins Sion & Rion

300586.flavor: [I enjoy investigating the Royle Academy students, but I like this dress too. I will keep it in my memory.]
300586.name: Lady Cox

300587.flavor: [I, Musiciter Irea, have appeared to put an end to the witches' evil deeds!]
300587.name: Musiciter Lady Irea

300588.flavor: [Here's the thing you wanted. What's it for, anyway?]
300588.name: Seeker Kano

300589.flavor: [After the incident at the underground library, there was an extra knight who wasn't there before. She didn't speak to anyone except Veltier. Oddly enough, nobody questioned her presence, so she managed to blend in.]
300589.name: Silent Knight

300590.flavor: [The rumors that you were in league with the outsiders were true! Were true!] [It'd be pointless for me to try explaining myself. Listen, I have some valuable information for you. How does that sound, fallen bird?]
300590.name: Double Agent Luthica

300591.flavor: [Let's get to the point! Here's the information you wanted.]
300591.name: 2S Informant

300592.flavor: [Even if I have to sacrifice my own body, I will do anything our shaman asks.] [The Aletheians eventually held blind devotion.]
300592.name: Aletheian Hania

300593.flavor: [How long has it been? The Aletheians have nothing more to give. It's a shame that the completed dark sword vanished.]
300593.name: GS Leader Schindler

300594.flavor: [The weird bird that Sage Lady sent flying gave us new powers. Shall we count up your sins?] [Sion!] [Rion!] [Maximum Drive!] [Extreme!]
300594.name: Sionrion Extreme

300595.flavor: [Ack! There was a time limit? Hmph. We're still not finished yet! Rion!]
300595.name: Dress Up Sion

300597.flavor: [Finally, ULTIMATE WHIPPED CREAM GET! You're mine, whipped cream! This whipped cream will have my family name so that everyone knows it's the greatest whipped cream!]
300597.name: Cook Club Baker Svia

300598.flavor: [The final step in cooking is the decoration. However, to achieve the perfect decoration, you must put yourself in the food's shoes.]
300598.name: Cook Club Coordinator

300599.flavor: [I'm not always cold. These flowers always make me happy. Hm? My face isn't pale, and I don't have a serious wound!]
300599.name: Summer Council Susie

300600.flavor: [This is a great place for a part-time job.]
300600.name: Part-Time Maid

300601.flavor: [The Pacifica family needed her ability to control dolls at will.]
300601.name: Marionette Witch

300602.flavor: [Okay. I can do it! Arise, power of justice!]
300602.name: Musiciter Lady Linus

300603.flavor: [The Blue Cross will support Rose from now on.]
300603.name: Blue Cross Scribe

300604.flavor: [I will begin the hunt for the dark sword.]
300604.name: Crux Knight Sophia

300605.flavor: [I foresaw this as well. However, I didn't see myself wearing these clothes.]
300605.name: Blue Cross Rose

300606.flavor: [Oh my. This isn't good. The negative energy is getting stronger. We can't just wait around for an opportunity...]
300606.name: Wise Witch

300607.flavor: [Schindler gave me some mystery ingredient that's supposed to be good for the body. She told me to put it in the food, but to do it without anyone finding out. This feels wrong.]
300607.name: Aletheian Sous-Chef

300609.flavor: [I know I can't swim, but... you didn't have to make me play this penalty game... What do I do if someone sees me...]
300609.name: Summer Tesla

300610.flavor: [Master Linia, is something bothering you?] [It's just... hot. It's just the heat.]
300610.name: Summer Linia

300611.flavor: [Whew. Water tastes like honey after you finish training.]
300611.name: Summer Vanguard

300612.flavor: [This is what they recommended for summer, but... why do I feel even hotter?]
300612.name: Summer Cabernet

300625.flavor: [This is a racket...?] [That's right, Sita. You just take it and "bounce" the ball back.] [... Do I have to bounce it...?]
300625.name: Badminton Sita

300626.flavor: [I was slightly worried that I would miss if the wind blew. However, I focused everything into my own hands and shot with confidence.]
300626.name: Archery Cinia

300627.flavor: [I will end this in a single match.]
300627.name: Judo Luthica

300628.flavor: [That ball. It will return to me.] [Th-That's! That's the "Flina Zone"!]
300628.name: Ping Pong Iri

300807.flavor: [This is the prototype of an Asmis homunculus made from chocolate. She's still incapable of communicating properly. - Clarice's Research Notebook]
300807.name: HH Asmis

300808.flavor: [This is an improvement off of the prototype Asmis homunculus. She's gradually starting to show expressions. Good, I'll keep working on her. - Clarice's Research Notebook]
300808.name: MH Asmis

300809.flavor: [I made some more improvements to make her more realistic, but did I go too far? - Clarice's Research Notebook]
300809.name: RH Asmis

300815.flavor: [I made some more improvements to make her more realistic, but did I go too far? - Clarice's Research Notebook]

300817.flavor: [This is an improvement off of the prototype Helena homunculus. She's gradually starting to show expressions. Good, I'll keep working on her. - Clarice's Research Notebook]
300817.name: MH Helena

300818.flavor: [I made some more improvements to make her more realistic, but did I go too far? - Clarice's Research Notebook]

300819.flavor: [This is the prototype of an Isfeldt homunculus made from chocolate. She's still incapable of communicating properly. - Clarice's Research Notebook]

300834.flavor: [Hello again! It's been a while, hasn't it? It's been… a year? Let's look forward to an even better year going forward.]
300834.name: L. Ophelia

skill_text.100001: At the start of the turn, enemy Followers in Slots 1, 2, and 3 get STA -1. If the enemy Character is an NPC, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1.
skill_text.100002: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets ATK -1/STA -1. If the enemy Character is an NPC, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1.
skill_text.100003: At the start of the turn, a random allied Crux Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1. If the enemy Character is an NPC, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1.
skill_text.100004: At the start of the turn, if your Field SIZE is greater than the enemy Field SIZE, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1. If the enemy Character is an NPC, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1.
skill_text.100005: At the start of the turn, a random card in your Hand gets SIZE +1. If this happens, a random allied card gets SIZE -1.
skill_text.100006: At the start of the turn, allied Followers with a SIZE equal to or greater than the number of allied cards get ATK +1/STA +2.
skill_text.100007: At the start of the turn, the first enemy Follower with the highest DEF gets DEF =0.
skill_text.100008: At the start of the turn, cards in your Field with the lowest SIZE get ATK/STA increased by the difference between the lowest SIZE in your Field and the highest SIZE in the enemy Field.
skill_text.100009: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower that does not belong to this Character's faction gets ATK -2/STA -2. If this Character and all enemy Followers belong to the same faction, two random enemy Followers get STA -1.
skill_text.100010: At the start of the turn, if there are at least two cards in the enemy Field, the enemy Follower with the highest SIZE gets ATK -2/DEF -1/STA -2. If there is one enemy card, it gets STA -2
skill_text.100011: At the start of the turn, the first enemy Follower with a SIZE that is less than or equal to half (rounding up) of the total SIZE of the first two cards in your Hand gets ATK -2/DEF -2/STA -2.
skill_text.100012: At the start of the turn, if the difference in SIZE between the cards in Slot 1 and Slot 2 of your Hand is odd, all allied Followers get STA +2. If the difference is even, allied Followers get ATK +2.
skill_text.100013: At the start of the turn, if this Character's LIFE and the SIZE of the first card in your Hand are both odd or both even, this Character gets LIFE +3.
skill_text.100014: At the start of the turn, a random Follower in your Field with a SIZE of at least 2 gets SIZE decreased by the difference in SIZE between the first two cards in your Hand.
skill_text.100015: At the start of the turn, if Slot 3 in the enemy Field is empty, a random enemy Follower is moved there. A Follower in Slot 3 in the enemy Field gets STA -3.
skill_text.100016: At the start of the turn, the first enemy Follower with the highest SIZE gets ATK/STA decreased by half (rounding up) of the combined SIZE of the first allied Follower and a Follower in Slot 4 in your Field. (An empty Slot counts as having a SIZE of 0.)
skill_text.100017: At the start of the turn, if Slot 5 in your Field is empty, a Follower in Slot 1 in your Field is moved to Slot 5 and gets STA +5. If Slot 1 in your Field is empty, a Follower in Slot 5 in your Field is moved to Slot 1 and gets STA +5.
skill_text.100018: At the start of the turn, a random card in your Hand gets SIZE -1.
skill_text.100019: At the start of the turn, if there are three or fewer cards in your Hand, the first three cards in your Hand are sent to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, a random allied Follower gets ATK/STA increased by half of the number of sent cards (rounding up).
skill_text.100020: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets DEF decreased by half of the ATK of the first Follower in your Hand with the lowest SIZE (rounding down).
skill_text.100021: At the start of the turn, enemy Followers with a SIZE less than your first Follower's SIZE get ATK -1/STA -2
skill_text.100022: At the start of the turn, if all cards in your Field and the first card in your Hand are Crux cards, a random Follower in your Field gets ATK +2/STA +2.
skill_text.100023: At the start of the turn, a Follower in Slot 5 in the enemy Field is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck, and then a random enemy card is moved to the next empty Slot in the enemy Field. If the card is moved to Slot 5, the card is destroyed.
skill_text.100024: At the start of the turn, if there are at least two cards in the enemy Hand, the first allied card with the higher SIZE gets SIZE changed to equal the difference in SIZE between the first and second cards in the enemy Hand.
skill_text.100025: At the start of the turn, a random allied Darklore Follower with a SIZE of 9 or less is sent to the Grave. A random enemy Follower gets STA decreased by 1.5 times the sent card's SIZE (rounding down).
skill_text.100026:
At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets one of the following effects applied depending on the faction of the first card in your Hand:
 ● Vita: ATK +1/STA +2
 ● Academy: STA +3
 ● Crux: DEF +1 
 ● Darklore: SIZE -2
skill_text.100027: At the start of the turn, the number of Crux cards and non-Crux cards in the enemy Hand and Field are compared. A random allied Crux Follower gets STA increased by the higher number.
skill_text.100028: At the start of the turn, if there are cards in the enemy Hand and Field from at least two factions, a random card in your Hand gets SIZE -2.
skill_text.100029: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets STA -3. If this happens, this card gets LIFE +1.
skill_text.100030: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets ATK/STA decreased by half of the difference between its SIZE and DEF (rounding up).
skill_text.100031: At the start of the turn, the first Darklore card in your Hand is sent to the Grave. A random enemy Follower's ATK/STA are decreased by half of the sent card's SIZE (rounding up).
skill_text.100032: At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number is even, a random Spell in the enemy Hand is removed from the game. If the Turn Number is odd, the first Spell in the enemy Grave is removed from the game.
skill_text.100033: At the start of the turn, if there are at least two allied Followers, this Character gets LIFE -1, and then a random allied Follower gets ATK +2/DEF +1/STA +2.
skill_text.100034: At the start of the turn, two random allied Followers get STA increased by their difference in SIZE.
skill_text.100035: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets ATK/STA decreased by half of the difference between its SIZE and DEF (rounding up).
skill_text.100036: At the start of the turn, enemy Followers in Slots 1, 2, and 3 get STA -1.
skill_text.100037: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets ATK -1/STA -1.
skill_text.100038: At the start of the turn, a random allied Crux Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1.
skill_text.100039: At the start of the turn, if your Field SIZE is greater than the enemy Field SIZE, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1.
skill_text.100040: At the start of the turn, the enemy Follower with the highest DEF gets DEF =0.
skill_text.100041: At the start of the turn, if there are two cards in your Hand with the same SIZE, this Character gets LIFE increased by half of their SIZE (rounding up).
skill_text.100042: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets ATK increased by the number of Followers in your Hand and gets STA increased by the number of allied Followers.
skill_text.100043: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets ATK +2. If the Turn Number is even, the Follower gets an additional STA +1.
skill_text.100044: At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number is a multiple of three, two random allied Crux Followers get ATK +3/STA +3 and this Character gets LIFE +2.
skill_text.100045: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets ATK increased by 1 plus the number of empty Slots in your Hand (by a maximum of 4).
skill_text.100046: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower is moved to the next empty Slot. If this happens, the moved Follower's ATK is increased by the new Slot number. If the Follower starts in Slot 5, it is moved to the first empty Slot.
skill_text.100047: At the start of the turn, two random allied Followers get ATK increased by the number of different SIZES in your Hand.
skill_text.100048: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets ATK +2. If the Turn Number is even, the Follower also gets STA +1.
skill_text.100049: At the start of the turn, two random Followers in your Hand get ATK +1/STA +1, and then two random allied Followers get STA +1.
skill_text.100050: At the start of the turn, enemy Followers in Slots 1, 2, and 5 get STA -2.
skill_text.100051:
At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets one of the following effects applied depending on its SIZE:
 ● 3 or greater: ATK -2
 ● Less than 3: STA -2
skill_text.100052:
At the start of the turn, a random Crux Follower in your Field gets one of the following effects applied depending on its SIZE:
 ● 3 or greater: ATK +2
 ● Less than 3: STA +3
skill_text.100053: At the start of the turn, if the number of cards in your Hand is even, a random enemy Follower gets ATK -1/DEF -1/STA -1.
skill_text.100054: At the start of the turn, enemy Followers in Slots 2, 3, and 4 get STA -2, and a random enemy Follower gets STA -1.
skill_text.100055:
At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets one of the following effects applied depending on its DEF: 
 ● 1 or greater: DEF -1/STA -1
 ● 0 or less: ATK -2/STA -2
skill_text.100056:
At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets one of the following effects applied depending on its DEF: 
 ● 1 or greater: ATK +2/ STA +2
 ● 0 or less: DEF +1/STA +1
skill_text.100057:
At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets one of the following effects applied depending on its STA: 
 ● 10 or greater: STA -4
 ● 9 or less: ATK -1/DEF -1/STA -1
skill_text.100058: At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number is odd, two random allied Followers get ATK +1. If the Turn Number is even, a random allied Follower gets STA +2.
skill_text.100059: At the start of the turn, the first card in your Hand is sent to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, the first enemy Follower with the highest STA gets DEF decreased by half of the sent card's SIZE (by a maximum of 3, rounding up).
skill_text.100060: At the start of the turn, the first Academy Spell in your Hand with a SIZE less than the difference between 9 and your Field Size is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field. If this happens, a random enemy Follower gets ATK/STA decreased by the sent card's SIZE.
skill_text.100061: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets ATK -1. If this happens, a random allied Follower gets ATK +2 .
skill_text.100062: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets ATK +2, and then is sent to the top of your Deck. Next, a random allied Follower gets ATK +2.
skill_text.100063: At the start of the turn, if there are at least two cards in your Hand with the same SIZE, the cards in your Hand with the highest SIZE that meet that condition are sent to the bottom of your Deck. This Character gets LIFE increased by half of the SIZE of the sent cards (by a maximum of 4, rounding up).
skill_text.100064: At the start of the turn, the first card in your Hand is sent to the bottom of your Deck. A random allied Follower gets ATK/STA increased by half of the sent card's SIZE (by a maximum of 4, rounding down).

skill_text.100067: At the start of the turn, enemy Followers in Slots 1, 2, and 3 get STA -1.
skill_text.100068: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets ATK -1/STA -1.
skill_text.100069: At the start of the turn, allied cards with "Homunculus Escort" in the name are sent to the Grave. Next, a Follower named "Homunculus Escort" is created in the last empty Slot in your Field and gets SIZE =1/ATK =5/DEF =0/STA =5.
skill_text.100070: At the start of the turn, allied cards with "Homunculus Escort" in the name are sent to the Grave. Next, if the ones digit of the Turn Number is at least 1, a Follower named "Homunculus Escort" is created in the last empty Slot in your Field and gets SIZE =1/DEF =1. That Follower gets ATK/STA changed to equal 10 minus the ones digit of the Turn Number.
skill_text.100071: At the start of the turn, allied cards with "Homunculus Escort" in the name are sent to the Grave. Next, a Follower named "Homunculus Escort" is created in the last empty Slot in your Field and gets SIZE =1/ATK =1/DEF =0/STA =9.
skill_text.100072: At the start of the turn, allied cards with "Homunculus Escort" in the name are sent to the Grave. Next, a Follower named "Homunculus Escort" is created in the last empty Slot in your Field and gets SIZE =1/ATK =7/DEF =0/STA =2.
skill_text.100073: At the start of the turn, allied cards with "Homunculus Escort" in the name are sent to your Grave. Next, a Follower named "Homunculus Escort" is created in the last empty Slot in your Field and gets SIZE =1/ATK =3/DEF =0/STA =3. That Follower gets this skill: "Before this card attacks, the defender gets SIZE +1, and then this skill is removed."
skill_text.100074: At the start of the turn, allied cards with "Homunculus Escort" in the name are sent to the Grave. Next, a Follower named "Homunculus Escort" is created in the last empty Slot in your Field and gets SIZE =1/ATK =5/DEF =0/STA =5.
skill_text.100075:

 ● 26 or more: The enemy Character gets LIFE -2.
 ● 16-20: This Character gets LIFE +1.
 ● 9 or less: The enemy Character gets LIFE -2.

skill_text.100082: At the start of the turn, two random allied Followers get ATK/STA increased by the difference between the lowest SIZE in your Field and the highest SIZE in the enemy Field.
skill_text.100083: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower with a SIZE of 5 or less gets SIZE +1/ATK +2/DEF +1/STA +2.
skill_text.100084: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets DEF/STA decreased by the number of Followers in your Hand.
skill_text.100087: At the start of the turn, a number of Followers in your Hand equal to the SIZE of the first card in your Hand get ATK +1/STA +1. (The Followers are selected from left to right.)
skill_text.100088:
At the start of the turn, one of the following effects is applied depending on the enemy Character's LIFE:
 ● 31 or more: The enemy Character gets LIFE -2.
 ● 20-25: A random allied Follower gets ATK +1/STA +2.
 ● 10-15: A random enemy Follower gets ATK -1/STA -2.

skill_text.100091: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets ATK -1/STA -2. If this Character's LIFE is less than the enemy Character's LIFE, the Follower gets ATK -2/STA -3 instead.
skill_text.100092: At the start of the turn, a random allied Crux Follower gets ATK +1/STA +2. If this Character's LIFE is less than the enemy Character's LIFE, the Follower gets ATK+2/STA +3 instead.
skill_text.100093: At the start of the turn, this Character gets LIFE +1. If this Character's LIFE is less than the enemy Character's LIFE, the enemy Character gets LIFE -2 instead.
skill_text.100094:
At the start of the turn, one of the following effects is applied depending on the number of cards in your Hand:
 ● 1: You get Shuffles +1.
 ● 2: A random allied Follower gets ATK +3/STA +3.
 ● 3: A random allied Follower gets DEF +1/STA +1.
 ● 4: Two random allied Followers get ATK +1/STA +1.
 ● 5: This Character gets LIFE -1.
skill_text.100095: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets ATK +2/STA +2 and its skills are removed. If the Follower had any skills removed, it gets SIZE -1.
skill_text.100096:
At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower is moved to a random empty Slot in your Field. The Follower gets the following effects applied depending on its new Slot number:
 ● 1-3: STA +3
 ● 3-5: ATK +2
skill_text.100097:
At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower is moved to a random empty Slot in your Field. The Follower gets the following effects applied depending on its new Slot number:
 ● 1-3: ATK +1/STA +2
 ● 3-5: ATK +2/STA +1
skill_text.100098:
At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower is moved to a random empty Slot in the enemy Field. The Follower gets the following effects applied depending on its new Slot number:
 ● 1-3: ATK -1/STA -2
 ● 3-5: ATK -2/STA -1
skill_text.100099:
At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower is moved to a random empty Slot in your Field. The Follower gets the following effects applied depending on its new Slot number:
 ● 1-3: STA +4
 ● 3-5: SIZE -1/ATK +1
skill_text.1001: ▶At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower with "Cook Club" in the name gets ATK +1/STA +1.
skill_text.100100: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower is moved to a random empty Slot in the enemy Field. If this happens, a random allied Follower is moved to a random empty Slot in your Field, and then the first enemy card with a Slot number that matches the Slot number of an allied card is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field.

 ● 3-5: ATK +2

skill_text.100103: At the start of the turn, a random Follower in the enemy Field gets DEF -1/STA -2. If there are fewer cards in your Field than the enemy Field, the first Follower in the enemy Hand gets DEF -1. If there are at least as many cards in your Hand as the enemy Hand, the first Follower in the enemy Hand gets STA -2 (to a minimum of 1).

If there are fewer cards in your Field than the enemy Field, a random Follower in the enemy Field gets STA -2. If there are at least as many cards in your Hand as the enemy Hand, a random Follower in the enemy Field gets STA -2.

If there are fewer cards in your Field than the enemy Field, that Follower gets an additional ATK -1. If there are at least as many cards in your Hand as the enemy Hand, that Follower gets an additional STA -1.

skill_text.100107: At the start of the turn, all Spells in the enemy Hand are sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.
skill_text.100108: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets ATK +2/STA +2. If the number of cards in your Deck is less than or equal to the number of cards in the enemy Deck, that Follower gets an additional DEF +1/STA +1.

If you have a Vita Character, all Followers in your Hand are sent to the Grave. Otherwise, all cards in your Hand are sent to the Grave.

skill_text.200415: Two random Followers in your Field get ATK +3/STA +3. Two random Followers in the enemy Field get ATK -1/STA -1.
skill_text.200416: All Followers in your Hand and Field with "Lib." in the name are sent to the bottom of your Deck. For every two sent cards, a Follower with "Lib." in the name is sent from the top of your Deck to the first empty Slot in your Field and gets ATK/STA increased by half of the number of cards sent to the bottom of your Deck (rounding down).
skill_text.200417: The second Follower in the enemy Field gets STA changed to equal to the Slot number of the last card in the enemy Field and gets ATK increased by half of the STA decrease (rounding down).
skill_text.200418: A random allied Follower gets ATK or STA (25%:75% chance) increased by the ones digit of the Turn Number.
skill_text.200419: If you have an Academy Character, all Followers in the enemy Field with the highest SIZE get ATK/STA decreased by the difference between the SIZE of the Follower in your Field with the lowest SIZE and that of the Follower in the enemy Field with the highest SIZE.
skill_text.200420: The first other card in your Field is destroyed. If this happens, the first card in the enemy Field is destroyed.
skill_text.200421: All Followers in both Fields get SIZE decreased by the number of cards in their owners' Fields with "Knight" and STA decreased by the number of cards in their owners' Fields without "Knight" in the name.
skill_text.200422: All Followers in your Hand and Field have all of their skills changed to the following skill: "Before this card attacks, it gets ATK +1."
skill_text.200423: If you have a Crux Character, the first card in the enemy Deck is sent to the first empty Slot in the enemy Field. If this happens, all Spells in the enemy Field (if there are at least two Spells in the enemy Field) and/or all Followers in the enemy Field (if there are at least three Followers in the enemy Field) are sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.
skill_text.200424: Two random Followers in your Field get ATK increased by the number of cards in your Grave with "Crescent", "Scardel", "Flina", or "Ritual of Unity" in the name (by a maximum of 9).
skill_text.200425: A random card in the enemy Field is deactivated. If the deactivated card was a Spell, a random Follower in your Field gets ATK increased by the deactivated card's SIZE. If it was a Follower, a random Follower in your Field gets STA increased by the deactivated card's SIZE.
skill_text.200426: If this card has a SIZE of at least 5, it is sent to the Grave. The first card in the enemy Hand is replaced with a new copy of this card and gets SIZE +1. This card is removed from the game.
skill_text.200427: The first Follower in your Field gets DEF =1. If there was no change in DEF, two random Followers in the enemy Field get DEF -1/STA -3.
skill_text.200428: All Followers in your Field with "Lib." in the name get SIZE -1. The first Follower in your Hand with "Lib." in the name gets SIZE decreased by the total SIZE reduction.
skill_text.200429: The first five Spells in the enemy Deck are sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. All cards in the enemy Hand are sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. If you have a Vita Character, the opponent gets Shuffles -1.
skill_text.200430: Up to three cards in the enemy Grave that do not belong to the enemy Character's faction are removed from the game. Your Character gets LIFE increased by the number of removed cards.
skill_text.200431: Two random Followers in the enemy Field get ATK/STA increased by 3 minus this card's SIZE. If this card's SIZE is 1, it is removed from the game. This card gets SIZE -2, is sent to the enemy Field, and is deactivated.
skill_text.200432:
The following effects are applied depending on the sum of the original SIZEs of other cards in your Field (If you have an Academy Character, this card's SIZE is included): 
 ● 5 or less: A random enemy Spell is sent to the Grave.  ● 6~9: Two random enemy Followers get ATK -3/STA -3. 
 ● 10 or more: All previous effects are applied, then a random enemy card is sent to the Grave.
skill_text.200433: Two random Crux Followers in your Field get DEF=0. Those Followers get ATK increased by the average of their SIZES (rounding up).
skill_text.200434: If you have a Crux Character, a random Follower in the enemy Field gets SIZE +1. If that Follower's SIZE is at least 4, it gets the following skill: "Before this card is attacked, this card gets STA -1."
skill_text.200435: A random Follower in your Field gets ATK +2/STA +2 and gets the following skill: "Before this card attacks, the defender's first skill is sent to this card. If this happens, this skill is removed." If you have a Crux Character, this skill is applied a second time.
skill_text.200436: Two random Followers in the enemy Field get ATK -1-3 (randomly). This card gets SIZE +1 and is sent to the first empty Slot in your Hand. If this card's SIZE is at least 2, it is sent to the Grave instead.
skill_text.200437: The first Follower in your Field with the lowest STA is removed from the game. If this happens, a random Follower in your Grave is removed from the game and a new copy of it is created in the first empty Slot in your Field.
skill_text.200438: If you have a Darklore Character, Followers in your Hand and Field with 10 or less ATK get STA +4, and Followers in your Hand and Field with 10 or less STA get ATK +3. All Followers in your Hand and Field get their ATK and STA swapped.
skill_text.200439:
Your Character gets LIFE +4. The opponent gets Shuffles -1. The following effects are applied depending on your Character's LIFE. 
 ● 31 or more: 2 random cards in the enemy Hand are sent to the Grave. 
 ● 15-25: A random Follower in the enemy Field is sent to the Grave. 
 ● 5-8: Two random cards in the enemy Field are sent to the Grave.
skill_text.200440: A random enemy Follower is deactivated and gets the following skills: “At the start of turn, this card is sent to the Grave.” “Before this card is attacked, it gets STA increased by half of the attacker's ATK (rounding down), and then this skill is removed.”
skill_text.200441: The first allied Follower with "Council" in the name gets ATK +2, then the first Follower in the enemy Field with an ATK lower than that Follower's ATK is deactivated.
skill_text.200442: Two random Followers in your Field get STA +3 or STA +5 (50% chance).
skill_text.200443: The first Follower in your Field that belongs to your Character's faction is removed from the game. The first card in your Deck with the highest SIZE is sent to the removed Follower's Slot. That card gets SIZE changed to equal the removed Follower's SIZE.
skill_text.200444: If you have an Academy Character, your Character gets LIFE +1. If there are 15 or fewer cards in your Deck, , your Character gets an additional LIFE +3.
skill_text.200445: The following effect is applied four times to a random Follower in the enemy Field: ATK -1, DEF -1, or STA -1.
skill_text.200446: A random card in the enemy Field is sent to the bottom of the enemy Grave, and then this card gets SIZE=1, gets sent to the first empty Slot in the enemy Field, and is deactivated. If this card's SIZE is 1, the last card in your Grave is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field, and then this card is removed from the game.
skill_text.200447: Cards are sent from the top of your Deck to your Hand until there are at least four cards in your Hand. All Followers in your Field get STA increased by the number of cards in your Hand with "Blue Cross" in the name.
skill_text.200448: A random Spell in the enemy Field that is not named "Experience" is copied to the first empty Slot in your Field.
skill_text.200449: The first Follower in your Field with the highest SIZE gets SIZE/ATK/DEF/STA halved (rounding down). If this happens, a copy of that Follower is created in the first empty Slot in your Field with half of its previous SIZE (rounding up).
skill_text.200450: Two random Followers in the enemy Field get ATK/STA decreased by the number of cards in the top three cards of your Grave that belong to your Character's faction. A random Follower in your Field gets SIZE decreased by the number of cards in the top three cards of your Grave with "GS" in the name.
skill_text.200451: All Followers on both players' Fields get their skills removed until the start of the next turn.
skill_text.200452: If you have a Darklore Character, a random Follower in the enemy Field gets STA decreased by the difference between its ATK and DEF.
skill_text.200453: A random Follower in the enemy Field with a DEF equal to 10 - your Field SIZE is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.
skill_text.200454: All Followers in your Field with "Cook Club" in the name get their SIZE and first skill changed to the SIZE and first skill of the second Follower in your Field with "Cook Club" in the name.
skill_text.200455:
If you have a Vita Character, two of the following effects are randomly applied: 
 ● Your Character gets LIFE +3.
 ● All Followers in your Field get ATK +3/STA +3.
 ● The enemy Character gets LIFE -1.
 ● All Followers in the enemy Field get ATK -3/STA -3.
 ● The first card in the enemy Field is removed from the game.
skill_text.200456: Followers in both Fields with an odd STA get STA -3. Followers in both Fields with an even STA get ATK +3.
skill_text.200457: If this card's SIZE is at least 3, two random Followers in your Field get ATK -2/STA -2 and the enemy Character gets LIFE +2. Otherwise, this card gets SIZE +1~2 and is sent to the first empty Slot in the enemy Field and deactivated.
skill_text.200458: A random Follower in the enemy Field is changed into "Delinquent Witch Cadet". If you have an Academy Character, two random Followers in your Field get ATK/STA increased by the total number of Academy Followers in both Fields (by a maximum of 4).
skill_text.200459: If your Field contains a Follower with "Knight" in the name and a Follower with "Seeker" in the name, all Followers in your Field get ATK +4.
skill_text.200460: All Spells in your Hand are sent from your Hand to the empty Slots in your Field, starting from the first. Your Character gets LIFE increased by the number of sent cards.
skill_text.200461: If you have a Crux Character, all Spells in the enemy Hand and Field are sent to the top of the enemy Deck. All Followers in the enemy Hand and Field get DEF decreased by the number of sent cards.
skill_text.200462: The first Follower in your Deck that belongs to the faction of the first Follower in your Field is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field and gets SIZE -1.
skill_text.200463: All Followers in your Field except the first are sent to the top of your Deck. If this happens, a number of Followers in the enemy Field equal to 1 plus the number of sent Followers, are sent to the top of the enemy Deck, except for the first.
skill_text.200464: If you have a Darklore Character, all Followers in the enemy Field get ATK/DEF/STA changed to the ATK/DEF/STA of the first Follower in your Field.
skill_text.200468: The Follower in Slot 5 in your Field gets ATK +4/STA +4.
skill_text.200469: The first two Followers in your Deck are sent to the top of your Deck and get ATK/STA increased by half of the number of empty Slots in your Hand (rounding up).
skill_text.200470: If there are at least two cards with the same name in the enemy Field, they are sent to the Grave.
skill_text.200471: All Spells in the top 5 cards in the enemy Grave are removed from the game. The enemy Character gets LIFE decreased by the number of removed cards.
skill_text.200472: A random Follower in the enemy Field is sent to a random Slot in the enemy Field. That Follower gets ATK/STA decreased by the difference between its old and new Slot numbers. If you have an Academy Character, this effect is applied a second time.
skill_text.200473: If there are any Followers in your Field, a random Follower in the enemy Field with at least two skills is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. If this happens, your Character gets LIFE -1.
skill_text.200474: A random Crux Follower in your Field gets the following skill: "Before this card is attacked, the attacker gets STA decreased by half of its own ATK (rounding up). This skill is removed."
skill_text.200475: The first Follower in your Field with ATK 5 or less gets its ATK doubled.
skill_text.200476: Cards are sent from the top of your Deck to your Hand until you have at least four cards in your Hand. A random Follower in your Field gets DEF/STA increased by 1 plus the number of sent cards.
skill_text.200477: If there are any Followers in your Field, a random Follower in the enemy Field gets DEF +1. If that Follower has at least 5 DEF, it is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field and deactivated.
skill_text.200478: If your Field contains a Follower and another Spell and the enemy Field contains a Spell, a random Spell in your Hand that is not named "Witness of Miracles" is copied to the first empty Slot in your Field.
skill_text.200479: If the top Follower in the enemy Grave and the first Follower in your Field have the same SIZE, the top Follower in the enemy Grave is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field.
skill_text.200495: The first Follower in your Field gets the following skill: "Before this card attacks, all Followers in the enemy Field get STA -1. This card gets ATK increased by the total STA reduction."
skill_text.200496: The first Follower in your Field gets DEF increased by this card's SIZE and gets the following skill: "Before this card is attacked, it gets ATK/STA increased by the Turn Number, and then this skill is removed."
skill_text.200497: A random active Vita Follower in your Field is deactivated. If this happens, a random Spell in the enemy Field is sent to the first empty Slot in the enemy Hand.
skill_text.200498: Two random Followers in your Field get ATK/STA increased by half of the number of Followers in the bottom four cards of your Deck (rounding up). If the ATK/STA increase was 2, they get an additional STA +1.
skill_text.200499: All Followers in both Fields get DEF +1. All Followers in both Fields (except for Vita Followers in your Field) with at least 3 DEF are sent to the Grave.
skill_text.200500: Enemy Followers with a SIZE of at least 3 get SIZE -1. The enemy Character gets LIFE decreased by the total SIZE reduction.
skill_text.200501: The first Follower in your Field gets ATK/DEF/STA changed to their original values. The first Follower in your Hand gets ATK/DEF/STA increased by the respective changes in each stat.
skill_text.200502: The first Academy Follower in your Deck is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field. If this happens, all cards in both Hands are sent to the bottom of the owners' Decks in reverse order. That Follower gets ATK/STA increased by the number of sent Followers and gets SIZE decreased by the number of sent Spells.
skill_text.200503: The first Spell in your Deck with the same SIZE as this card is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field.
skill_text.200504: A random Spell in the enemy Grave with the highest SIZE is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field and deactivated.
skill_text.200505:
Up to eight cards in both Graves are removed from the game. The following effects are applied depending on the number of removed cards: 
 ● 8 or less: All Followers in your Field get ATK +3/STA +3.
 ● 9-15: All cards in your Hand and Field get SIZE -1.
 ● 16: All of the above, and your Character gets LIFE +5.
skill_text.200506: Cards in the enemy Field with the same SIZE as this card are sent to the top of the enemy Deck.
skill_text.200507: A random Follower in your Field gets ATK decreased by 30 minus your Character's LIFE (by a maximum of 9). That Follower gets STA increased by its ATK reduction (by a maximum of 9).
skill_text.200508:
If you have a Darklore Character, your Character gets LIFE halved (rounding up). If this happens, the following effects are applied depending on this card's SIZE:
 ● 2 or less: The first Follower in your Field gets ATK/STA increased by twice the LIFE decrease. This card gets SIZE +2 and is sent to the top of your Deck.
 ● 3 or more: If there are Followers in your Field, the first Follower in your Grave is sent to the top of your Deck.
skill_text.200510: If there are Followers in your Hand and Field, a random Follower in your Hand or Field gets ATK +4, DEF +4, or STA +4 (randomly).
skill_text.200511: A random Follower in your Field gets ATK/DEF/STA increased by the number of other Followers in your Field without skills and gets SIZE +1.
skill_text.200512: A random Follower in your Field is reactivated. The last Follower in the enemy Field gets STA decreased by the reactivated Follower's ATK minus 1.
skill_text.200513: If the last Follower in your Deck has "Lady" or "Maid" in the name, that Follower is sent to the first empty Slot in your hand and gets ATK +2/STA +2.
skill_text.200514: If you won the coin flip, all Spells in the enemy Field are deactivated. If you lost the coin flip, two random Followers in your Field get ATK -2/STA -2.
skill_text.200515: A random Follower in the enemy Field gets DEF =0. All Followers in the enemy Hand get DEF decreased by the change in DEF.
skill_text.200516: A random enemy Follower without skills is sent to the top of the enemy Deck.
skill_text.200517: A random Follower in the enemy Field gets its skills removed. If this happens, a random Follower in your Field gets its original skills restored.
skill_text.200518: Cards with "Blue Cross" in the name are sent from the top of your Deck to your Hand until your Hand has at least 4 cards. All allied Followers get ATK/STA increased by the number of sent cards.
skill_text.200519: Two random Followers in your Field get ATK increased by the number of cards in the enemy Hand.
skill_text.200520: Any cards with "GS", "Aletheian", or "Apostle" in the first 3 cards in your Deck get SIZE -1. A random enemy Follower gets STA decreased by the total SIZE decrease.
skill_text.200521: All Spells in your Grave are removed from the game. A number of cards named "Zombie" equal to 2 plus the number of removed cards are created at the top of your Grave. A random enemy Follower gets STA decreased by half the number of "Zombie" cards in your Grave (rounding up, by a maximum of 6).
skill_text.200522: All cards in both Hands and Fields get SIZE =2. All Followers in your Hand get SIZE -1. Two random Followers in the enemy Field get ATK decreased by the total number of cards in both Hands and Fields with a SIZE of 2 (to a minimum of 0) and get STA decreased by half of that amount (rounding down).
